src: An bai wa fasinjoji ruwa yayin da suke jira a cikin didgiri 90 na zafi. Kaftin ɗin hukumar kashe gobara Scott Kouns ya ce, “ranar na da zafi a Santa Clara inda ma’aunin zafi ya kai 90. Duk wani tsawon lokacin da aka makale a kan abin nadi ba zai zama da dadi ba, alal akalla, kuma ya dauki a kalla awa daya kafin mutum na farko ya sauka daga kan jirgin.”
mt: 90 degree Fahrenheit water was provided to passengers while they were waiting in a 90 degree Fahrenheit hangar. Scott Kouns, the airport fire chief said, “It was hot in Santa Clara where the temperature reached 90. Any length of time spent in the jetway would be uncomfortable, at least, and would take about an hour before the first person would exit the plane.”
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Labari na baya bayan nan ya nuna cewa, nazarin motsin teku na nuna alamun wata tsunami ta taso. Hakika an tabbatar da alamun tsunami a kusa da Pago da Niue. Ba a sami wata mummunar barna ko jin ciwo a rahoton da ke fitowa daga Tonga ba, amma kuma wutar lantarki ta katse, abinda ya hana hukumomi samun sanarwar gargadin tsunami wanda hukumar PTWC ta bayar. An rufe duk makarantu goma sha hudu a Huawaii wadanda suke kusa da bakin teku a ranar Laraba duk da cewa an janye jan kunnen.
mt: The report below this one shows that a tsunami watch was issued for Pago Pago and Niue. No damage or injuries have been reported from Tonga, but power was cut, preventing authorities from receiving a tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. All 84 schools on the Hawaiian island of Oahu near the coast were closed on Tuesday despite the cancellation of the tsunami warning.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, direba ne na kungiyar A1GP New Zealand, a yau dan shekara 48 din ya kafa tarihi na mafi gudu a kan gadar Aukland Harbor Bridge, wanda bai keta doka ba. Mista Reid ya yi kokarin tuka Black Beauty, motar A1GP ta New Zealand, a gudu na sama da 160km / h ninki bakwai a bisa gadan. 'Yan sanda a New Zealand sun sami matsalar yin amfani da bindigoginsu na radar masu sauri don gane irin gudun da Mr Reid ya ke yi, lokaci daya da yan sandan suka yi nasarar auna gudun Mr Reid shine lokacin da ya rage gudu zuwa 160km / h.
mt: 48-year-old Jonny Reid, driver of the A1GP New Zealand team, today set a new speed record on the Auckland Harbor Bridge, which is not illegal. Mr. Reid attempted to drive Black Beauty, the A1GP New Zealand car, at speeds of up to 160 km/h over the bridge. Police in New Zealand had difficulty using their fast radar guns to gauge the speed Mr. Reid was driving at, one time successfully measuring Mr. Reid's speed when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: An yi wata matsakaiciyar girgizar kasa a yammacin Montana da karfe 10:08 na dare. ran Litinin. Babu wani rahoto game da lalacewa nan take da Nazarin Yanayin Kasa na Amurka (USGS) da kuma Cibiyar Bayar da Bayani game da Girgizar Kasa suka samu. Girgizar kasar ta fi kamari ne a tsakanin kilomita 20 (wato mil 15) a arewacin arewa maso gabas da kuma kimanin kilomita 65 (wato mil 40) kudu da Buttle.
mt: 10:08 p.m. Monday. No reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 kilometers (15 miles) north-northeast and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: An kone kurkukun Abu Ghraib na Iraq lokacin hargitsi. Kurkukun ya yi ƙaurin suna bayan an gano cin zarafin fursunoni da ake yi a can bayan dakarun Amurka sun karɓi iko.
mt: Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was bombed during a raid. The prison was evacuated after it was discovered that prisoners were being abused after American guards took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: ƙungiyar makaɗa ta soke wasan filin Maui War Memorial, wanda mutane 9,000 za su halarta, kuma sun nemi afuwa ga magoya baya. Kamfani mai gudanar da kungiyar makadan, HK Management Inc., bai ba da wani dalili ba da farko lokacin da suka soke a Sa tumba 20, amma sun ɗora laifin a kan rashin kayan aiki washe gari.
mt: 9,000 people were expected to attend the Maui War Memorial, but the event was cancelled and the promoter apologized. The event's organizer, HK Management Inc., did not give a reason for the cancellation at first, but filed a claim against the venue for lack of equipment.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Rahotanni sun nuna an kwashe tsawon daren ana wasoson kayan jama’a, sakamakon rashin jami’an tsaro a titunan Bishkek. Wani mai lura ya bayyana Bishkek a matsayin wanda ke nutsewa cikin halin “fitina” yayin da gungun mutane suka yi ta yawo a titunan tare da fasa shagunan kayayyakin masarufi. Da dama cikin mazauna Bishkek sun zargi masu zanga-zangar da suka fito daga kudanci da halayyar rashin mutunta doka.
mt: Witnesses say the city has been in a state of “chaos” as a large group of people took to the streets, blocking traffic and setting fire to government buildings. Residents of Bishkek have also accused protesters from the south of the country of acting in a lawless manner.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: A baya, Shugaban kamfanin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara lokacin da ba a jiyo sauti kararrawar jikin ƙofar sa daga shagonsa a cikin garejinsa. Ya ce, ya gina ƙararrawar ƙofa ta WiFi. Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun bunkasa bayan bayyanarsa a 2013 a cikin wani taron fim na Shark Tank inda taron kwamitin ya nuna ba da tallafin farawa. A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC. Ring ta kuma sasanta takardar kotu tsakanin wata kamfanin adawa na tsaro wato ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had stated that the company began shipping its first doorbell in 2013 after a successful appearance on the television show Shark Tank where the panel of investors offered to fund the startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also sued a security company competitor, ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Shirin PBS ya ci lambobin yabo kimanin dozin biyu na Emmy, ya kuma kasance kawai a bayan shirin Sesame Street da Shirin Mister Rogers Neighborhood wajen dadewa ana yinsa. Kowane aukuwar shirin zai mayar da hankali kan wani jigon wani littafi na musamman sannan zata bincika jigon ta hanyan labarai masu yawa. Kowane shirin zai ba da shawarwarin littattafa wanda ya kamata yara su nema idan sun je ɗakin karatu. John Grant, daga WNED Buffalo (yayin Karanta tashar gida ta Rainbow) ya ce “Karanta Rainbow ya koya wa yara dalilin karatu, son karatu - [wasan kwaikwayo] ya karfafa wa yara gwiwa su dauki littafi su karanta.” Yawanci sun gaskanta, tare da John Grant, da cewa kudade da matsawa a fasaha na shirye-shiryen talabijin na taimakawa zuwa karshen jere.
mt: PBS won two dozen Emmys, and was only second to Sesame Street and Mister Rogers Neighborhood in the number of awards won. Each program focuses on a different topic in a particular book, and explores the topic through many stories. Each program gives tips on how to read to children when they go to the library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow home station) said, "Reading Rainbow teaches children the reason for reading, the love of reading - [the show] inspires children to take books and read." Most of the time, along with John Grant, they said that funding and support from television programs helped to end illiteracy.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Jami'ai a birnin Amsterdam da na cibiyar ajiye kayan tarihi ta Anne Frank, sun bayyana cewa bishiyar ta kamu da gansa kuka, abinda ke da hadari ga lafiyar jama’a sakamakon bishiyar na daf da karyewa. An yanke cewa za’a sare ta ranar Talata, amma sai wani hukunci gaggawa na kotu ya ceci lamarin.
mt: Authorities in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House museum announced that a tree had been struck by lightning, which posed a threat to public safety due to the tree's damage. It was decided that it would be cut down on Tuesday, but a final decision was made by the court.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Kungiyoin kare hakkin dabbobi da kungiyar yanta dabbobi da kuma kungiyar hana yi wa dabbobi ukuba, na kiran cewa lallai ne a saka na’urar daukan hoto mai motsi, a dukkan mayankar da ke kasar Australiya. Sabon babban jami’in RSPCA na Wales ta Kudu David O'Shannessy ya shaidawa ABC cewa ya kamata a sa-ido da kuma duba mayanka ya kasance aikin yau da kullum a Australia. “Na’urar daukar hoton zai ja hankali ga wadanda ke aiki da dabbobi wajen tabbatar da cewa kiwon dabbobin shine mafi muhimmaci.”
mt: Animal welfare groups and the RSPCA have called for the use of motion-sensitive cameras in all Australian zoos. New South Wales RSPCA chief David O'Shannessy told ABC that it should be mandatory to film and review zoo animals daily in Australia. "The camera will focus on the people working with the animals to ensure that the welfare of the animals is the most important thing."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Labari ya bazu a cikin yankin Red Lake a yau yayin jana'izar Jeff Weise kuma da kuma kama mutun uku daga cikin tara cewa an kama wani ɗalibi dangane da harbe-harben makarantar na ranar 21 ga Maris. Mahukunta sun yi magana kaɗan ne a hukumance ba tare da tabbatar da kamun yau ba. ko da yake, wata hanya mai masaniya game da binciken ta gaya wa kotun Minneapolis Star cewa Louis Jourdain ne, yaro mai shekara 16 ɗan shugaban ƙabilun Red Lake Floyd Jourdain. har yanzu ba a san a tuhumar da za a yi ba ko kuma abin da ya jagoranci hukumomi ga yaron amma an fara shari’ar yara a kotun tarayya.
mt: News broke in the Red Lake area today as Jeff Weise was buried and three more were arrested in connection with the school shooting of March 21. Authorities have declined to comment on the arrests, though a source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that Louis Jourdain, a 16-year-old son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain, was one of the arrested. He is still not charged or accused of anything, but a hearing for juveniles in federal court is scheduled for Friday.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Masu shirya zanga-zangar sun ce kusan mutane 100,000 ne suka fito a biranen Jamus kamar su Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, da Hanover. A Berlin, yan sanda sun kimanta masu zanga-zanga guda 6,500. An kaddamar da zanga-zanga a garin Paris, da garin Sofia na Bulgaria, da garin Vilinius a Lithuania, da Valetta a Malta, Tallinn a Estonia, da kuma garin Edinburgh da garin Glasgow a Scotland. Kimanin mutane 200 ne suka yi zanga-zanga a kofar inda manyan ofisoshin wasu masu haƙƙin mallaka su ke. Watan da ya gabata, akwai manya-manya zanga-zanga a Poland yayin da kasar ta sa hannu a ACTA, wanda ya haifar da gwamnatin Poland yanke shawarar kin amincewa da yarjejeniyar, a halin yanzu. Latvia da Slovakia duk sun jinkirtar da aiwatar haɗin kai da ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people are reported to have taken to the streets in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilinius, Lithuania, Valetta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. About 200 people protested outside the offices of some of the signatories. Last week, there were large protests in Poland over ACTA, which led the Polish government to advise against signing the agreement, which it has now done. Latvia and Slovakia have both withdrawn from ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: An ba da rohoton iPods da ba sa aiki kusan 60 saboda yawan ɗaukar zafi, wannan ya haddasa gobara har guda shida tare da barin mutane hudu da kananan ƙuna. Ma’aikatar tattalin arziki, Ciniki da Masana’antu ta Japan (METI) ta ce tana sane da hatsarurruka guda 27 da ke da alaƙa da na’urorin. A makon da ya gabata, METI ta sanar da cewa Apple ya sanar da shi wasu karin lamura masu zafi fiye da 34, wadanda kamfanin ya kira “marasa mahimmanci.” Ma'aikatar ta amsa ta hanyar kiran dage Apple din rahoton “abin takaici ne kwarai da gaske.”
mt: 60 iPods were recalled due to overheating, causing six fires and leaving four people with minor injuries. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced Apple had reported additional overheating incidents of more than 34, which the company called "minor." METI responded by calling Apple's report "incomplete."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: An ba da rohoton iPods da ba sa aiki kusan 60 saboda yawan ɗaukar zafi, wannan ya haddasa gobara har guda shida tare da barin mutane hudu da kananan ƙuna. Ma’aikatar tattalin arziki, Ciniki da Masana’antu ta Japan (METI) ta ce tana sane da hatsarurruka guda 27 da ke da alaƙa da na’urorin. A makon da ya gabata, METI ta sanar da cewa Apple ya sanar da shi wasu karin lamura masu zafi fiye da 34, wadanda kamfanin ya kira “marasa mahimmanci.” Ma'aikatar ta amsa ta hanyar kiran dage Apple din rahoton “abin takaici ne kwarai da gaske.”
mt: 60 iPods were recalled due to overheating, causing six fires and leaving four people with minor injuries. Last week, METI announced Apple had reported additional overheating incidents of more than 34, which the company called "minor." METI responded by calling Apple's report "incomplete."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Shugaban Kamfanin Apple Steve Jobs ya kaddamar da na'urar ta hanyar takawa zuwa kan dandamalin sannan fitar da iPhone din daga aljihun wandonsa na jeans. A jawabinsa na sa’o’i 2 ya bayyana cewa “Yau kamfanin Apple zai sake buga wayar, za mu kafa tarihi a yau”.
mt: In his keynote address, Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by pulling it out of his jeans pocket. In response to a question, he stated "Today Apple will change the world, we will make history today".
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Majalisar dattijai da matar shugaban kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da fitowar takarar shugaban kasa a yammacin jiya a La Plata, gari dake kilomita 50 (Mil 31) daga Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.
mt: The Argentine Congress and President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for re-election in the western city of La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner said her candidacy would be launched at the Argentine Stadium, where she used it to start her campaign for the Congress in 2005 as a representative of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA ta kuma gano cewa ko da yake ana duba bidiyon a yanar gizo, Big Brother bai sabawa dokoki ba domin ba a adana kafofin watsa labarai ba a shafin Big Brother na yanar gizo. Dokar yada labarai ta samar da hanyar kula ga al'amuran yanar gizo, duk da cewa baya zama al'amarin yanar gizo sai ya kasance yana kan sabar.
mt: ACMA also found that while videos are being viewed on the website, Big Brother does not change the rules because no news media is archived on the Big Brother website. The news media law provides a way to monitor cyber issues, although it is not an issue of cyber until it is on the Internet.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, ma'ajin Australia kuma mutumin da ake ganin zai gaji Minista John Howard a matsayin shugaban jam'iyyar 'yantattu ya bada goyan bayan sa ga masana'antar nukiliya a Australia. Mista Costello ya ce lokacin da karfin nukiliya ta zama mai amfani da tattalin arziki, ya kamata Australia ta ci gaba da amfani da ita. “Idan har abin ya zama na kasuwanci, to ya kamata mu same shi. Shi ne kawai babu wata ka’idar nuna rashin amincewa da makamashin nukiliya,” inji Mista Costello.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's deputy prime minister and man expected to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has given his support to the nuclear industry in Australia. Mr Costello said when nuclear power becomes economically viable, Australia should move forward with it. "If it becomes a commercial proposition, then we should go ahead with it. It's the only way of showing no objection to nuclear power," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

Shi ne kawai babu wata ka’idar nuna rashin amincewa da makamashin nukiliya,” inji Mista Costello.

It's the only way of showing no objection to nuclear power," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Da lambobin yabo goma sha takwas kacal da ake da su a rana, kasashe da dama sun gaza kaiwa ga dandamalin bada lambar yabo. Sun hada da Netherlands, yayin da Anna Jochemsen ta kammala a ta tara a jerin ajin mata a Super-G jiya, da Finland yayin da Katja ke kammalawa a na goma duk a bikin. Mitchell Gourley na Ostiraliya ya gama na goma sha ɗaya a cikin tsayuwar Super-G na maza. Ɗan gasar Czech Oldrich Jelinek ya gama na goma sha shida a cikin Super-G na zaunen maza. Arly Velasquez na kasar Mexico ya ƙare a matsayin na goma sha biyar a jerin Super-G na maza na zaune. Adam Hall na New Zealand ya ƙare a matsayin na tara a Suƙer-G na maza na tsaye. Mazaje na Poland masu fama da rashin gani a wasan ƙwallon ƙafa Maciej Krezel da jagorar Anna Ogarzynska sun gama na goma sha uku a gasar Super-G. Jong Seork Park na Koriya ta Kudu ya kammala na ashirin da huɗu a gasar maza ta Super-G.
mt: 18 medals were awarded on the day, with many countries boycotting the medal ceremony. These included the Netherlands, as Anna Jochemsen finished last in the women's Super-G downhill, Finland as Katja Keck finished last in the women's Super-G downhill, Australia as Mitchell Gourley finished last in the men's Super-G downhill, Czech Republic as Oldrich Jelinek finished last in the men's Super-G downhill, Mexico as Arly Velasquez finished last in the men's Super-G downhill, New Zealand as Adam Hall finished last in the men's Super-G downhill, Poland as Maciej Krezel and Anna Ogarzynska finished last in the men's and women's Super-G downhill respectively. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished last in the men's Super-G downhill.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: An gudanar da shari’ar a Kotun Masarautar Birmingham kuma an kammala ta a ranar 3 ga watan Agusta. Mai gabatar da labarai/shirin, wanda aka kama a wajen, ya musanta harin inda ya yi ikirarin ya yi amfani da sundukin karfe wajen kare kansa daga kwalaben da wasu mutum kimanin talatin ke jefawa kansa. An samu Blake da laifin yunkurin karkata akalar shari’ah. Alƙalin ya shaidawa Blakes cewa “kusan ba makawa” za a tura shi gidan kurkuku.
mt: The trial was held in the Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The defendant, who was arrested at the scene, pleaded not guilty, claiming he used a time-lock safe to protect himself from the knife and other people who were trying to attack him. Blake was charged with the attempted murder of the victim. The judge told Blakes that he was “lucky” not to be sent to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Cikin abubuwan da za’a tattauna a Bali sun hada da yadda za’a ceci ragowar dazukan duniya, musanyar fasaha da yadda za’a taimakawa kasashe masu tasowa su rage gurbata muhalli. Majalisar dinkin duniya na kokarin hada kudade domin tallafawa kasashe wadanda ke fama da sauyin yanayi. Kudin na iya tafiya ga gidaje masu kariyar ambaliyar ruwa, ingantaccen tsarin ruwa, da kuma canjin amfanin gona.
mt: Issues to be discussed in Bali include how to close the global warming gap, technology innovation and how to help emerging countries reduce environmental damage. The United Nations is trying to raise funds to help countries affected by climate change. The money could go to flood-proof homes, improved water systems, and agricultural change.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: A baya Najeriya ta sanar da shirinta na shiga cikin AfCFTA a cikin makon da ya gabata gabanin taron. Kwamishinan kasuwanci da masana'antu na AU Albert Muchanga ya sanar da cewa Benin za ta shiga. Kwamishina ya ce, “Ba mu rigya mun amince da dokokin asali da jadawalin kudin yarjejeniya ba, amma tsarin da muke da su sun isa a fara ciniki a 1 ga Yuli, 2020”.
mt: Nigeria announced its intention to join the AfCFTA last week ahead of the summit. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin would join. He said, "We have not yet agreed on the original terms and tariff schedule, but the system we have in place will start trading on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Ta sami cikakken yabo lokacin zaman ta a atalanta saboda kirkirar sabbin dabaru wajen nazarin gina birane. A shekarar 2009 aka ba ta matsayin Mai Gudanarwa ta Ƙasa ta shekarar. A lokacin ba da lambar yabon, makarantun Atlanta sun sami gagarumar bunƙasa a makin gwaje-gwaje. Jim kaɗan bayan haka, Atlanta Journal-Constitution ta buga rahoton da ke nuna matsaloli tare da sakamakon gwajin. Rahoton ya nuna sakamakon gwajin ya karu cikin saurin da ake so, kuma ya yi zargin cewa makarantar ta gano matsaloli a ciki amma ba su yi aiki da sakamakon binciken ba. Daga baya shaida ta nuna cewa takaddun gwajin an jirkita su, tare da wasu jami’an ilimi 34 suma an tsoma su cikin laifin a shekarar 2013.

ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Wani bam ɗaya ya fashe a wajen ofishin gwamna-janar. Karin Bama-bamai uku sun fashe kusa a gine-ginen gwamnati a cikin tsawon sa’aoi biyu. Wasu rahotanni sun kai adadin mutuwan zuwa takwas, kuma tabbatacciyar rahoto na tabbatar da cewa mutum 30 suka ji rauni; amma ba a san adadin ƙarshe ba.
mt: 1 more explosion occurred near the governor-general's office. Three more explosions occurred near government buildings in the past two hours. Some reports put the death toll at eight, and confirmed reports state that 30 people were injured; but the final toll is unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Yesu mai shekaru 21 ya shiga kungiyar Manchester City shekaran da ta gabata a watan Janairu shekara 2017 daga kugiyar Palmeiras na Brazil a kudi £27. Tun daga wannan lokacin, dan kasar Brazil din ya buga wasanni 53 a kungiyar a duk gasa kuma ya zira kwallaye 24.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus signed for Manchester City last January from Brazilian side Palmeiras for £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Wani gidan kwanan dalibai ya rushe a Makka, birni mai tsarki na musulinci da misalin karfe 10 na safiyar yau. Ginin ya dauke mahajjata da dama wadanda suka kawo ziyara birni mai tsarki a jajiberin aikin hajji. Bakin masaukin yawancinsu ‘yan kasar Hadaddiyar Daular Larabawa ne. Adadin mutuwa yana a aƙalla 15, lambar da ake yi tsammanin zai ƙaru.
mt: 10:00 am local time (0300 UTC) a building collapsed in Mecca, a holy city of Muslims. The building housed pilgrims who came to visit the holy city during the Hajj season. Most of the victims are Saudi nationals. The death toll is at least 15, and is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Taurarin dan adam ɗin, waɗanda duka biyun nauyinsu ya haura da ƙarin fam 1,000, kuma suke tafiyar kimanin mil 17,500 a sa'a guda, sun yi karo da juna mil 491 sama da Duniya. Masana kimiyya sun ce fashewar da hatsarin ya haifar na da girma. Har yanzu suna ƙoƙarin gano yadda girman hatsarin ya kasance da kuma yadda abin zai shafi Duniya. Hukumar Dabaru ta Amurka wato United States Strategic Command ta Ofishin Tsaron Amurka tana bin diddigin ɓarɓashi. Sakamakon binciken makirci za'a sanya shi zuwa gidan yanar gizon jama'a.
mt: 2 human-sized, 1,000-pound objects, traveling at 17,500 miles per hour, collided over the Earth. Scientists say the explosion and danger increased. They are trying to determine how big the explosion was and how it will affect the Earth. The United States Strategic Command, part of the United States Department of Defense, is tracking the debris. The results of the investigation will be posted on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: An bai wa Batten matsayi na 190 a jerin sunayen Yan Amurka 400 mafi kudi a shekarar 2008 inda aka kiyasta dukiyarsa ta kai biliyan $2.3. Ya kammala karatun sa daga Kwalejin Zane da kimiya na jami’ar Virginia a 1950 kuma yana daga cikin manyan masu taimaka wa cibiyar.
mt: 190 was ranked 190 in the Forbes 400 richest Americans in 2008 with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Engineering and Applied Science in 1950 and is a major donor to the school.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Gwamnan California Arnold Schwarzenegger ya sanya hannu a cikin wata doka da ta hana sayarwa ko hayar wasannin bidiyo mai tashin hankali ga ƙananan yara. Dokar na bukatar a sanya wa wasannin bidiyo na tashin hankali da ake sayarwa a jihar California alama da ke nuna “18” inda ya zamo sayar da su ga kananan yara laifi ne mai jawo hukuncin tarar $1000 a kowane laifi.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The law requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" rating, making it a misdemeanor to sell them to minors, punishable by a fine of up to $1000 per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, wanda ke da mata da manyan yaya guda biyu, bai burge Miller ba, wanda ke da alaƙa da labarin. Da aka nemi tsokacinsa, sai Miller ya ce, “Mike ya yi magana da yawa lokacin zaman jin ba’asin...ina kan shiri saboda haka ban saurari abin da yake cewa ba.”
mt: Duvall, who has two adult children, was not impressed by Miller, who was involved in the story. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike has been talking a lot lately about his suspicions...I'm not going to comment on what he says."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Firayi Minista Stephen Harper, ya amince da aika kudurin ‘Dokar “Tsarkakakkiyar Iska’ zuwa ga kwamitin gamayyar jam’iyyu don sake dubawa, kafin ayi mata karatu na biyu, bayan taron mintuna 25 na ranar Talata tare da shugaban jam’iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO. Layton ya nemi canje-canje ga dokar ra’ayin mazan jiya yanayi lokacin haduwa da Firayim Ministan, yana tambaya don “cikakken sake rubutawar” dokan Jam'iyyar ra’ayin mazan jiya. Tun daga lokacin da Gwamnatin Tarayya ta shiga daukar nauyin asibitin Mersey da ke Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu ‘yan majalisar tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin ci gaban shirin zaben tarayya da za a kira a watan Nuwamba. Amma Firayim Minista John Howard ya ce dokar an yi ta ne domin kare ginin asibitin domin kada gwamnatin Tasmania ta rage masa kima, wajen kara kudaden da dala miliyan 45 ta Australiya.
mt: 1. Minister Stephen Harper, agreed to send the "Airspace Modernization Act" to the committee of the parties for review, before giving it a second reading, after a meeting of 25 minutes on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO. Layton asked for "full rewrites" of the party's opinion bill. Since the federal government entered the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some members of parliament have criticized this project as a federal election campaign plan to be called in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said the bill was made to protect the hospital building from the Tasmanian government reducing it, to increase the Australian $45 million.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Dukkanin cyanuric acid da melamine an same su ne a cikin kayan fitsari daga dabbobin gidan da suka mutu bayan sun sha gurbataccen abincin dabbobi. Magungunan biyu suna aiki tare da juna don samar da lu'ulu'u wanda zai iya toshe aikin koda, masu bincike a jami'ar sun ce. Masu binciken sun lura cewa kiristal sun taru a fisarin kyanwa ta hanyar karin sinadarin melanin da cyanuric. Jumlar sanfurin gilashin suna kama da wanda aka samu a fitsarin dabbar yayin da aka kafa a na’urar infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
mt: All cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the feed from the farm where the dogs died after being fed tainted food. The two chemicals work together to form crystals that can interfere with the functioning of the kidneys, researchers at the university said. Researchers found that the crystals formed through the increase of melamine in the feed during the FTIR analysis of the feed.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua ya bayar da rahoton cewa masu binciken gwamnati sun gano na’urorin naɗar sauti biyu na 'bakin akwatin’ ranar Laraba. Abokan kokawar Luna sun yi jimamin mutuwar ta. Tommy Dreamer ya ce “Luna ita ce farkon Sarauniyar Matsananci. Manajan na na farko. Luna ta mutu a daren wata biyu. Kyawawan irin ta kamar ta. Mace mai ƙarfi.” Dustin “Goldust” Runnels ta yi sharhi cewa “Luna ta kasance mai rauni sosai kamar ni ... wataƙila ma fiye da haka ... ƙaunace ta zai batar da ita ... da fatan tana cikin wuri mafi kyau.”
mt: Xinhua reported that government investigators found two sound effects of the "barking dog" on Tuesday.  Luna's allies praised her death. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna is the first Queen of the Hardcore. My first manager. Luna died on the night of two days. Like her. Strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was very injured like me... maybe more... she would have been better off... and hope she was in the best place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Kodayake mutane uku ke ciki lokacin da motar ta yi karo da gidan, amma ba wanda da ya ji rauni a cikinsu. Koyaya, direban yana ɗaukar munanan raunuka a kan sa. An kulle hanyar da hatsarin ta faru na dan kankanin lokaci yayinda yanayin gaggawa ya kubutar da direban daga jan Audi TT. Da farko an kwantar da shi a asibitin James Paget da ke Great Yarmouth. Daga baya aka canja masa wurin zuwa Asibitin Addenbrooke wanda yake Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were inside the car when it collided with the house, but none of them were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured. The accident occurred shortly after the car left the road and hit a garden wall. Initially, he was taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. Later, he was transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: An fara wasannin ne da karfe 10:00 na safe tare da yanayi mai kyau kuma banda yayyafin safiya wanda da sauri ya warware, ya kasance cikakkiyar rana don wasan rugby na 7. Afirka ta kudu masu darajar farko a gasar sun fara da kafar dama yayin da suka sami cikakkiyar nasara 26 - 00 akan ‘yan wasan Zambia masu daraja ta 5. Suna nuna alamun rashin kataɓus a gasar da suka buga da takwarorinsu na kudu, sai ga shi Afirka ta Kudu ta ƙara ƙwazo a hankali yayin da gasar ke cigaba. Tsarin su na kariya, da kwarewa wajen amfani da hannu da kuma hadin kan su ya sanya suka bambanta kuma alama ya nuna cewa abokan wasan su zasu sha kaya.
mt: 10:00 am local time with good weather and except for a brief shower that quickly cleared, was a full day for the rugby 7s. The first round of the tournament saw the South Africa first tier teams start with a clean sweep, beating Zambia 26 - 00. They showed signs of weakness in the tournament, but South Africa stepped up their game as the tournament continued. Their defense, and skillful use of hands, and teamwork set them apart and showed that they would be a force to be reckoned with.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

They showed signs of weakness in the tournament, but South Africa stepped up their game as the tournament continued. Their defense, and skillful use of hands, and teamwork set them apart and showed that they would be a force to be reckoned with.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: A cikin shekaru talatin da suka gabata, duk da kasancewarta a matsayin kwaminisanci a hukumance, China ta bunkasa tattalin arzikin kasuwa. Sauye-sauyen tattalin arziki na farko ta gudana ne a ƙarƙashin jagorancin Deng Xiaoping. Tun lokacin, tattalin arzikin China ya karu har sau 90. A karo na farko, shekarar da ta gabata kasar China ta fitar da mafi yawan motoci fiye da Jamus kuma ta zarce America a matsayin mafi girman kasuwa a wanan masana’anta. GDP ɗin China zai iya girma fiye da Amurka cikin shekaru ashirin.
mt: In the last three decades, despite being officially communist, China has developed its economy. Deng Xiaoping's first economic reforms began in 1978. Since then, China's economy has grown by over 90%. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the world's largest car market. China's GDP is expected to surpass the United States in the next twenty years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: “Za mu kokarin rage fitar da gurbataccen carbon dioxide a kowane bangare na GDP ta wani muhimmin mataki a 2020 daga matakin 2005,” in ji Hu. Bai sanya wani adadi don ragewar ba, inda ya ce hakan zai danganta ne da abin da tattalin arzikin China ke fitarwa. Hu ya karfafa kasashe masu tasowa “da su guji tsohuwar hanyar gurbatar da farko da kuma tsabtace ta daga baya.” Ya kara da cewa “ kada su yunkura, sai dai kuwa ana sa su daukar nauyi sama da na matakin cigaban su, da kuma daukan alhaki da iyawar su.”
mt: “ We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions in every part of GDP by a major step in 2020 from the 2005 level,” Hu said. He did not set a target for the reduction, saying that would depend on China’s economic growth. Hu urged emerging countries “to abandon their old path of first polluting and then cleaning up later.” He added that “they should not overtake, but rather to overtake with a heavier weight than their current level of development, and to take responsibility and bear the cost.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Mangola, kungiyar tallafin kiwon lafiya, Sans Medecines Frontieres da Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya sun ce ita ce barkewar cuta mafi muni da aka yi a kasar. Kakakin kungiyar ta Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman ya ce “Angola na fuskantar barkewar cutar mafi muni da aka taba gani kuma lamarin ya ci gaba da munana a Angola,” in ji shi.
mt: Mangola, the health aid organization, Medecines Sans Frontiere and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak of disease ever seen in the country. Medecines Sans Frontiere head Richard Veerman said, “Angola is facing the worst outbreak of disease ever seen and it is continuing to spread in Angola,” he said.
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Darektan gabatar da kara na hukumar, Kier Starmer QC, a safiyar yau ya sanar da gurfanar da mutanen biyu, Huhne da Pryce, a gaban shari’a. Huhne ya yi murabus kuma za a maye gurbinsa a Majalisar da Dan Majalisa Ed Davey. Ana tsammanin Dan Majalisa Norman Lamb zai zama Ministan Kasuwanci aikin da Job Davey zai ajiye. Huhne da Pryce an shirya za su bayyana a Kotun Majistare ta Westminster a ranar 16 ga Fabrairu.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, announced today that the two defendants, Huhne and Pryce, will be arraigned in court. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in Parliament by Ed Davey. It is expected that Norman Lamb will be the new Business Secretary and Ed Davey will remain. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Labarin da Camille Saint-Saenstar ya gabatar a wasan dandamali na Faransa,na wani shahararren mai fasaha ne wanda “wanda rayuwarsa ta ta’allaka kan soyayyarsa da kwaya da kasar Japan” A sakamakon haka, masu wasan kan sha tabar wiwi akan dandamalin wasan, kuma shi kansa gidan wasan yana baiwa masu kallo ƙarfin guiwar yin haka.
mt: The story that Camille Saint-Saenstar introduced in the French construction, was a famous artist who "his life was dominated by his love of music and the country of Japan" As a result, the players on the stage were wearing white wigs, and the house of the game was giving the audience the power to make such a gesture.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, da aka sani da “cosmonaut No. 11”, na daga cikin asalin ƙungiyar Soviet Union ta cosmonauts. A ranar Maris 18, 1965, ya yi tafiya na farko a sarari (EVA), ko “tafiyan sarari”, ya rage shi kadai a waje ba a cikin jirgin sarari ba na fiye da mintuna goma sha biyu. Ya karbi “Jarumin Tarayyar Soviyet,” babban mukamin girmamawa na Tarayyar ta Soviyet, don aikinsa. Bayan shekaru goma, ya jagoranci ɓangaren Soviet na tawagar tafiya sararin samaniya ta Appop-Soyuz da ke alamta cewa Gasar zuwa Sararin Samaniya ta ƙare.
mt: Leonov, known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was one of the original Soviet Union cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he made the first EVA (EVA), or "spacewalk", outside the space capsule, lasting more than 22 minutes. He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union," the highest award of the Soviet Union, for his work. After ten years, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz test project, which signaled the end of the Space Race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Bayan hadarin ya faru, an dauki Gibson zuwa asibiti amma ya mutu jim kadan bayan haka. Direban babbar motar, mai shekaru 64, bai ji rauni ba a hatsarin. An dauke Motar da kanta ta daga wurin da hatsarin ya faru da misalin 1200 GMT a wannan ranar. Wani mutum da ya ke aiki a wani gareji kusa da inda hatsarin ya faru ya ce: “Akwai yara da ke jiran su tsallaka titi wadanda su ke ta ihu da kuka.” Dukansu sun gudu daga inda hatsarin ya faru.
mt: After the accident occurred, Gibson was taken to hospital but died shortly afterwards. The driver of the main vehicle, aged 64, was not injured. The car was removed from the scene of the accident at around 1200 GMT on this day. A man who was working on a nearby building said: "There are children waiting to cross the road who are in tears." Both fled the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Mafi yawancin aiki da aka yi a rubuce ne, amma an tsara tsarin ne domin bunkasa lura da ake wa taurarin Sagittarius. Tasirin da ƙungiyar ke nema zai haifar ne ta hanyar karfi tsakanin igiyar ruwa tsakanin galaxy da Milky Way mai duhu. Kamar yadda maganadisun wata ya ke jan duniya, inda hakan ke haddasa murɗawar igiyar ruwa, haka dabakar milky way ke tasiri kan dabakar saggitarius. Masana kimiyyar sun sami damar karkare bayani cewa lamarin baki zai iya shafar waninsa daidai da yadda lamarin da aka saba yake yi. Wannan ka'idar tana cewa mafi akasarin duhun da ke kusa da galaxy ana samun shi ne a kusa da galaxy a wani nau'in halo, kuma an yi shi da kananan kananan kwayoyi.
mt: Most of the work is done in writing, but the Sagittarius group has been designed to develop awareness of Sagittarius. The effect of the group is to cause the water stream between the galaxy and the Milky Way. As the world is known, this causes the water stream to be affected by the Milky Way. Scientists have been able to create a report that the situation will be able to be as it is known to be. This theory states that most of the galaxies near the galaxy are found near the galaxy in a type of halo, and it is done with small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Muhawarar ta samo asali sakamakon rudani game da kashe kudi wajen bada tallafi da sake gine-gine bayan faruwar guguwar katrina, abinda masu ra’ayin mazan jiya su ke tsokana da cewa “Cuwa-cuwar Bush ta New Orleans” Korafe-korafe kan yunƙurin sake gine-ginen ya maida hankali ne a kan bayar da kwangilolin sake ginin ga waɗanda ake ganin ‘yan cikin gida ne a Washington.
mt: The debate originated over disagreements about funding aid and rebuilding after the Katrina hurricane, which critics of the Bush administration say was "slow-walking" the rebuilding effort.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Muhawarar ta samo asali sakamakon rudani game da kashe kudi wajen bada tallafi da sake gine-gine bayan faruwar guguwar katrina, abinda masu ra’ayin mazan jiya su ke tsokana da cewa “Cuwa-cuwar Bush ta New Orleans” Korafe-korafe kan yunƙurin sake gine-ginen ya maida hankali ne a kan bayar da kwangilolin sake ginin ga waɗanda ake ganin ‘yan cikin gida ne a Washington.

src: Idan kwayar ta zo Duniya kuma ta shiga sararin samaniya, kimanin karfe 5 na safe(lokacin gabas), ana tsamanin ya sa haske sosai don goyon bayan mutane da ke Arewancin California, Oregon, Nevada, da Utah. Za a ga ƙaramin jirgin sama-jannatin kamar wutar yula da ke wucewa ta sararin sama. Jirgin ya na tafiyar kimanin kilomita 12.8 ko mu ce mil 8 a kowace daƙiƙa, wato zai iya zuwa garin Los Angeles daga San Francisco a cikin minti guda. Jirgin Stardust zai kafa tarihin da ba a taba yi ba na kasancewa jirgi mai tafiya samaniya da ya fi kowanne saurin dawowa Duniya, inda ya karya tarihin baya wanda aka kafa a watan Mayu na shekarar 1969 yayin da jirgin Apollo ya dawo duniya. “Za ta matsa saman yammacin bakin teku na arewacin California kuma za ta haskaka samaniya daga California ta cikin tsakiyar Oregon sannan ta cigaba ta cikin Nevada da Idaho sannan zuwa cikin Utah,” Tom Duxbury, manajan aiki na Stardust ya faɗa.
mt: If the craft reaches Earth and enters the atmosphere, it will be visible to people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. You will see a small plane-like jetliner as it passes through the sky. The plane will travel about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per minute, so it will go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. The Stardust will set a record for the fastest return to Earth, surpassing the record set in May 1969 when the Apollo craft returned to Earth. “It will pass over the west coast of Northern California and will light up the sky from California through the middle of Oregon, then through Nevada and Idaho, and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust’s operations manager said.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Hukumomi a Ohio sun sanar da cewa wata likita wadda ke aiki a wani asibiti a Pittsburg, za’a caje ta da laifin kisan kai bayan an gano gawar mahaifiyarta a mace a wajen ajiye kaya na bayan motar ta ranar Laraba. An gano Dokta Malar Balasubramanian, 29, a cikin Blue Ash, Ohio, wani yanki kusa da kilomita 15 arewacin Cincinnati kwance a ƙasa kusa da hanya a cikin T-shirt da tufafi a cikin halain tsananin daukan magani. Ta tura jami’an zuwa bakin motar ta kerar Oldmobile wacce take diddigen kafafu 500 daga inda take. A can, suka tarar da gawar Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, an lulluɓe da barguna na jini. ‘Yan sanda sun ce da alama gawar ta kai tsawon kwana daya a wurin.
mt: Authorities in Ohio announced that a doctor who worked at a hospital in Pittsburgh would be charged with murder after finding her mother's body in a car after a traffic stop on Friday. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, of Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, was found lying on the ground near a highway in a T-shirt and shorts in a state of extreme distress. She directed officers to an Oldmobile car that was about 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, who had been stabbed in the neck. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Shine mafi girma da aka samu a tarihin eBay. Kamfanin yana fatan faɗaɗa hanyoyin samun riba da kuma yin fice a wuraren da Skype ke da ƙarfi, kamar China, Gabashin Turai, da Brazil.
mt: It is the largest ever sold on eBay. The company hopes to expand revenue streams and compete in areas where Skype is strong, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Lokacin da fada ya barke bayan an kai wadanda suka ji rauni zuwa asibiti, kusan sauran fursunoni 40 da suka rage sun zauna a farfajiyar kuma sun ki komawa dakinsu. Masu tattaunawar sun yi kokarin gyara lamarin, amma bukatun fursunonin ba su bayyana ba. Tsakanin 10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, fursunoni sun fara wuta a farfajiyar gidan. Ba da dadewa ba, jami'an da ke sanye da kayan aikin kwantar tarzoma suka shiga yankin sun kore yan fursunan da barkonon tsohuwa. Rundunar kashe gobara sunyi nasara kashe wutan a dai-dai karfe 11:35pm.
mt: When the fire was extinguished after the injured were taken to the hospital, about 40 other inmates remained in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were not disclosed. Between 10:00 and 11:00 pm MDT, inmates started a fire in the yard of the prison. Shortly thereafter, riot police entered the area and cleared the inmates and the remaining prisoners. The fire department succeeded in extinguishing the fire at exactly 11:35pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: Jawabin na kai tsaye ta talbijin, shine karo na farko da majiyoyin Iran suka amince cewa takunkumin da aka sanya na yin tasiri. Sun hada da takaita kudi da kuma haramcin da Tarayyar Turai ta yi kan fitar da danyen mai, wanda daga shi ne tattalin arzikin Iran yake karbar kashi 80% na kudaden shigarta na kasashen waje. A rahoton wata-wata na baya-bayan nan, OPEC ta sanarda cewa yawan ɗanyen man da ake fitarwa ya yi kasa da ganga miliyan 2.8 a rana, faɗuwar da bai taɓa yi ba a shekaru ashirin da suka gabata. Babbab Jagoran kasar, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ya bayyana dogaro da mai a matsayin “tarko” tun kafin juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran a 1979 kuma ya kamata ta 'yantar da kanta wannan.
mt: In a rare admission of weakness, Iran's leaders have acknowledged that sanctions are having an effect. They include cutting off oil revenues and the European Union's ban on exporting gasoline, which Iran's economy depends on for 80% of its foreign income. In a recent report, OPEC said that global oil production was down by 2.8 million barrels a day, a drop that has not been seen in the last 20 years. Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has long viewed oil as a "strategic asset" since before Iran's Islamic Revolution in 1979 and has called for it to be "nationalized."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: A Faransa, zaɓe ya kasanace wani abu mai ƙarancin fasahar zamani: masu zaɓe na keɓe kansu a cikin wani akwati, suna saka wata bugaggiyar takarda da ke nuna ɗan takararsu a cikin wata ambulan. Bayan jami'ai sun tantance asalin masu jefa kuri'a, mai jefa kuri'ar ya jefa ambulaf a akwatin murfin kuma ya sanya hannu a takardar kada kuri'a. Dokar zaɓen Faransa ta tsara yadda ake gudanar da zaɓe bisa matuƙar bin ƙa’ida. Tun daga 1988, dole ne akwatunan zabe su kasance ana ganin abin da ke cikinsu domin masu jefa ƙuri'a da masu sa ido su iya shaidar cewa babu wasu ambulan a ciki a farkon kada kuri'un da kuma cewa ba a kara wasu ambulan ba sai dai wadanda aka kidaya kuma daga masu zaɓe da aka tantance. 'Yan takarar na iya aika wakilai don su shaida kowane bangare na aikin. Da yamma, masu aikin sa kai suna kidaya kuri'u a karkashin kula mai karfi, suna bin takamaiman hanyoyin.
mt: In France, a vote has ended with a low-tech twist: voters were sealed in a booth, placed a ballot in a box, and signed a form. After election officials verified the identity of the voter, the ballot box was sealed and the voter signed a form. French election law prescribes how votes are conducted with strict procedures. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be visible to voters and election officials to ensure that no additional ballots are added and that no ballots are removed until after the polls close. Candidates can send representatives to witness the process. In the evening, ballots are counted under strict supervision, following specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Idan ya tabbata, binciken wanda Allen ya share shekaru takwas ya na nema ya cika. Bayan an samu maki layin katangar teku ta yin amfani da ROV. Daya daga cikin attajiran duniya, Allen an bayar da rahoton ya sa hannun jari mai yawa a cikin binciken ruwa kuma ya fara neman Musashi saboda sha'awar rayuwa.
mt: If confirmed, the search that Allen shared years ago would be complete. After finding the wreck of the ocean liner using a ROV. One of the world's richest investors, Allen was reported to have invested heavily in the water research and began searching for Musashi because of his interest in life.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Rahotannin talabijin sun nuna farin hayaki na fitowa daga shukar. Mahukuntan yankin suna gargadin mazauna yankin da ke kusa da masana’antar da su kasance cikin gidajensu, a kashe na’urorin sanyaya ɗaki kuma kada a sha ruwan famfo. A cewar hukumar nukiliya ta Japan, an gano sinadaran caesium da iodine masu hadari a ma’aikatar. Hukumomi suna hasashen cewa wannan yana nuna cewa mai yiwuwa gangunan da a ke ajiye man uranium a wurin sun fashe kuma suna zuba.
mt: Television reports show the evacuation of the area around the plant. Residents of the area are being asked to stay in their homes, to turn off their air conditioning and not to drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected in the plant's offices. Authorities are speculating that this may indicate that the uranium fuel rods have melted and are leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dokta Tony Moll ya gano kwayar cutar tarin fuka (XDR-TB) a yankin Afirka ta Kudu KwaZulu-Natal. A cikin wata hira, ya ce sabuwar cutar “na da matukar tada hankali da firgitarwa saboda yawan mace-macen da ta ke haddasawa.” Kila wasu marasa lafiya sun kamu da cutar a asibiti, Dokta Moll yana tsammani, kuma aƙalla biyu sun kasance ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya na asibiti. Nan da shekara ɗaya, mutum daya mai ɗauke da cutar zai shafa ma mutane 10 zuwa 15 da suka kusance shi. Sai dai, kashin XDR-TB da ke jikin duk rukunin mutane da ke da tarin fuka har yanzu da alamar yana ƙasa; 6,000 daga cikin jimillar mutane 330,000 da suka kamu a kowane lokaci a Afirka ta Kudu.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the XDR-TB strain in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa. In an interview, he said the new strain "is of great concern and alarm because of its high mortality rate." If a patient contracts the disease at a hospital, at least two health care workers will also be infected. Last year, one person with the disease would infect ten to fifteen people with whom he came in contact. However, the XDR-TB strain in the human population is still rare; 6,000 out of the total 330,000 people who contract TB in South Africa each year.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen tsari ne wanda FAA ke ikirarin zai bawa jirgin sama damar yin gajeren hanyoyi da kuma adana miliyoyin galan na mai a kowace shekara da kuma yanke hayakin mai. Yana amfani da fasahar tauraron dan adam maimakon amfani da rada a doron kasa domin baiwa masu kula da zirga zirgar jiragen sama damar gane inda jirage su ke babu kuskure ta yadda za su iya baiwa matukan jirgin sama cikakkun bayanai.
mt: NextGen is a system that FAA claims will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and store millions of gallons of fuel each year and reduce aircraft emissions. It uses human computer interaction instead of ground-based radar to allow air traffic controllers to see where aircraft are without collisions as to be able to give pilots accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Masana tarihi sun soki manufofin Hukumar bincike ta Amurka saboda mai da hankali wajen laifuka wadanda ke da saukin warwarewa, musamman satar motoci, domin kawai su nuna yawan nasarar da su ke samu. Majalisa ta fara samar da kuɗaɗe ga tsarin batsa a kasafin kudi na 2005 kuma ta fayyace cewa dole FBI ta ware jami’ai 10 don lura da hotunan batsa na manya.
mt: Historians criticized the U.S. Justice Department for focusing on low-level offenses, especially car theft, to show the agency's success. The House began funding the program in the 2005 budget and voted to require the FBI to hire 10 agents to investigate major thefts.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Masana tarihi sun soki manufofin Hukumar bincike ta Amurka saboda mai da hankali wajen laifuka wadanda ke da saukin warwarewa, musamman satar motoci, domin kawai su nuna yawan nasarar da su ke samu. Majalisa ta fara samar da kuɗaɗe ga tsarin batsa a kasafin kudi na 2005 kuma ta fayyace cewa dole FBI ta ware jami’ai 10 don lura da hotunan batsa na manya.
mt: Historians criticized the U.S. Justice Department for focusing on low-level offenses, especially car theft, to show the agency's success. The House began funding the program in the 2005 budget and voted to require the FBI to hire 10 agents to investigate major thefts.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Jirgin JAS 39C Gripen ya fado a kan hanyar jirgi da misalin karfe 9:30 na safe lokacin kasa (UTC 0230) kuma ya fashe, wanda ya haddasa rufe filin jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci. An gano cewa matukin jirgin shine Shugaban Rundunar Sojoji Dilokrit Pattavee. Kafofin watsa labarai na cikin gida sun ce wata motar kashe gobara ta tashi a sama yayin da take mai da martani.
mt: A JAS 39C Gripen jet took off on a training flight at 9:30 local time (UTC 0230) and crashed, causing the closure of the airport's commercial flights. Local media reported that the pilot was Colonel Dilokrit Pattavee. A car bomb exploded in the air while it was responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
