src: Matakin da Mista Rudd ya dauka na rattaba hannu kan yarjejeniyar sauyin yanayi ta Kyoto ya maida kasar Amurka, saniyar ware inda ta zama kasa tilo cikin kasashen da su ka ci gaba wadda ba ta saka hannu a yarjejeniyar ba. Tsohuwar gwamnatin Australia mai ra’ayin mazan jiya ta ki amincewa da Kyoto, tana mai cewa za ta yi illaga tattalin arzikin da ya dogara matuƙa kan fitar da gawayi, yayin da ƙasashe kamar India da China yarjejeniyar fitar hayaƙin ba ta aiki a kansu.
mt: Mr Rudd's signing of the Kyoto Protocol makes Australia the only developed country not to have signed the climate change treaty. The former Australian government, which was in power until last year, refused to sign Kyoto, saying it would harm the economy too much by forcing it to cut emissions, while countries such as India and China were exempt from the treaty.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Maharba masu aikin gwajin maganin kwari, zasu kasance karkashin kulawar malaman gandun daji, yayin gwajin domin tantance ingancinsa. A cikin haɗin gwiwar NPWS da Sportungiyar Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, an ɗauki ƙwararrun masu sa kai, a ƙarƙashin shirin wasannin kungiyar maharba. A cewar Mick O'Flynn, na'ibin Daraktan na Park Conservation da Heritage tare da NPWS, maharban guda hudu da aka zaba don aikin harbi na farko sun sami cikakken tsaro da horo.
mt: 4 shooters will be under the supervision of park rangers, during the trial to test its effectiveness. In a joint venture with NPWS and Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, experienced shooters will be used, under the club's shooting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS Park Conservation and Heritage Director, the four shooters selected for the first trial have received full training and safety.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: “A bisa waɗannan ƙasusuwan tarihi, wannan na nufin rabewar ta zo da wuri fiye da yadda ake tsammani ta hanyar hujjojin ƙwayar halitta. Yana nufin dole a mayar da komai, “in ji mai binciken a Rift Valley Research Service a Habasha kuma wani abokin aikin binciken, Berhane Asfaw.
mt: “On these grounds, this means that the split occurred in a place other than where we thought it did, through the evidence of the biological evidence. It means that everything has to be rethought,” says the researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-researcher, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: A lokacin gabatar da babban bayani na ranar Alhamis a Nunin Wasan Tokyo, shugaban Nintendo Satoru Iwata ya kaddamar da tsarin sarrafawa na sabuwar na’urar Nintendo Re volution. Kamar da abun kuna talabijin daga nesa wato remote, mai sarrafawa yana amfani da na’urorin sunsuna guda biyu da aka sanya kusa da talabijin ɗin mai amfani don daidaita matsayinta a cikin sarari mai fuska uku. Wannan zai bai wa masu wasannin bidiyo damar sarrafa wasan ta hanyar motsi da na’urar a cikin iska.
mt: In the Thursday press conference at the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the new Nintendo Revolution controller. Like the remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the screen to align the controller in the three-axis space.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Tun farko kamfanin dillacin labarai na China Xinhua ya ba da rahoton wani jirgin da aka sace. Rahotanni daga baya sun nuna cewa an yi wa jirgin barazanar harin bam, sannan aka karkatar da shi zuwa Afghanistan, inda ya sauka a Kandahar. Rahotannin farko sun ce an juya akalar jirgin zuwa Afghanistan bayan an hana shi saukar gaggawa a Ürümqi.
mt: 1st reports by Chinese news agency Xinhua said a plane was hijacked. Later reports showed the plane was bombed, then diverted to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Initial reports said the plane was forced to land in Ürümqi after being hijacked.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi. Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, secretary general of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio show on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee would not be able to reach Bob Dylan directly regarding the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, dismissing her own efforts to do so. Danius said, "Right now, I don't have the time. I'm calling my closest colleagues and asking them nicely. Right now, this is not possible."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Shugaban Amurka George W. Bush ya yi maraba da sanarwar. Mai magana da yawun Bush Gordon Johndroe ya kira alwashin da Koriya ta Arewa ta yi “babban mataki ne ga burin cimma nasarar narkar da makaman nukiliya na zirin Koriya.”
mt: President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's move "a significant step toward achieving the goal of eliminating North Korea's nuclear weapons program."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: A shekarar 1956 Slania ya koma Sweden, inda bayan shekaru uku ya fara aiki da gidan waya na Sweden sannan kuma ta zama shugaban masu zane. Ya samar da sama da stamp 1000 ga kasar Sweden ga kuma wasu kasashen guda 28. Aikin shi yana da shaidan inganci da bayanin filla-filla har yana daya daga kadan daga sanannu cikin philatelists. Wasu sun kore a karban ayukansa kadai. Hatiminsa na 1,000 ya kasance mafi kyawun “Maɗaukakan Ayyuka na Sarakunan Sweden” da David Klocker Ehrenstrahi ya yi a shekarar 2000, wanda aka sanya a cikin Littafin Bayanan Al’ajabi na Guinness. Ya kuma tsunduma a zanen kudi ga kasashe da dama, misalai na kwanan nan na aikinsa da ya hada da hotunan Firaminista a gaban sababbin takardun kuɗin ƙasar Canada na dala $5 da $100.
mt: 1956 Slania moved to Sweden, where after three years he began working for the Swedish Post Office, and later became its chief engraver. He designed over 1000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is known for its quality and detail, and some have been sold for their own weight in gold. His last of 1000 was the best “Swedish Working Horses” by David Klocker Ehrenstrahi in 2000, which was placed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also engraved coins for many countries, including recent work on the new Canadian $5 and $100 banknotes.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Mil 800 na hanyar man Trans-Alaska aka rufe, bayan asarar dubban gangar danyen mai a kudancin Fairbanks, Alaska. Matsalan wutan lantarki bayan gwaje-gwajen tsari na yau da kullum ta sanya bawul na taimako ya bude sannan danyen mai ya yi ambaliya kusa da Fort Greely tashar fanfo na 9. Budawar mafitar na bada damar fitar karfin aikin da gudanar mai a faifan tankin da zai iya rike ganga 55,000 ( gallan miliyan 2.3). Tun daga ranar Laraba da maraice, tankin yana cigaba da yoyo watakila daga zafin cikin tankin. Ba a cika wani yanki a kasa ba wadda zai iya rike ganga 104,500 bai rigya ya cika dam ba.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska pipeline was closed after a massive oil spill in southern Fairbanks, Alaska. The power outage after routine daily tests opened a help barrier and the oil spilled near Fort Greely missile base. The pipeline's emergency valve opened allowing the flow of oil to stop at a tank that can hold 55,000 gallons (2.3 million liters). Since Tuesday, the tank has been fluctuating in temperature possibly from the tank's internal temperature. No part of the pipeline has been breached that could hold 104,500 gallons and has not been breached.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: {Ungiyar Injiniya ta Amurka ta kiyasta cewa inci 6 na ruwan sama zai iya keta ragowar guguwar da ta gabata. Unguwa ta tara, wacce ta ga ambaliyar ruwa har sama da ƙafa 20 a lokacin Guguwar Katrina, a halin yanzu tana cikin ruwa mai ɗumbin yawa yayin da levee na kusa ya cika. Ruwa na zubewa kan levee a sashi mai fadin kafa 100.
mt: 6 inches of rain could exceed the previous record. The agency, which saw 20 feet of flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now in several feet of water as levees near it fill. Water is flowing over levees in a 100-acre section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton ya tabbatar da Asibitin Jami'ar Howard ya ba da haƙuri a cikin kwanciyar hankali. Marar lafiyar ya je Najeriya, inda aka samu wasu sun kamu da cutar ta Ebola. Asibitin ta bi ka’idoji na kula da kamuwa da cuta, tare da raba masu jiyya daga sauran jama’a domin hana yaduwan cutan.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the University of Howard Hospital provided care in good faith. The patient traveled to Nigeria, where others were found to have contracted Ebola. The hospital followed protocols for treating the disease, isolating patients from other people to prevent the spread of the virus.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Mai yiwuwa taurari masu wutsiya sun kasance ta cikinsu ruwan sama ke zuwa duniya tare da takin dabbobi wanda ke iya samar da kayan gina jiki domin tallafar rayuwa. Masana kimiyya suna fatan fahimtar yadda taurari suke samuwa, musamman yadda Duniya ta samu, tunda taurari masu wutsiya suka yi karo da duniya lokaci mai tsawo da ya gabata.
mt: It is possible that the raindrops that are falling into the world are carrying with them the seeds of animals that can produce the building blocks of life for sustaining life. Scientists hope to understand how raindrops are getting here, especially how the world is getting here, since raindrops have been colliding with the world for a long time.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Duk da cewa jami’ai basu da tabbacin barazanar, hukumar jigilar Maryland ta yi rufewar ta bayyana haka tare da yin kira ga FBI. An yi amfani da motocin ɗaukar shara domin toshe hanyoyin shiga tashar jirgin ƙarƙashin ƙasa sannan da taimako daga ‘yansada 80 waɗanda za su riƙa juyar da motoci zuwa wata hanyar. Babu wani rahoton cinkoson ababen hawa a babbar hanyar, hanyar birnin ta biyu.
mt: Despite the lack of a confirmed threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the airport's main terminal, diverting traffic to a lower-level garage and receiving assistance from about 80 volunteers who helped move cars to an alternate route. No vehicles were damaged on the main terminal roadway, the second of three.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: An ɗauki mai ɗaukar hoto zuwa Cibiyar Kiwon Lafiya ta UCLA ta Ronald Reagan, idan daga baya ya mutu. An ruwaito cewa yana cikin shekaran sa na 20 ne. A cikin wata sanarwa, Bieber ya ce “duk da ya ke ba na wurin kuma ba ni da hannu kai tsaye cikin wannan mummunan hadarin, tunani da addu'o’ina suna tare da dangin waɗanda abin ya rutsa da su.” Shagin yanar-gizo na labarun nishaɗi na TMZ ya fahimta cewa mai ɗaukar hoto ɗin ya tsayar da motsarsa a tsallaken titin Sepulveda Boulevard kuma ya yi ƙoƙarin ɗaukar hotuna na tsayawar 'yan sanda kafin ya tsallaka titin kuma ya ci gaba, wanda ya sa ɗan sanda na Sintirin Babbar Hanya ta California wanda yake ba da hannu ya umarce shi ya koma a ƙetare, sau biyu. Bisa ga fadin yan sanda, direban motan da ya buge mai hoton na iya fuskantan zargin aikata laifi.
mt: A photo of the crash was taken to the UCLA Ronald Reagan Medical Center, where he later died. In a statement, Bieber said, "Despite the fact that I was not present nor did I drive the car, I am sincerely sorry to anyone who has been hurt or troubled by this situation. As a responsible member of the community I am committed to using my position to help and inspire people to make positive change." TMZ's gossip column reported that the photographer had been taking pictures of the crash on the shoulder of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of police officers before crossing the street and continuing, which caused a California Highway Patrol officer to order him to return to the other side, twice. According to the police, the driver of the car that crashed into the photographer could be charged with a crime.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Gwaji ya nuna Arias yana da alamun cutar amma ba mai ƙarfi ba, in ji Ministan Shugaban kasar Rodrigo Arias. Yanayin jikin shugaban ya daidaita, sai dai za a killace shi a gida na kwanaki da dama. “Baya ga zazzabi da ciwon makogaro, ina cikin nishadi don gudanar da aikina ta hanyar watsa labarai. Ina tsamanin koma duka ayyukata ranar Litinin, Arias ya ce a wata sanarwa.
mt: A physical examination revealed that Arias had symptoms of the disease but not severe, according to President Rodrigo Arias. The condition of the president's health has improved, but he will be kept at home for several days. "In addition to the flu and cold, I am in a condition to carry out my duties through the press. I am feeling well enough to return to all my duties on Monday, Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Lokacin da guguwar teku ta Gonu, wadda aka samo sunanta daga ganyen kwakwa a yaren Maldives, take tsaikonta, gudun iskarta na kadawa da gudun kilomita 240 (mil 149) yau da sassafe, gudun iska ya kai saurin kilomita 83 a awa guda, amma dai ana tsammanin zai yi ta raguwa.
mt: The storm, named after the Maldivian word for "trunk", is moving at a speed of 240 kilometers (149 miles) per hour, with winds reaching 83 kilometers per hour, but is expected to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Jar igiyar ruwa yan tasowa idan dandazon Karenia brevis, wata ainihin halittar ruwa mai ƙwayar halitta guda ɗaya, ya yi sama fiye na kullum. Aukuwa na halitta suna iya karkace don sarrafa kyakkyawan halaye, wanda yake sa yawan wannan algae ya ƙaru sosai. Algae na samar da kwayar cuta mai kara nakasa jijiyoyin jikin mutum da kifi. Sau da yawa kiifi na mutuwa saboda yawan guba a cikin ruwa. Yan Adam na iya fuskantar masalar shakar iskar ta hanyar ruwa da ta shiga iska ta hanyar kadawar guguwa da iskar.
mt: Blooms of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism, occur more frequently than ever. Blooms can spread to contaminate the water with toxins that can kill fish and sicken humans. Humans can experience respiratory distress from inhaling the airborne toxins.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Guguwar Felicia wadda ta kai kimar lamba 4 a ma’aunin Saffir-Simpson, ta ragu zuwa karamar guguwa kafin ta washe gaba daya ranar Talata. Ragowar sa sun samar da ruwan sha a duk yawancin tsibirin, koda yake har yanzu, ba a sami wani lahani ko ambaliyar ba. An bayyana tiririn, da ya kai inci 6.34 a ma'aunin Oahu, a matsayin “mai amfani”. Wasu daga cikin ruwan sama sun zo da tsawa da walƙiya akai-akai.
mt: 4 on the Saffir-Simpson scale, it weakened to a tropical storm before moving on. Rainfall from the storm flooded most of the islands, but still, no major flooding or storm surge was reported. A wind gust of 6.34 inches on the Oahu scale was reported as "useful". Some of the rain came with thunder and lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. ya fadi a gasar Grand Prix ta 2008 jim kadan bayan dakatawar wucin-gadi ta wuri da aka yi wa Fernando Alonso, inda ake fito da motar agaji. Yayin da motocin da ke gaban Alonso suka shiga don shan mai a ƙarƙashin motar mai ba da kariya, sai ya matsa sama don ya ɗauki nasara. An kori Piquet Jr. bayan gasar Hungarian Grand Prix ta 2009.
mt: 2008 Grand Prix rookie Piquet Jr. crashed in the final lap after a collision with Fernando Alonso, where the safety car was deployed. As the cars ahead of Alonso entered the pit lane to change tires, Piquet Jr. spun to take the lead. Piquet Jr. was disqualified after the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Wani bincike da aka wallafa ranar Alhamis a mujallar Science ya ba da rohoto kan samuwar wani sabon jintsin tsuntsaye a Tsibiran Galapagos na Ecuadoria. Masu bincike daga Jami'ar Princeton da ke Amurka da kuma Jami'ar Uppsala da ke Sweden sun ba da rahoton cewa sabon jinsin ya samo asali ne a tsararraki biyu kawai, duk da cewa an yi imani da cewa wannan aikin zai dauki lokaci mai tsawo, saboda yaduwar da ke tsakanin tsaunin Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, da kuma bakin kakakus. finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science gave a boost to the discovery of a new species of bird on the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species originated in two separate splits, despite the belief that the process would take a long time, due to the hybridization between the Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Wani bincike da aka wallafa ranar Alhamis a mujallar Science ya ba da rohoto kan samuwar wani sabon jintsin tsuntsaye a Tsibiran Galapagos na Ecuadoria. Masu bincike daga Jami'ar Princeton da ke Amurka da kuma Jami'ar Uppsala da ke Sweden sun ba da rahoton cewa sabon jinsin ya samo asali ne a tsararraki biyu kawai, duk da cewa an yi imani da cewa wannan aikin zai dauki lokaci mai tsawo, saboda yaduwar da ke tsakanin tsaunin Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, da kuma bakin kakakus. finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science gave a boost to the discovery of a new species of bird on the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species originated in two separate splits, despite the belief that the process would take a long time, due to the hybridization between the Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Lamarin zayyane-zayyane shi ma yana cikin gangamin Taron Birnin Bucharest wanda ya nemi sake kaddamar da hoton babban birnin Romania a matsayin birnin fikirar kirkire-kirkire kuma mai tasiri sosai. Birnin zai kasance na farko a rukunin kudu maso yamma na nahiyar turai da zata dauki nauyin CowParade, taron mafi girma a duniya na zane wanda zai gudana tsakanin watan Yuni da Agusta na bana.
mt: The incident is part of the Bucharest City Festival, which seeks to rebrand the capital of Romania as a city of creativity and great influence. The city will be the first in the southwestern region of Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, which will run between June and August.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: An tafi zuwa Irkutsk da jirgin saman kuma sojojin cikin ƙasar ne ke sarrafa shi. An ƙaddamar da aikin bincike domin a bincika. Il-76 ta kasance daya daga cikin muhimmin ginshiki na sojojin Rasha da Soviet tun shekarun 1970 kuma ta riga ta fuskanci mummunar hadari a Rasha a watan da ya gabata. Ranan bakwai (7) ga watan Oktoba wani injin ya rabu yayin tashi, babu raunuka. Russia ta dakatar da II-76s na dan lokaci bayan wannan hatsari.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being controlled by the local military. An investigation was launched. The Il-76 was one of the most important aircraft of the Soviet and Russian military since the 1970s and had already suffered a major accident in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine failed during takeoff, with no injuries. Russia grounded its Il-76s after this incident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Kafin Simpsons Simon ya yi aiki a kan shirye-shirye da yawa a wurare daban-daban. A lokacin 1980s yayi aiki a kan shirye-shirye kamar Taxi, Cheers, da The Tracy Ullman Show. A cikin 1989 ya taimaka ƙirƙirar Simpsons tare da Brooks da Groening, kuma shi ke da alhakin ɗaukar ƙungiyar masu rubutu na farko. Duk da barin wasan shirin a 1993 an cigaba da kiransa shugaban shiri, kuma ya cigaba da karbar miliyoyin daloli a kowace kaka na kamasho.
mt: Before Simpsons Simon worked on many shows in various places. In the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and he was responsible for hiring the original writing team. Despite the show's cancellation in 1993 he continued as executive producer, and continued to receive millions of dollars in royalties each year of syndication.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke ya rubuta cewa ƙoƙarin wasu na hana mata yin magana game da harkokin kiwon lafiyar mata bai yi nasara ba. Ta kai ga wannan matsayin ne saboda yawan tofa albarkatun bakin mutane tare da kwarin gwiwa wanda maza da mata ke rokar cewa amfani da magungunan hana haihuwa sun zama dole.
mt: Fluke wrote that attempts to prevent her from speaking about women's health issues had failed. She came to this conclusion because of the high number of people who were willing to risk their lives with informed consent that birth control pills were necessary.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Fluke ya rubuta cewa ƙoƙarin wasu na hana mata yin magana game da harkokin kiwon lafiyar mata bai yi nasara ba. Ta kai ga wannan matsayin ne saboda yawan tofa albarkatun bakin mutane tare da kwarin gwiwa wanda maza da mata ke rokar cewa amfani da magungunan hana haihuwa sun zama dole.

She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: “Zai nuna hali kamar ruwa. Yana da sararin gani kamar yadda ruwa yake. Idan kana tsaye a bakin gabar ruwa, za ka iya ganin tsakuyoyi ko dagwalgwalin da ke karkashin ruwan. Iya sanin mu, duniya guda daya da ta fi duniyar Titan damar canje canje ita ce wannan duniya tamu” A cewar Stofan.
mt: “ It will look like water. It has a transparency like water. If you stand on the shore of a lake, you can see the fish or the bubbles under the water. You can see us, the whole world, the world that is most like Titan, is this world that is happy” Stofan said.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Wannan ya tabbatar cewa ba wai kawai wasu dabbobin dinasour suna da gashi ba, wata fadar ma da ta yadu, amma ta yi cikakken bayanin da rubabbun halittu ba za su iya ba, kamar su launi da kuma tsarin kashi uku. Masana ilimin kimiya sun ce fiffiken dabbar launi kasa ne a sama mai dauke da kodaden launi da launin toka-toka ta karkashin ta. Binciken ya kuma ba da haske game da juyin halittar fukafiki a tsuntsaye. Domin gashin fuka-fukin dinosaur bashi da isasshen tsari, wanda ake kira kara, amma suna da sauran sifofin gashin fuka-fukan — tsandar gashi da kananan — masu binciken sun kammala cewa wata kila karan wani cigaba ne na juyin halittan wadannan sauran sifofin. Tsarin gashin fuka-fukan ya nuna cewa ba ana amfani da su ba ne domin tashi sama, sai dai domin samar da tsarin daidaiton dumin jiki da kuma motsawa. Binciken ya nuna cewa duk da cewa jelar ta wani karamin kakan kadangare ce, abin na nuna cewa gashin balagagge ne ba na dan tsako ba. Masu binciken sun nuna cewa, duk da cewa sun gamsu jelar ta kakannin kadangare ce, ta kuma nuna cewa ta balagagge ce ba jariri ba.
mt: This confirms that not only some dinosaurs had feathers, but also a tail, and a tail with a distinctive pattern of black and white. The study also shed light on the evolutionary history of feathers in birds. Because the tail of the dinosaur lacked the complex structure of a modern bird's tail, but did have other features of a bird's tail — such as a small, rounded tip — the researchers concluded that the tail was a primitive form of the modern bird's tail. The pattern of the tail feathers suggests that the dinosaur used its tail for display, rather than for flight. The study also showed that despite the fact that the dinosaur's tail was a small, rounded tip, it was not a primitive form of the modern bird's tail. The pattern of the tail feathers suggests that the dinosaur used its tail for display, rather than for flight. The study also showed that despite the fact that the dinosaur's tail was a small, rounded tip
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Yayinda allurar gwaji rigakafi guda daya ta bayyana tana iya rage mutuwar cutar ta Ebola, har zuwa yanzu, babu wasu kwayoyi da aka nuna da suka dace da maganin cututtukan da suke kamuwa da su. Wani hadaddiyar giyar, ZMapp, da farko ya nuna alƙawari a fagen, amma nazarin yau da kullun ya nuna cewa ba shi da fa'ida fiye da yadda ake neman hana mutuwa. a nan gwajin PALM, ZMapp yayi bauta a wajen kula, hakan na nufin masana fasaha sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin kasan idan ka kimanta da hanyoyin guda uku nashi.
mt: While one experimental vaccine has shown promise in preventing Ebola, there are no other drugs or vaccines that have been proven to be effective against the diseases it causes. One such drug, ZMapp, initially showed promise, but recent trials have shown it to be no better than a placebo in preventing death. The PALM trial used ZMapp as a placebo, meaning researchers used it as a control, or comparison, to three other methods.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: A ranar Litinin, masana kimiyya daga Kwalejin Kimiyya ta Jami'ar Stanford suka sanar da kirkirar sabon kayan aikin bincike wanda zai iya rarrabe kwayoyin hallita ta nau'i: ƙaramin cip mai buguwa wanda za'a iya kera ta yin amfani da daidaitattun firinta na inkjet don yiwuwar kusan Amurka ɗaya kowannensu. Manyan masu bincike sun ce wannan na iya sa a gano ciwon daji, tarin fuka, HIV da zazzaɓin cizon sauro da wuri ga marasa lafiya a ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗaɗen shiga, inda adadin warkewa na cututtuka kamar sankarar nono zai iya kasancewa rabin na ƙasashe masu arziki.
mt: On Monday, scientists from Stanford University's School of Engineering announced the creation of a new research tool that could sequence the DNA of any organism. Major researchers say this could help find cancer, heart disease, HIV and other diseases in poor countries, where the cost of testing for diseases like malaria could be half the income of a country.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Masana kimiyya sun gano yanayin kasa daban-daban a kan wata wadanda ake kira da lobate scarps, wadanda da alamu sun samu sakamakon tsukewa da wata ke yi a hankali. Wadannan tabo an same su a duk duniyar wata kuma kamar ba su da kyau sosai, yana mai nuna cewa al'amuran yanayin kasa da ya haifar da su ba da dadewa ba. Wannan fahimtar ta yi karo da wadda ke cewa babu wata alama cewa a duniyar wata, akwai abinda ke faruwa na motsawar duwatsu ko wuta a karkashinta.
mt: Scientists have discovered that different landforms exist on a planet that is being tectonically deformed. These features are similar to those found on Earth, indicating that landforms are not unique to Earth. This understanding is consistent with the idea that there is no evidence that a planet, other than Earth, has experienced plate tectonics or volcanic activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Tuni Adekoya ke Kotun Edinburgh in da a ke tuhumarta da kashe danta. Tana tsar yayin daake jiran hukunci da sharia, amma duk wani shaidar ganin ido za a wulakanta saboda an wallafa dukan halin ta. Wannan shi ne abin gama gari a wasu wurare a cikin Ingila amma adalci na Scottish yana aiki daban kuma kotunan suna kallon wallafa hotunan a matsayin mai yuwuwar wariya. Farfesa Pamela Ferguson na Jami'ar Dundee ta lura “'yan jarida na ganin kamar suna tafiya ne a wani layi mai hadari idan wallafa hotuna da sauransu wadanda ake zargi.” Ofishin gabatar da Ƙararraki, wanda ke da alhakin gabatar da tuhuma, ya bayyana wa ‘yan jarida cewa ba shi da wani bayani da zai kara har sai bayan an karbi shigar da karar.
mt: 25-year-old Adekoya is on trial at Edinburgh's High Court. She is awaiting sentencing after a jury found her guilty of murder, but any evidence of identification will be withheld because all of her details have been suppressed. This is unusual in other parts of England but Scottish justice works differently and courts look at suppression orders as a potential threat. Professor Pamela Ferguson of Dundee University noted "journalists are seeing as they go down a dangerous road when suppression orders and other evidence are withheld." The Procurator Fiscal, who is responsible for prosecuting, told journalists that he had no further comment to make until after the trial.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: kari akan ruguza kankara, yanayin mai tsananin gaske na kawo cikas ga aikin ceto. Pittman ya ba da shawara cewa yanayin ba zai gyaru ba sai cikin sati na gaba. Yawa da kaurin kankarar teku, a cewar Pittman, shi ne mafi muni da ya kasance ga matukan teku a cikin shekaru 15 da suka gabata.
mt: The storm surge, combined with the high tide, is bringing the water up to the top of the seawall. Pittman advised that the storm will not subside until the next high tide in about an hour. The storm surge, according to Pittman, is the worst he has seen in the past 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts ya cije akan kin yin magana game da lokacin da ya yi imanin cewa rayuwa ta fara, wata muhimmiyar tambaya idan ana la’akari da dacewar zubar da ciki, yana mai cewa ba zai dace a faɗi maganganu game da takamaiman lamurra masu kama ba. Don haka, ya sake nanata abinda ya fada a baya cewa Roe v. Wade ya kasance “doka karbabbiya ar ƙasa”, tare da jaddada mahimmancin rashin kwan gaba kwan baya a hukunce-hukunce kolin koli. Ya kuma tabbatar da cewa ya yarda da manufar da ke bada damar samun sirri wadda hukuncin Roe ya dogara a kai.
mt: Roberts said he would not comment on when he thought life began, a key question if one considers the timing of abortion, saying he would not opine on specific issues. Therefore, he reiterated what he said earlier that Roe v. Wade was “bad constitutional law”, emphasizing the importance of stare decisis in the court's rulings. He also confirmed that he agreed with the goal of providing privacy that Roe relied on.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Daidai ƙarfe 8:46 na safe, wani yanayin shuru ya faɗo ko'ina cikin birnin, yana alamar daidai lokacin kamar farkon bugawar manufan jirgin. An kunna katako biyu na haske don nuna sama dukkan dare. Aiki yana cigaba da gudana na gina sababbin dogayen benaye biyar a wurin, tare da cibiyar sufuri da kuma wurin shaƙatawa na tunawa a tsakiya.
mt: 8:46 am local time, a fire broke out in the center of the city, indicating the exact time as the start of the fire. Two fire trucks were deployed to show the top of the building. Work is underway to build a new five-story building at the site, including a bus station and a memorial in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Dukkan ginshikan kogon, da aka yi wa suna “ ‘Yan uwa mata guda bakwai”, akalla sun kai mita 100 zuwa 250 (kafa 328 zuwa 820) a fadinsu. Hotunan infrared suna nuna cewa bambancin zafin jiki daga dare da rana yana nuna cewa mai yiwuwa koguna ne. “Suna da sanyi fiye da kewayan farfajiyar ckin rana kuma suna yin dumi da dare. Halayyar ɗumi ba tsayayye ba ce kamar manyan koguna a cikin ƙasa waɗanda galibi su ke riƙe zafin jiki na yau da kullun, amma ya yi daidai da waɗannan kasancewarsu ramuka masu zurfi a cikin ƙasa,” in ji Glen Cushing na kungiyar Nazarin Albarkatun Ƙasa ta Amurka (USGS) Ƙungiyar Nazarin Taurari da kuma na Jami’ar Arewacin Arizona da ke a Flagstaff, Arizona.
mt: 7-foot-tall (3.3 m) "sisters" weigh between 100 and 250 pounds (45 and 113 kg) in their active state. Infrared images show that the temperature difference between day and night indicates that the "sisters" are likely to be active. "They are colder than the surrounding air at night and they are active at night. The activity is not a steady-state like the larger, more common ground-sitters, but it is consistent with the behavior of these tall, active ground-sitters," says Glen Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Cooperative Research Unit and the University of Northern Arizona in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Mutumin bisa ga zargi ya tuka mota mai kafa uku cike da nakiya zuwa cikin mutane. An tsare mutumin da a ke zargin tayar da bom ɗin, bayan ya sami raunuka daga fashewar. Har yanzu hukuma bata samu sunan shi duk da cewa an san yana daga cikin yan kabilar Uighur.
mt: A man was arrested for allegedly throwing a homemade bomb into a crowd. He was injured in the explosion and is in critical condition. Authorities have not yet released his name, despite knowing he is a member of the Uighur minority.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Afirka ta Kudu ta ci nasara akan All Blacks (New Zealand) a wasan rugby union na Tri Nations a filin wasan Royal Bafokeng dake Rustenburg, na kasar Afirka ta Kudu. An tashi wasan da banbancin maki daya, wato 20-21, abinda ya kawo karshen samun nasarar All Black karo na 15 a jere. Don 'yan Springboks, ya ƙare rashin nasara a wasanni biyar. Wasan karshe ne na All Blacks, wanda tuni ya lashe kofin makonni biyu da suka gabata. Wasan karshe na rukunin zai gudana ne a Ellis Park a Johannesburg mako mai zuwa, lokacin da Springboks za ta buga da Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in the rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The match ended in a score of 20-21, ending the All Black's streak of 15 consecutive wins. For the Springboks, it ended a five-game losing streak. The final match of the Tri Nations will be played at Ellis Park in Johannesburg tomorrow, where the Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Tashar ta cigaba da halayyarta, duk da hasarar da aka yi ta na’urar hangen gaba a farkon shirin tashar sararin samaniyar, har zuwa karshen tattakin sararin sama. Chiao da Sharipov sun kawo rahoto a kan cewa suna nesa daga masu daidaita halayyar mutane. Masu kula da kasa na Russia sun kunna jiragen sama sannan hali na al’ada na tasha ta sake samuwa.
mt: The launch continued its countdown, despite the failure of the launch vehicle's guidance system at the beginning of the launch pad's launch pad. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were far from the human-rated flight. Russian ground controllers cleared the spacecraft for reentry.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: An yi shari’ar ne a Virginia saboda nan ne garin kamfanin AOL mai samar da mashigar yanar gizo, kuma kamfanin da ya shigar da karar. Wannan shi ne karo na farko da aka samu yanke hukunci ta amfani da dokar da aka zartar a 2003 don dakatar da imel mai yawa, ko spam, daga rarraba ba a cikin akwatin imel masu amfani.
mt: The case was heard in Virginia because AOL is headquartered there, and the company filed the suit. This is the first time a ruling has been made using a law enacted in 2003 to stop mass e-mailing, or spam, from being sent from a single IP address.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Daga cikin mutane 1,400 da aka jefa kuri’a gabanin zaben tarayya na 2010, wadanda ke adawa da Australia ta zama jamhuriya sun karu da kashi 8 cikin 100 tun daga shekarar 2008. Minista mai rikon kwarya Julia Gillard ta yi ikirarin a lokacin yakin neman zaben shekarar 2010 cewa ya yi imani Australia za ta zama jamhuriya a karshen mulkin Sarauniya Elizabeth II. kashi 34 na wadanda ke cikin jin ra’ayoyin suna da ra’ayi kamar wannan, son Sarauniya Elizabeth II ta zama mai sarauta ta karshe a Australia. Jin ra’ayoyin jama’a ya nuna cewa kaso 29 na mutanen Australiya na goyon bayan zamanta jamhuriyya cikin gaggawa yayin da kaso 31 kuma ke sukar ra’ayin ta zama jamhuriya.
mt: 1,400 of the 1,700 people who voted in the 2010 federal election, who opposed Australia becoming a republic, have increased by 8 percent since 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the 2010 election campaign that she believed Australia would become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of those in the poll support the Queen Elizabeth II becoming the last monarch of Australia. Public opinion shows that 29 percent of Australians support a republic, while 31 percent also oppose the idea of becoming a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, mai magana da yawun Gidauniyar Komen, ya ce hukumar ta amince da wata sabuwar doka wadda ta hana bayar da tallafi ko gudunmuwar kuɗi ga ƙungiyoyin da ake wa bunciken shari’a. Manufar Komen ta hana Iyayen Tsararru sanadiyyar binciken kashe kudi kan yadda Tsararren Iyaye yake ciyarwa kuma ta ba da rahoton kuɗaɗɗinta wanda Wakilin Cliff Stearns ke gudanarwa. Stearns yana binciken ko an yi amfani da haraji don biyan kuɗin zubar da ciki ta hanyar ƙungiyar planned Parenthood a matsayinsa na shugaban Ƙaramin Kwamiti na Sa-ido da Bincike, wanda ke karkashin lamuran Kwamitin Makamashi da Kasuwanci na Majalisar.
mt: Leslie Aun, Komen Foundation spokesperson, said the organization approved a new law that bans giving aid or financial support to groups that violate the law. Komen's reason for cutting funding to Planned Parenthood was the investigation of whether Planned Parenthood was using tax dollars to pay for abortions. Cliff Stearns, the representative who is investigating Planned Parenthood, is also the chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which is under the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: ‘Yan sandan Madhya Pradesh sun karbo laptop da wayar hannu da aka sace. D K Arya, mataimakin Sufeto Janar ya ce, “Mun kama mutane biyar da suka yi wa yar kasar Switzerland fyade kuma an gano wayarta ta hannu da kwamfutar taa Wadanda ake zargin sun hada da Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar da Vishnu Kanjar. Sufiritendan ‘yan sanda Chandra Shekhar Solanki ya ce wanda ake zargin ya gurfana gaban kotu - fuska rufe.
mt: 5 people have been arrested for stealing a laptop and a cell phone from a Swiss citizen. D K Arya, Deputy Inspector General said, "We have arrested five people who have been accused of stealing and we have found their cell phones and laptop. Those accused include Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Chandra Shekhar Solanki, a police inspector said that the accused have been sent to court - the case is closed.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, wanda aka ƙaddamar da farko a fadin-duniya don ceton-farashi ƙasa da dalilai na aiki, ya zama babban magana a cikin shekarar 2007 Watan Taipei IT. Amma kasuwar sayen ɗaiɗai ta kwamfutar hannu za ta banbanta ƙwarai kuma ta canja bayan Mai Zartarwa Yuan na Tarayar Ƙasar Sin ya bai wa ASUS lambar girman Taiwan Sustainable Award a 2007.
mt: 2007 Taipei IT show, the first mass-market sub-$400 laptop, became a major buzzword in the year. But the market for the notebook will be crowded and change after the President Yuan of the State Council of China gave ASUS the Taiwan Sustainable Award in 2007.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Batun ya fara ne a ranar 1 ga watan Janairu lokacin da dimbin mazauna yankin suka fara korafi zuwa Ofishin Obanazawa na cewa basu karbi katunan Sabuwar Shekara ba. Jiya, ofishin gidan waya ya saki neman gafararsu ga 'yan ƙasa da kuma kafofin watsa labarai bayan sun gano cewa yaron ya ɓoye fiye da takardu 600 na fasfon, ciki har da katinan gaisuwar Sabuwar Shekara 429, waɗanda ba a ba wa waɗanda suka jiran karɓarsu ba..
mt: The issue began on January 1 when many residents of the area began calling the Obanazawa office to complain that they had not received New Year's cards. The office then issued a request for their addresses to the residents and the media after discovering that the boy had mailed more than 600 cards, including New Year's cards, to people who had not received them.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray ya rasa saiti na farko a bugun tazara bayan duka maza sun rike kowane mai hidimtawa a cikin saitin. Del Potro ya samu riba a sa na biyu, amma wannan shima na bukatan tie break bayan an kai 6-6. Potro ya sami kulawa a kafadarsa a wannan lokacin amma ya sami nasarar komawa wasan.
mt: Murray lost the first set on serve after both men held every game in the tie break. Del Potro won the second set, but this was also decided by a tie break after it was tied 6-6. He suffered an injury to his knee in this period but managed to come back into the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: Biye da wadannan jami'an, ya ba wa jama'ar Texas tabbacin cewa ana bin matakan kare lafiyar jama'a. Perry musamman ya ce, “Akwai wurare kalilan a duniya da suka kware wajen fuskantar kalubalen da ake ciki a wannan yanayin.” Gwamnan ya kuma bayyana cewa, “A yau, mun samu labarin cewa an gano wasu yara 'yan makaranta da suka yi mu'amala da mara lafiyar.” Ya ci gaba da cewa, “ Wannan zancen na da muhimmanci. Tabbatace tsarinmu na aiki yadda ya kamata ya yi.”
mt: With these officials, Perry assured Texans that public safety measures are being taken. Perry specifically said, "There are places in the world that have been trained to deal with the challenges we face in this situation." The governor also stated, "Today, we have learned that some school children have been in contact with the ill." He continued, "This is important. We are taking our protocols as they should be taken."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Tun kafin Daily Show da kuma The Colbert Report, Heck da Johnson sun yi tunanin wani ɗab’i da zai kwaikwayi labarai - da rahoton labarai - lokacin da suke dalibi a UW a 1988. Tunda mafarinta, Onion ta zama mai yada labaru mai gaskiya, tare da bugu, shafin yanar gizonta ta jawo masu ziyarta har 5,000,000 a watar Oktoba, tallace-tallace na sirri, labaru na tsawon awa 24, podcasts, da kuma kwanan nan ta fara taswirar duniya da ake kira Dumb World. Al Gore da Janar Tommy Franks cikin raha sun kururuta kanun labaran da suka fi so (Na Gore shi ne a lokacin da The Onion ta ba da rahoton cewa shi da Tipper suna yin jima’i ma fi daɗi a rayuwarsu bayan kayen da ya sha a zaben Electoral College a 2000). Yawancin marubutan su sun ci gaba da yin tasiri sosai a kan labaran Jon Stewart da na Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had thought of a prank that would parody news - and news reports - while they were students at UW in 1988. Since then, The Onion has become a real newspaper, with print, website, and video content attracting up to 5,000,000 visitors per October, secret polls, 24-hour news, podcasts, and recently started a world-wide cartoon called Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks in person have endorsed the paper (Gore's was when The Onion reported that he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after losing the Electoral College in 2000). Most of the writers have gone on to have a great influence on the news stories of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Zanga-zangan ya fara ne misalin ƙarfe 11:00 agogon gida (UTC+1) akan Whitehall mai kallon tashar ‘yan sanda kofar shiga zuwa Layin Downing, Mazaunin Firam minister na hukuma. Jim kadan bayan karfe 11:00, masu zanga-zangar sun hana zirga-zirgar ababen hawa a kan motar arewa a Whitehall. Wajen karfe 11:20 sai yan sandan su ka umarci masu zanga zangar su koma gefen titi saboda kada su shiga hakkin ababen hawa da ke zirga zirga a kan titin. Wajen 11:29, zanga-zangar ta koma Whitehall, gaba da dandalin Trafalgar, a wajajen teku, gittawa ta Aldwych kuma ta saman Kingsway zuwa Holborn inda jam'iyyar zaman dako ke gudanar da taron bazararsu a dakin otal ɗin Grand Connaught.
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall, in front of the Downing Street police station, the Home Office minister's residence. Shortly after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound lane of Whitehall. At 11:20, police ordered protesters to move to the sidewalk because they were blocking traffic on the road. By 11:29, the protest moved to Whitehall, in front of Trafalgar Square, on the Aldwych waterfront, and over Kingsway to Holborn, where the party was holding a rally in the Grand Connaught Hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: “Yanzu muna bera mai watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari ba wadanda ke da suke fama da ciwon sukari,” in ji shi. Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesan magani a Jami’ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen likitanci da bangaren kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sikari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa har yanzu binciken yana kan farkonsa. Kamar wasu ƙwararrun, yana da shakkun cewa ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, inda ya bayyana cewa sakamakon bincike ba shi da alaƙa da mutanen da tuni su ke da nau’in ciwon sukari na 1.
mt: “We are now testing people who have been diabetes-free for four years,” he said. Dr. Ehud Ur, a diabetes specialist at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the diabetes section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. Like other experts, he expressed doubt that diabetes could be cured, noting that the results of the study had no bearing on people who had recently been diagnosed with type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter na kokarin sauka a Kokoda jiya a matsayin jirgin PNG Flight CG4684, amma ya dakatar da saukar ta kafin lokaci. Kusan mintuna goma kafin ya saukar daga karo na biyu nasa sai ya ɓace. An gano inda jirgin yayi hadari a yau kuma ya na cikin sarkakiya yadda sai ta jirgin sama aka sauke yan sanda biyu cikin dajin domin su karasa wajen ko za’a sami wadanda su ka tsira daga hadarin. Irin mummunan yanayin da ya kawo cikas ya dakatar da binciken.
mt: A Twin Otter attempted to land at Kokoda airstrip as PNG Flight CG4684, but aborted its landing before time. About nine minutes before it landed on its second attempt, it disappeared. The location where the plane crashed was found today and it is in a remote area where two police officers were dropped by a plane to search for survivors. The bad weather conditions have hindered the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: “Cikin sa’a babu abun da ya faru da ni, amma na ga abun tashin hankali, yayin da mutane suke ƙaƙarin fasa tagogi domin su fita. Mutane na buga ƙyauren tagogin da kujeru, amma tagogin ba masu fashewa ba ne. Daya daga cikin wadanda su ka tsira Franciszek Kowal ya ce “Da muka samu murfin tagar ya karye, sai muka fara fita ta tagar”.
mt: “In the moment nothing happened to me, but I saw the panic, as people were rolling over the fence to get out. People were throwing their bags and suitcases, but the fence was not burning. One of the people who survived, Franciszek Kowal, said “When we got to the gate, it broke, and we started to get out through the gate”.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Guguwar Daniell na kasashe masun zafi, na hudu an kira sunan guguwar shine Atlantic 2010 hurricane, wanda ya kafu a gabashin tekun atlantic. Guguwar, da ke da nisan kimanin mil 3,000 daga Miami ta Florida, na tare da iska da ke gudun mil 40 a awa guda (64 kph). Masana kimiyya a Cibiyar Guguwa ta Kasa sun yi hasashen cewa Danielle za ta yi ƙarfi ta zama guguwa zuwa Laraba. Tun da akwai sauran lokaci kafin guguwar ta isa doron ƙasa, abu ne mawuyaci a iya tantance irin tasirin da za ta haifar ga Amurka ko yankin Caribbean.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season's fourth named storm, Danielle, was named after forming in the Atlantic east of Miami, Florida. The storm was moving at 40 mph (64 kph) with winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predicted Danielle would strengthen into a hurricane by Tuesday. With time before the storm reaches land, it is too early to determine the impact it will have on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee ya nuna damuwarsa akan rahotanni cewa yanzu yara a ƙasar Turkiya sun kamu da cutar murar A(H5N1) ba tare da sun yi rashin lafiya ba. Sakamakon wasu bincike sun nuna cewa dole tasirin cutar ya ragu kafin ta iya haifar da annoba a duniya, in ji shi. Akwai korafi cewa majinyatan zasu iya cigaba da yada cutar a kan mutane da dama ta hanyar alamuransu na yau da kullum idan har alamun ciwon bai bayana ba.
mt: Dr. Lee expressed concern that children in Turkey have contracted the A(H5N1) virus without becoming ill. Some studies have shown that the virus's impact must decrease before it can cause an outbreak in the world, he said. There is concern that the virus will spread to many people through its constant symptoms if the symptoms of the disease are not revealed.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Tun daren 9 ga watan Agusta, idanun Morakot suna da nisan mil saba'in daga lardin Fujian na kasar Sin. An kiyasta mahaukaciyar guguwar tana matsawa zuwa China a cikin kph goma sha ɗaya.
mt: 9 August, Morakot's eye is about 100 miles from Fujian province in China. It is estimated to make landfall in China in the next 12 hours.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Shugaban kasar America George W. Bush ya iso Singapore a safiya 16 ga Nuwanba, domin fara yawon bude ido na tsawon mako daya a Asiya. Mataimakin Firayi Ministan Singapore Wong Kan Sang ne ya tarbe shi, sannan su ka tattauna al’amuran kasuwanci da ta’addanci tare da Firayi Ministan Singapore Lee Hsien Loong. Bayan mako guda da shan kaye a zabukan tsakiyar wa’adi, Bush ya fada wa wasu magoya baya fadadar kasuwanci a Asiya.
mt: 16 November 2006, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a one-day official visit to Asia. Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng received him, and they discussed business and security issues with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a day of meetings and a working lunch, Bush met with some business leaders in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Sanarwa na yau ya kuma tsawaita sadaukarwa da gwamnati ta yi a Maris na wannan shekara na daukan nayin karin karusai. Karin 300 ya kawo jimillar motocin hawa 1,300 da za a saya don sauƙaƙe cunkoson.
mt: 300 more vehicles were also ordered by the government in March of this year to increase the total of 1,300 vehicles to be purchased for quick response.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Ta ce, “Babu wani bayanan sirri da ke nuna cewa ana sa ran kai hari nan ba da dadewa ba. Duk da haka, karancin barazanar ba yana nufin babu barazanar ne baki daya ba.
mt: She said, "There is no specific information to indicate an imminent attack. However, the lack of specific information does not mean there is no threat at all."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly ya rantsar da sabuwar Kwamitin Zabe na Wucin-gadi (CEP) mai membobi guda tara. Shi ne CEP Matelly na biyar cikin shekara hudu. A watan da ya gabata ne wani kwamiti na shugaban kasa ya ba da shawarar murabus din CEP tun gabani a matsayin bangare na kunshin daukar matakan ciyar da kasar gaba zuwa sabon zabe. Kwamitin ya kasance martanin Martelly ne game da yaɗuwar zanga-zangar adawa da tsarin mulki da aka fara a watan Oktoba. Zanga-zangar da wani lokaci suke da tashin hankali sun faru ne saboda gaza yin zaɓuɓɓuka, waɗansu lokacinsu ya wuce tun 2011.
mt: Martelly appointed a new nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP). It is the fifth CEP in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended the dissolution of the CEP as part of a plan to move the country forward to new elections. The council was the target of Martelly's criticism of the rise of anti-government protests that began in October. Protests at times turned violent due to frustration over the lack of elections, which have been delayed since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: Masu wasan tsalle tsalle na Amurka sun goyi bayan wasikar kwamitin gasar olympic tare da yarda da cikakkiyar bukatar duk masu wasan olympic da su yada maganar samar da yanayi mara hadari ga dukkan yan wasanmu. Mun yarda da bayanin USOC cewa bukatun 'yan wasanmu da kungiyar mu, da wasanninsu, na iya zama mafi alheri ta ci gaba tare da canji mai ma'ana a cikin ƙungiyarmu, maimakon ƙaddamar da doka. Kungiyan daki motsa jiki na USA na goyon bayan bincike mai zaman kanta wadda take zaton zata kara haske kan cin zarafi wadda wadanda suka tsira daga Larry Nassar suka bayana wadda ba a gano ba na tsawon lokaci kuma ke rungume da duk wani canji mai muhimmanci. Gidan motsa jiki na Amurka da USOC suna da manufa ɗaya - sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauransu, ya zama mai aminci yadda zai yiwu 'yan wasa su bi mafarkinsu cikin aminci, tabbatacce kuma mai ba da ƙarfi.
mt: The American athletes have endorsed the committee's letter with full agreement to the USOC's request that all our athletes, and our federation, and our sport, be allowed to lead the way in making a positive change in our organization, rather than impose a rule. The USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal - to make our sport, and all of our athletes, safe and secure in their ability to compete with confidence, integrity, and strength.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Rundunar sojin ruwan Amurka sun ce suna binciken lamarin. Haka kuma sun faɗa a cikin jawabin cewa, “Tawagar tana aiki a halin yanzu don gano hanya mafi kyau wajen ciro jirgin ruwan ba tare da matsala ba”. Jirgin ta ajin jigilar fasinjoji ta kangi, jirgin yana kan hanyarsa ta zuwa Puerto Princesa a Palawan. An tura shi zuwa jirgin ruwan sojan ruwa na bakawi na Amurka da ke can a Sasebo da ke kasar Japan.
mt: The U.S. Navy said it was investigating the incident. It also said in a statement that, “The team is currently working to determine the best course of action without damage to the aircraft.” The plane was carrying passengers from the aircraft carrier USS Ronald Reagan, which was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was diverted to the U.S. Navy's base in Sasebo, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."
