src: A daren ranar Lahadi shugaban kasar Amurka Donald Trump a cikin wata sanarwa da aka fitar ta sanarwar sakataren, ya sanar da dakarun kasar Amurka zasu bar kasar Syria. An bayar da sanarwar ce bayan Trump ya yi ganawa ta wayar salula da Shugaban Turkiyya Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Haka kuma Turkiyya za ta karbi aikin gadin mayakan ISIS da aka kama waɗanda, sanarwar ta ce, kasashen Turai suka ki mayar da su.
mt: On Sunday, President Donald Trump in a statement released by the press secretary announced that U.S. troops will leave Syria. The statement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. It also said that Turkey will take over the care of ISIS prisoners that, the statement said, Western countries refused to take.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Sojojin haɗin kai da na Afganistan sun shiga wurin domin ƙwato sashen kuma an tura wani jirgin saman sojojin haɗin kan domin su taimaka. Hadarin ya faru ne a saman tsaunuka, kuma ana jin cewa sakamakon wuta ne. ƙoƙarin da ake don gano wurin da jirgin ya fadi yana samun cikas daga rashin kyan yanayi da kuma yanki mai wahalar shiga.
mt: Coalition and Afghan forces entered the area to secure the site and sent a coalition aircraft to assist. The incident occurred in mountainous terrain, and it is believed the crash was caused by fire. The effort to locate the site of the crash is being hampered by poor weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Bayan gina madatsan ruwan a 1963, ambaliyar ruwa da ke zuwa akai-akai kuma yada kasa zuwa kogi ya tsaya. Wannan danshi ya zama dole don ƙirƙirar linta da rairayin bakin teku, waɗanda suka yi aiki a matsayin mazaunin namun daji. Sakamakon haka, nau'in kifaye biyu sun ɓace, wasu biyu kuma suna cikin haɗari, da suka haɗa da chub mai ƙusumbi. Duk da cewa Yawan ruwan zai daga kadan bayan ambaliyar, maaikatan na fatan cewa zai isa daidai kimar dawo saman kasar bakin rafin.
mt: 1963, after building a dam, the flood waters receded and the river returned to its normal course. However, this created a delta and estuary, which became home to two species of fish. Two other species were endangered, including the endangered sturgeon. Despite the river's water level will drop after the flood, officials hope it will recover to its pre-flood state.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Ofishin jikadancin Amurika da ke Nairobi, Kenya ya bayar da wani gargaɗi cewa “masu tsatsauran ra’ayi daga Somaliya” na shirin ƙaddamar da harin bom na ƙunar-baƙin-wake a Kenya da Ethiopia. Kasar U.S. ta ce ta karba bayani daga tushe da ba a bayyana ba wadda musamman ta ambaci amfani da yan kunar bakin wake wajen fasa “sanannu wurare” a Ethiopia da Kenya.
mt: The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya issued a warning that "militants from Somalia" were planning a car bomb attack in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. said it had received information from an unspecified source that specifically mentioned using car bombs to target "known locations" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: An ɗaure fitattun lauyoyin Girka, Sakis Kechagioglou da George Nikolakopoulos a gidan kason Korydallus na Athens, yayin da aka same su da laifin cin hanci da rashawa. A sakamakon wannan, an tayar wani babban abin kunya tsakanin kungiyar lauyoyin Girka ta hanyar fallasa haramtattun ayyuka da alkalai, lauyoyi, yan gudunmowa da manyan alkalai suka aikata a shekarun da suka gabata. Bayan 'yan makonnin da suka gabata, bayan bayanan da dan jaridar Makis Triantafylopoulos ya wallafa a cikin sanannen gidan Talabijin dinsa mai suna “Zoungla” a cikin gidan talabijin na Alpha, an cire dan majalisar dokoki kuma lauya, Petros Mantouvalos yayin da mambobin ofishinsa ke da hannu a harkar sata da almubazzaranci. . Haka kuma, babban alkalin Evangelos Kalousis yana kurkuku saboda an same shi da laifin cin hanci da rashawa da kuma munanan halaye.
mt: Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were arrested at the Korydallus courthouse in Athens, while they were charged with bribery. As a result, a major scandal was created between the Greek Bar Association by revoking the activities of judges, lawyers, members and senior judges who had been involved in the past. After the recent incidents, after the information published by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his well-known TV show "Zoungla" in the Alpha TV station, the member of parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was removed from office while his members were involved in the harassment and harassment.. Also, senior judge Evangelos Kalousis is in trouble because he was charged with bribery and many other offenses.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthapa ya ci makunan wasan kriket mafi sama, guduwa 70 cikin kawai ƙwallaye 41 ta hanyar bugawa huɗu guda 11 da kuma shida guda 2. ‘Yan wasan kurket na tsakiya, Sachin Tendulkar da Rahul Dravid, sun yi kokari kuma sun yi haɗin gwiwa tare a Tseren-ɗari. Amma, bayan rashin nasarar kyaftin din wicket Indiya kawai tayi asarar guda 36 tana kwance wickets 7 don kawo karshen innings.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in cricket, running 70 out of 41 wickets by hitting four fours and six sixes. The middle-order cricketers, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, fought and cooperated together in the T20. But, after the wicket captain's failure, India only lost 36 points while holding 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Mai Gudanarwa na Ƙaramar Majalisa Adam Cuerden ya nuna ɓacin ransa a game da sharewa a lokacin da ya ke magana da Wikinews a watan da ya gabata. “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.” Fushin al’ummar ya kai ga ƙoƙarin da ake yi na samar da tsari dangane da al’amuran da suka jibanci jima’i a shafin da ke daukar miliyoyin kafafen yada labarai da ke da lasisi.
mt: Ƙaramar Majalisa Adam Cuerden ya nuna ɓacin ransa a game da sharewa a lokacin da ya ke magana da Wikinews a watan da ya gabata. “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.” Fushin al’ummar ya kai ga ƙoƙarin da ake yi na samar da tsari dangane da al’amuran da suka jibanci jima’i a shafin da ke daukar miliyoyin kafafen yada labarai da ke da lasisi.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Ba duka bane suka goyi bayan hada da mukamman mata ba. Amir Khan, wanda ya ci lambar azurfa a wasan Olympic 2004 ya ce “A cikin zuciya ta na yi imanin cewa bai kamata mata su yi fada ba. Ra’ayi na kenan” Duk da tsokacinsa ya ce zai goyi bayan abokan gasa na Britain a 2012 Olympics da ke gudana a birnin London.
mt: Ɗan wasan ninko Amir Khan, wanda ya ci lambar azurfa a wasan Olympic 2004 ya ce “A cikin zuciya ta na yi imanin cewa bai kamata mata su yi fada ba. Ra’ayi na kenan” Duk da tsokacinsa ya ce zai goyi bayan abokan gasa na Britain a 2012 Olympics da ke gudana a birnin London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, wani ɗan tseren babur mai shekaru 13, ya mutu bayan da ya samu hatsari a Titin Tseren Mota na Indianapolis. Yayin da ya ke zagayen motsa jiki, Lenz ya faɗo daga kan kekensa, inda abokin tserensa Xavier Zayat ya buge shi. Nan da nan likitocin asibitin suka tarbe shi tare da ma’aikacin asibiti mara bi sawu kuma an kai shi wani asibitin gida inda daga baya ya mutu. Zayat bai sami rauni ba a cikin haɗarin.
mt: 13-year-old Peter Lenz died after suffering a crash on the Indianapolis Motor Speedway track. While he was making a lap, Lenz fell off his bike, where his teammate Xavier Zayat hit him. Immediately, hospital staff rushed him with a paramedic and took him to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat did not suffer any injuries in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Tafiya ta hanyar jirgin sama kan iya zama abu mai firgitarwa ga mutane a duk rukunin shekaru da asali, musamman idan ba su taɓa hawa jirgi ba ko kuma sun taɓa shiga al’amari mai firgitarwa. Ba abun jin kunya bane: bata sha bambam da tsoro da kuma rashin kaunar abubuwan da yawancin mutane ke dashi. Ga wasu, fahimtar yadda jirgi yake aiki da kuma ko mene ne ke faruwa yayin da jirgin yake tafiya watakila ya taimaka wajen shawo kan fargabar da tushenta ba a ma san shi ba ko kuma ma ba a iya shawo kansa.
mt: A flight can be a traumatic experience for people of all ages, especially if they have never flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It's not uncommon to feel fear and anxiety about what's going on during a flight, even if you know how a plane works and what's happening. For some people, understanding how a plane works and what's happening during a flight can help them overcome their fears and anxieties.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Kwanakin nan ba a cika sayen tikitin jirgin sama kai tsaye ta hanyar kamfanin jiragen ba tare da an fara yin bincike tare da kwatanta farashin ba. Wani lokacin tafiyar jirgin sama ɗaya na iya samun farashi da suka bambanta sosai a wasu masu tarawa kuma ya dace a kwatanta sakamakon bincike a kuma duba shafin yanar gizo na kamfanin jirgin sama da kansa kafin biyan kuɗi.
mt: The purchase of an airline ticket is not complete until payment is made without a search for the price with the airline. Sometimes an airline ticket may have widely varying prices at different times and it is advisable to search for results and check the airline's website before paying.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: A na biyan kamfanonin aika saƙonni sosai don isar da abubuwa da sauri. Akai-akai, lokaci yana da matukar mahimmanci game da takardun kasuwanci, abin sayarwa ko kayan gyara don gyara na gaggawa. A wasu hanyoyin, manyan kanfanonin na da jiragen samansu, amma a wasu hanyoyi daban da ƙananan kanfanoni akwai matsala. Idan sun aika da kaya ta hanyar jigilar jirgin sama, akan wasu hanyoyi ya zama ya dauki kwanaki kafin a ya tsallake saukewa na ‘yan kwastam. Hanya kaɗai mafi saurin wucewarsu shine ta hanyar tura su a matsayin jakunkunan da aka duba. Tsarin dokokin kamfunan zirga-zirgar jiragen sama ba ya bada damar tura jaka ba tare da mai ita zai yi tafiya ba, to anan ne inda za ka shigo.
mt: We are paying shipping companies very well to deliver quickly. In some cases, large companies have their own aircraft, but in other cases, small companies have problems. If you ship by air, on some routes it can take weeks before you receive your shipment. The only fastest way to get through is to send them as inspected cargo. The shipping company's regulations do not allow to send cargo without an inspector who will travel, here is where you will enter.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Ya kamata ku zaɓi kamfanin jirgin sama na yau da kullun a cikin ƙawance a hankali. Duk da cewa tunani zai jawo ka wajen shiga jirgin da aka fi hawa, abun lura shine sanin cewa gatar da aka bayar wa sun bambanta kuma karamci na mai shaidar hawa akai-akai na iya bambanta a wani jirgi dake kawance daya.
mt: 1. Choose an airline in the quietest part of the plane. Although the noise of the engines will distract you from boarding the plane, it is important to know that the noise of the engines varies and the quieter engine is more likely to be the one you board.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Ya kamata ku zaɓi kamfanin jirgin sama na yau da kullun a cikin ƙawance a hankali. Duk da cewa tunani zai jawo ka wajen shiga jirgin da aka fi hawa, abun lura shine sanin cewa gatar da aka bayar wa sun bambanta kuma karamci na mai shaidar hawa akai-akai na iya bambanta a wani jirgi dake kawance daya.
mt: 1. Choose an airline in the quietest part of the plane. Although the noise of the engines will distract you from boarding the plane, it is important to know that the noise of the engines varies and the quieter engine is more likely to be the one you board.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: A sha kayan barasa a sannu da hankali. Domin giya na tasiri daban daban ga mashayanta, don haka sanin gejinka na da mahimmanci. Matsaloli lafiya masu yiwuwa na dogon lokaci daga yawan shaye-shaye na iya haɗawa da lalacewar hanta har ma makanta da mutuwa. Haɗarin mai yiwuwa yana ƙaruwa lokacin shan giyan da baya bisa ƙa'ida. Samfurorin giya na fasa kwauri na iya kunsar sinadarai masu hadari irinsu methanol, wanda ke iya haddasa makanta ko ma mutuwa ko da kadan ne suka shiga jiki.
mt: 1. Be aware of the potential risks of vaping. Different devices can have different effects on your health, so it is important to know the risks. Long-term health risks from vaping may include lung injury, heart attack, and death. The risk of injury increases with the amount of time spent vaping. Vaping devices can release harmful chemicals such as methanol, which can cause heart attacks or death even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Gundumar Canal (Dutch: Grachtengordel) shahararriyar gunduma ce ta ƙarnin 17 da ke kewaye da Binnenstad na Amsterdam. An naɗa gaba ɗayan gundumar a matsayin wani Wurin Gado na Duniya na UNESCO don darajar al'ada da kuma tarihi mai irinta, da kuma darajojin kadararsa suna cikin mafi sama na ƙasar.
mt: 17th-century Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a prominent inner-city district of Amsterdam. It was designated as a World Heritage Site in 2010 for its outstanding example of a man-made environment, its sophistication and elegance as well as its role in the development of the town and nation. Its canals are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, kilomita 12 kudu maso yamma na Siem Reap. An gina wannan haikalin da ke kan tudu a ƙarshen ƙarni na 9, a zamanin Sarki Yasovarman. Yanayin lalacewar wurin ibadar da kuma duba kan tafkin Tonle Sap ya sanya hawa tsaunin ya zama da kyau. A saukake za a iya hade ziyara zuwa wurin da tafiya da kwalwkwale zuwa tafkin. Ana buƙatar izinin Angkor don shiga haikalin don haka kar a manta da kawo fasfo ɗinku yayin tafiya zuwa Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km south-west of Siem Reap. This temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The site's deterioration and the view over the Tonle Sap lake have made the hill a popular spot. You can combine a visit to the temple with a boat trip on the lake. An Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so make sure you have your pass with you when visiting Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarctica ce nahiya mafi sanyi a Duniya, wadda ta kewaye doron duniya na kudu. Ziyarar yawon shakatawa na da tsada, na bukatar lafiyar jiki, za a iya yin ta ne a lokacin rani kaɗai Nuwamba-Fabrairu, kuma mafi yawa an taƙaice su ga Tsallaken ruwa, Tsibirai da Tekun Ross. Wasu guda biyu dubatan ma'aikata suna zaune a nan a lokacin rani a cikin wasu tushe dozin guda hudu galibi a waɗannan yankuna; wani adadi dan kadan suna zama a lokacin sanyi. Kasar Antarctica wanda ke nesa daga teku gari ne da babu kowa a ciki, kankara ya rufe mai nisan km 2-3 ya rufe shi. Kwararru na wasu lokai kan tafiye-tafiyen jirgin sama nesa da teku, don hawan dutse ko isa zuwa Iyakanci Duniya, wanda ke da babban tushe.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest continent on Earth, surrounded by the Southern Ocean. Tourism is limited, requiring good health, and can only be done in the summer months of November to February, and is mostly restricted to the Antarctic Peninsula, South Shetland Islands and Ross Sea. Some of the stations are inhabited in the summer by dozens of staff in each of the four main bases; a few are occupied in the winter. The continent is surrounded by a sea ice barrier of up to 3 km thick. Visitors can take flights over the ice or to the International World Ice, which has a major base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Yawanci hasumiyoyin nazarin samaniya na baya sun zama tsohon yayi yanzu, inda suka zama gidajen kayan tarihi, ko kuma wuraren koyon ilimi. Kamar yadda gurbacewar haske a lokacin ganiyasa ba kamar irin yadda matsalar take a halin yanzu ba, galibi ya fi yawa a birane da kuma harabobin makarantun jami’a, wanda ya fi saukin samuwa akan wadanda aka gina a birane. Yawancin gilasan hangen nesa na bincike na zamani kayayyaki ne masu girma sosai a yankunan da ke da tsarin yanayi masu kyau.
mt: Most of the old observatories have become obsolete, becoming museums, or educational sites. As with the decline of the observatory in the city, it is often more common to find them in rural areas, where they are less likely to be disturbed by light pollution. Most modern astronomical research instruments are very large in size, and are often found in areas with good weather conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Akwai gaɓar teku mai rairayi da dama, sakamakon zagaye tasoshin jiragen ruwa biyu da Auckland ta yi. Fitattun cikinsu suna cikin yankuna uku. Rairayin bakin tekun North Shores (a gundumar North Harbour) suna kan Tekun Pacific sannan suka miƙa daga Long Bay a arewa zuwa Devonport a kudu. Kusan duk wuraren bakin teku ne masu yashi da iyo cikin aminci, kuma yawancin suna da inuwa da bishiyoyin pohutukawa ke samarwa. Kogin Tamaki Drive suna kan Waitemata Harbor, a cikin manyan unguwannin bayan gari na Mission Bay da St Heliers a Central Auckland. Wani lokaci akwai gabobin bakin ruwa da ke cunkushe da iyalai da kuma jerin kantuna. Yin ninkaya a wajen ba shi da hadari.
mt: There are several beaches with lifeguards, in three areas. North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour region) are on the Pacific Ocean, and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Most are safe for swimming, and many have a safe swimming area and pohutukawa trees providing shade. Tamaki Drive is on the Waitemata Harbour, in the main suburban areas of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. There is a safe swimming area for children and a row of kiosks.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Da fatan za a tuna cewa da gaske ana ziyartar babban kabari ne, kazalika da shafin da ke da kusan ma'ana ga yawancin ɓangarorin duniya. Har yanzu akwai maza da mata da yawa da ke raye waɗanda suka rayu lokacinsu a nan, kuma da yawa da yawa waɗanda suke da ƙaunatattunsu waɗanda aka kashe ko suka yi aiki zuwa can, yahudawa da waɗanda ba Yahudawa ba. Da fatan za a kula da rukunin yanar gizon tare da dukkan mutunci, girmamawa da girmama shi. Kada ku yi ba'a game da fitinar Holocaust ko Nazis. Kada ku lalata wurin ginin ta hanyar sa alamar ko kuma nuna alamar rubutu a cikin ginin.
mt: 1. Please be respectful of the fact that this is a major cemetery, as well as a site of great importance to most of the world. There are many people still alive who lived through this time, and many more who have died or worked here, Jews and non-Jews. Please treat the group with all due respect, reverence, and dignity. Do not make Holocaust jokes or Nazi jokes. Do not desecrate the site by graffiti or writing in the building.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Ƙarin harsuna wasu harsuna ne mara ainihi ko ginanne da aka ƙirƙira da niyyar sauƙaƙa sadarwa tsakanin mutane waɗanda sukan samun wuyar sadarwa idan ba haka ba. Ya bambanta da harshen Faransanci, waɗanda ke asalin yare ko asalin halitta waɗanda suka zama rinjaye saboda dalili ɗaya ko wata hanyar sadarwa a tsakanin masu magana da wasu yarukan.
mt: Other languages are artificial or constructed languages designed to facilitate communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. It differs from French, which is an original dialect or natural language that has become standardized for communication between speakers of other dialects or languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Idan za ka tsallaka Arewacin Baltic a lokacin sanyi, duba wurin taragon, saboda ratsa ƙanƙara na jawo wani mummunan ƙara ga waɗanda abin ya fi shafa. Yawon jirgin ruwa a Saint Petersburg ya haɗa da lokaci a cikin gari. An cire fasinjojin jirgin ruwa daga buƙatun visa (duba sharuɗɗan).
mt: If you travel to the North Baltic in winter, look out for the ice floes, because the ice floes can cause a serious accident to those who are not prepared. The cruise ship in Saint Petersburg includes a visa-free time (see details).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Idan za ka tsallaka Arewacin Baltic a lokacin sanyi, duba wurin taragon, saboda ratsa ƙanƙara na jawo wani mummunan ƙara ga waɗanda abin ya fi shafa. Yawon jirgin ruwa a Saint Petersburg ya haɗa da lokaci a cikin gari. An cire fasinjojin jirgin ruwa daga buƙatun visa (duba sharuɗɗan).
mt: If you travel to the North Baltic in winter, look out for the ice floes, because the ice floes can cause a serious accident to those who are not prepared. The cruise ship in Saint Petersburg includes a visa-free time (see details).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Harsunan Barcelona na yau da kullun sune Catalan da Spanish. Kimanin rabin sun fi son yin magana da Catalan, yawancinsu sun fahimce shi, kuma kusan kowa ya san Sifen. Ko da yake, ana nuna galibin alamomin ana nuna su Katalanci sakamakon bisa doka shi ne yaren hukumana farko. Duk da haka, ana kuma amfani da harshen Spanish sosai a harkar sufuri na jama’a da wasu wurare. Ana yin sanarwar yau da gobe a jirgin ƙarƙashin ƙasa a Catalan kaɗai, amma na’urar da ke aiki da kanta ce ke sanar da hargitsin da babu shiri a harsuna iri-iri da suka haɗa da Sifaniyanci, Turanci, Faransanci, Larabci da harshen Japan.
mt: The languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half prefer to speak Catalan, most understand it, and almost everyone knows Spanish. However, most official signs are in Catalan only, due to a law making it the official language. Nevertheless, Spanish is also used extensively in public transportation and other areas. Announcements on the metro are in Catalan only, but the system itself is announced in multiple languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: A ƙasashen da suka ci gaba a yau, an ɗaukaka samar da wurin kwana mai daraja da karin kumallo zuwa wani nau'i na fasaha. Daga karshe dai, B&Bs tana gasa ne a abubuwar musamman guda biyu: shimfidas da abincin karya kumallo. Kamar yadda ya dace, mutum yana iya dacewa da samun gadon gurma a itin wanan kyakyawar kadamarwar, watakila wanda aka yi da hannu a murkushe ko tsohon gado. kumallo na iya haɗawa da kayan ɗanɗano na yankin ko kuma abincin musamman na mai masauki. Yanayin ya kasance tsohon gini mai tarihi mai dauke da kayayyakin gargajiya, filin yanka farce da kuma wurin iyo.
mt: In today's developed countries, providing a place to stay with a view and extra amenities is a unique selling point. As it should be, a person can be comfortable in this cozy little cottage, perhaps made from an old barn or shed. The setting can be a local landmark or a speciality restaurant. The atmosphere is a historic building with antiques, a shooting range and a spa.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: A ƙasashen da suka ci gaba a yau, an ɗaukaka samar da wurin kwana mai daraja da karin kumallo zuwa wani nau'i na fasaha. Daga karshe dai, B&Bs tana gasa ne a abubuwar musamman guda biyu: shimfidas da abincin karya kumallo. Kamar yadda ya dace, mutum yana iya dacewa da samun gadon gurma a itin wanan kyakyawar kadamarwar, watakila wanda aka yi da hannu a murkushe ko tsohon gado. kumallo na iya haɗawa da kayan ɗanɗano na yankin ko kuma abincin musamman na mai masauki. Yanayin ya kasance tsohon gini mai tarihi mai dauke da kayayyakin gargajiya, filin yanka farce da kuma wurin iyo.
mt: In today's developed countries, providing a place to stay with a view and extra amenities is a unique selling point. As it should be, a person can be comfortable in this cozy little cottage, perhaps made from an old barn or shed. The setting can be a local landmark or a speciality restaurant. The atmosphere is a historic building with antiques, a shooting range and a spa.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Birnin Beijing a kasar China ita ce mai masaukin baki gasar Olympic na lokacin sanyi na 2022, Wannan zai sanya birnin ta zama na farko da ta daukin nauyin mai masaukin baki na gasar a lokacin sanyin da na zafi. Beijing za ta karbi bakoncin budewa tare da rufe bukukuwan wasanni kan kankara na cikin daki. Sauran abubuwan da za a yi a tseren kankara za su kasance ne a yankin wasan tsere na Taizicheng da ke Zhangjiakou, kimanin kilomita 220 (mil mil 140) daga Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China, will be the first city to host both the Winter and Summer Olympic Games. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies in the National Stadium, known as the Bird's Nest. Other events will be held in the Olympic Green, a park in the Chaoyang District of Beijing. The Winter Games will be held in the Zhangjiakou competition zone, about 220 kilometers (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Murar tsuntsaye, ko kuma avian influenza, na iya kama duka tsuntsaye da dabbobi masu shayarwa. An ba da rahoton samun matsalan kasa da dubu guda a jikin mutane, amma wasu daga ciki sun kasance masu tsanani. Yawancin wadanda su ka jibanci lamarin masu aikin kiwon kaji ne, amma kuma akwai hadari ga masu lura da tsuntsaye.
mt: Bird flu, or avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. It has been reported in over 100 people, but some of these have been mild. Most of those affected are poultry workers, but there is also concern for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikings sun yi amfani da mashigan ruwa na Rasha don kaiwa tekun Black Sea da Tekun Caspian. Har yanzu ana iya amfani da sassa na waɗannan hanyoyi. Binciki yiwuwar samun izini na musamman, koda yake zai yi wahalar samuwa. Madatsar ruwa ta Tekun Baltic ta haɗe da Tekun Arctic zuwa Kogin Baltic, ta cikin Tabkin Onega, Tabkin Ladoga da a Saint Petersburg, yawanci ta ƙoramu ko tafkuna. Har ila yau, Lake Onega yana haɗi da Volga, saboda haka zuwa daga Tekun Caspian ta hanyar Rasha har yanzu yana yiwuwa.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian rivers to sail the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. These routes are still in use. The study of the possibility of obtaining special permits, however, will be difficult. The Baltic Sea Canal connects the Baltic Sea to the Arctic Ocean through the Gulf of Finland, Lake Ladoga, Lake Onega, and Saint Petersburg, usually through canals or lakes. At present, Lake Onega connects to the Volga, so it is still possible to sail from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Wurin bincike na jami’an shige da fice yawanci shi ne wurin tsayawar farko yayin sauka daga jirgin sama, jirgin ruwa, ko kuma wani abin hawa. A wasu jiragen kasa masu duban kan iyaka ana gudanar da bincike ne a yayin da jirgin ke tafiya kuma lallai ne ya zama kana da Katin Shaida lokacin da za ka shiga daya daga cikin irin wadannan jiragen. A jirgin mai bacci na dare, mai gudanarwa na iya karban fasfo domin kada a dameka yayinda kake bacci.
mt: The site of the investigation is usually the first stop after disembarking from an aircraft, boat, or other conveyance. In some land border crossings, an investigation is conducted while the vehicle is in transit and a customs officer may be required to accompany the vehicle through the border. At night, a night watchman may be required to accompany the vehicle through the border.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Garin Singapore gari ne da akasari ya ke da tsaro ingantacce kuma da saukin ganewa, kuma ka na iya siyen komai daga saukarka a kasar. Amma ana sanya ku a cikin “manyan yankuna masu tsaka-tsakin” kawai 'yan digiri kaɗan arewacin kerjin za ku buƙaci ma'amala da zafin rana (koyaushe) da rana mai ƙarfi (lokacin da sama ta bayyana, mafi wuya).
mt: Singapore is a safe and clean city, and you can feel safe walking around the city. But you are only allowed in the "safe areas" near the city center, so you will need to deal with the heat (usually) and humidity (when it rains).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Kayan ciye-ciyen Jamusawa akwai kyau, kuma a Bavaria, suna da daɗin gaske da mabambanta, irin na maƙwabciyarsu ta kudanci, Austria. Abincin 'ya'yan itace sun zama ruwan dare, ta yin abinci da tufa a tsawon shekara, da kuma cherries da plums da ke bayyana lokacin bazara. Yawancin kayayyaki da aka dafa da Jamusanci suma suna da alamomin almara, ƙwaya, da sauran ƙwayoyin itace. Mashahurin wainar ba da daɗewa ba haɗe biyu tare da kofi mai ƙarfi. Idan kuna son ɗan ƙaramin abincimai ɗanɗano, gwada abin da ya dogara da yankin da ake kira Berliner, Pfannkuchen ko Krapfen.
mt: German cuisine is good, and in Bavaria, it is particularly hearty and full of morsels, like its southern neighbor, Austria. The fruit of the season is in full swing, with food and drink enjoyed throughout the year, and cherries and plums announcing the summer. Most of the ingredients used in German cooking are also full of mystery, bacteria, and other microorganisms. The famous doughnut is paired with a strong coffee. If you want a small snack, try the Berliner, Pfannkuchen, or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Idan kana son kallon duniya a araha, saboda bukatun dole, salon rayuwa ko kalubale, akwai wasu hanyoyin yin hakan. A takaice, sun faɗi cikin ɓangarori biyu: Ko a yi aiki a yayin tafiya ko kuma takaita kashe kuɗi. Wannan bayani ta mayar da hankali a na ƙarshen. Ga waɗanda za su iya sadaukar da kasancewa a wurin da su ke jin dadin zama, lokacinsu da hasashen rage kudaden da su ke kashewa sosai zai sa su iya shirya tafiya wadda ba zata ci kudi sosai ba. Shawarwar tana daukar cewa matafiya ba sa sata, wuce iyaka, yin mu’amala a haramtacciyar kasuwa, roƙo, ko kuma yin amfani da wasu mutane don ribar kan su.
mt: If you want to see the world, because of the need, lifestyle or challenges, there are two ways to do this: either work while traveling or save money. This article focuses on the latter. For those who can afford to stay where they enjoy being, their time and the hope of reducing their spending so much that they can plan a trip without spending much money. The advice assumes that travelers do not steal, cross borders, engage in illegal trade, beg, or use other people to pay for them.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Yankin tsakanin Point Marion da Fairmont na gabatar da mafi kyawun yanayin tuƙi a kan babbar hanyar Buffalo-Pittsburgh, yana wucewa ta kowane yanki mai zaman kansa da baya. Idan har ba ka saba da tuki a titunan kasar ba, to ka tattara hankalinka a kanka: kana mai hankalta da tukin da nutsuwa a titin tare da kaucewa tukin gaggawa da daga hankali. Alamomin kayyade gudun ababen hawa sun yi karanci a nan fiye da a wuraren da ke baya - anfi samun wadanda ba sa wuce mph 35-40 (56-64 km/h) - biyayya ga alamomin na da mahimmanci maimakon rashin yi musu biyayya. Abin ban mamaki, ko da yake, sabis ɗin wayar hannu ya fi ƙarfi a nan fiye da sauran hanyoyin da yawa, misali. Daji na Pennsylvania.
mt: The area between Point Marion and Fairmont offers the best driving conditions on the main Buffalo-Pittsburgh route, passing through every open and unincorporated area. If you're not used to driving in the United States, you're likely to be distracted by speeding and aggressive driving. Speeding and aggressive driving are less common here than in other areas - you're likely to encounter those who don't exceed mph 35-40 (56-64 km/h) - pay attention to warnings instead of ignoring them. Interestingly, however, cell phone service is stronger here than on many other routes, for example. Pennsylvania's forests.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Shigarwar canyon (ko: Canyoneering) shi ne shigarwar ƙasan ramin canyon, wanda yake ko bussashe ko a cike da ruwa. Canyoning ya haɗu da abubuwa daga iyo, hawa da tsalle - amma yana buƙatar ɗan horo kaɗan ko siffar jiki don farawa (idan aka kwatanta da hawan dutse, wasan ruwa ko tseren kankara, misali).
mt: Caving (or spelunking) is the exploration of cave systems. Caving involves elements of caving, climbing, and swimming - but requires some physical training to start (if compared to rock climbing, water sports, or mountain biking, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Shiga cikin motarka sannan ka kama doguwar hanyar tafiya yana da wani shauƙi na jin dadi kawai cikinsa. Ba kaman manyan motoci ba, maiyiwuwa kafi sabawa da tuka motar ka kuma kasan iyakokinta. Kafa tenti a kaddara na musamman ko kuma cikin gari na iya jawo hankalin jama’a cikin sauki wanda ba’a so. A takaice, yin amfani da motarka wata babbar hanya ce zuwa tafiya a kan hanya amma ba ko wace lokaci ba hanya ce na “zango”. Kwanan daji a mota ya fi dadi idan kana amfani da samfurin manyan motoci irinsu SUV, Sedan ko Station Wagon, wadanda ke da kujeru da ake iya kwantar da su.
mt: Getting into a car and driving on a road is a simple matter of common sense.  Not all cars are big, heavy, and dangerous to other people.  A tent in a special trailer or in a city can attract the attention of the public safely.  In general, using a car is a good way to travel on a road but not a good way to "race".  A forest fire in a car is more dangerous if you use a large car such as an SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon, which can carry a lot of people.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Masuntan ƙabilar Berner su ne suka kafa sabon birnin Casablanca a karni na 10 BCE, kuma Phoenicians, Rumawa, da Merenids sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin tashar jirgin ruwa mai amfani da ake kira Anfa. Yan Portugal sun rushe shi sannan suka sake gina shi a karkashin sunan Casa Branca, amma suka watsar da shi bayan wata girgizar kasa a 1755. Sarkin na Morocco ya sake gina garin kamar Daru l-Badya kuma 'yan kasuwar Sifen ne suka ba shi suna Casablanca wanda ya kafa cibiyoyin kasuwanci a can. Casablanca yana ɗaya daga cikin wurare da ba a sha’awar siyayya a cikinsu a fadin Morocco. A kusa da tsohuwar Madina yana da sauƙin samun wuraren sayar da kayan gargajiya na Moroccan, irin su tagines, tukwane, kayan fata, hookahs, da gwanayen gwal iri-iri, amma duka na masu yawon bude ido ne.
mt: 10th century BCE, the Berber tribe of the Beni Amer founded the new city of Casablanca, and the Phoenicians, Romans, and Merenids used it as a port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, but abandoned it after a major earthquake in 1755. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt it as Daru l-Badya and the Chinese merchants gave it the name Casablanca which established trading centers there. Casablanca is one of the few places in Morocco where you can find authentic Moroccan souks. Near the old Medina there is easy access to markets selling traditional Moroccan goods such as tagines, couscous, fata, hookahs, and various types of gourds, but all are touristy.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

Yan Portugal sun rushe shi sannan suka sake gina shi a karkashin sunan Casa Branca, amma suka watsar da shi bayan wata girgizar kasa a 1755. Sarkin na Morocco ya sake gina garin kamar Daru l-Badya kuma 'yan kasuwar Sifen ne suka ba shi suna Casablanca wanda ya kafa cibiyoyin kasuwanci a can. src: Ta gefen arewa mai saukin shiga nan ne Birnin Sintra ya ke wanda ya shahara ga yan kasashen waje bayan da Lord Byron ya bada kayatattun labaran kyawonta. Scotturb Bus 403 na yin tafiya sosai zuwa Sintra, tare da dakatawa a Cabo da Roca. Hakanan zuwa arewa ziyarci babban Wuri Mai Tsarki na Uwargidanmu Fatima (Shrine), wuri ne na shahararrun bayyanar Marian a duniya.
mt: Ƙasar Sintra, wanda aka fi sani ga wadanda ke cikin kasashen waje bayan da Lord Byron ya bada kayatattun labaran kyawunta, yana da tafiya zuwa Sintra, tare da dakatawa a Cabo da Roca. Hakanan zuwa arewa ziyarci babban Wuri Mai Tsarki na Uwargidanmu Fatima (Shrine), wuri ne na shahararrun bayyanar Marian a duniya.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: A 1994, yankin bagarencin Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh na Azerbaijan ta ja yaki da Azeris. Tare da taimakon Armenia, an kafa wata sabuwar jamhuriya. Ko da yake, babu wata daga cikin kasashen duniya da suka kafu - hatta ita Armenian kanta - ta amince da wanzuwar kasar/jamhuriyar. Muhawarar diflomasiya akan yankin ta cigaba da dagula dangantaka tsakanin Armenia da Azerbaijan.
mt: 1994, the Armenian enclave of Nagorno-Karabakh in Azerbaijan was at war with Azeris. With the help of Armenia, a new republic was formed. However, none of the countries in the world have recognized the existence of the country/republic - not even Armenia itself - the diplomatic talks on the region continue to drag on the relationship between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Daya daga manufofin masun karfi a Charlotte, North Carolina, ita ce cewa tana da wadataccen zaɓi mai inganci na iyalai. Mazauna daga waɗansu wuraren yawanci kan ambaci zumuncin iyalai a matsayin babban dalilin komawa wurin, kuma sau da yawa maziyarta kan ji daɗin birnin cikin sauƙi zagaye da yara. A shekaru 20 da suka wuce, yawan abokantakar yara a babban garin Charlotte ya karu sosai. Iyalai a garin Charlotte ba su cika amfani da motocin haya ba, amma su kan yi amfani da su a wasu lokutan. Akwai ƙarin don samun fasinjoji sama da 2, don haka wannan zaɓin na iya tsada fiye da yadda ake buƙata.
mt: One of the city's most attractive features is its family-friendly atmosphere. Residents from both areas often cite the city's easy access to children's activities as a major reason for moving there. In the last 20 years, the number of child-friendly activities in downtown Charlotte has increased dramatically. Families in Charlotte don't use car seats, but they do use them sometimes. There are also more than 2, so this option may be cheaper than you need.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Kafin Spanish ta zo a cikin ƙarni na 16, arewacin Chile yana ƙarƙashin mulkin Inca yayin da 'yan asalin Araucanians (Mapuche) suke zaune a tsakiya da kudancin Chile. Mapuche suma suna daga cikin kungiyoyin asalin Amurkawa masu cin gashin kai na baya, waɗanda ba su cika bin dokar mulkin Spanish ba har sai bayan Chileancin Chile. Kodayake Chile ta ayyana yanci kai a 1810 (a lokacin yaƙe-yaƙen Napoleonic wanda ya bar Spain ba tare da gwamnatin tsakiya mai aiki ba har tsawon shekaru), ba a sami nasarar cin nasara akan Spanish ɗin ba sai 1818.
mt: Before Spain arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the Araucanians (Mapuche) lived in the center and south. The Mapuche were also one of the original American peoples to resist Spanish rule until the end of the Chilean War of Independence in 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, wanda ke nufin Filaye Biyar, ya ƙunshi ƙananan karkara biyar na bakin teku na Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza da Monterosso waɗanda ke cikin yankin Liguria na Italiya. Su na cikin jerin sunayen wuraren tarihi na duniya na UNESCO. A ƙarni da yawa, mutane sun gina farfajiyoyi a kan tudu mai wahala, Tsayayyar wuri mai faɗi zuwa ƙwanƙolin dutsen da ke ƙetare tekun. Babban abin sha’awar shine rashin alama kururu ta zamanantarwa. Hanyoyi, jiragen kasa da kwale-kwale na sadar da kauyukan amma kuma motoci ba za su iya kaiwa can daga waje ba.
mt: The Cinque Terre, meaning Five Lands, consists of five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, located in the Liguria region of Italy. They are listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. In the past, people built houses on steep cliffs, overlooking the sea. The main attraction is the lack of modern development. Access is by footpaths, trains and boats but cars cannot reach them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Abin da ya fi haddasa hadura a lokacin hunturu shi ne kananan hanyoyi da hanyoyin da mutane ke bi a gefen titi musamman ma matattakala. Mafi karanci kana bukatar takalmi wanda ke da kasansa mai kwari. Takalman lokacin zafi yawanci su na sullubewa a kan kankara ko dusarta hatta wasu takalman na hunturu su na gazawa. Ya kamata tsarin ya sami isasshen zurfi, 5 mm (inci 1/5) ko fiye, kuma kayan aikin su kasance masu taushi a yanayin sanyi. Wasu takalman suna da ƙusoshi a ƙasansu kuma akwai abin ƙari mai ƙusoshi don yanayin santsi, wanda ya dace da yawancin takalma, domin dugadugai ko dugadugai da tafin kafa. Ya kamata wasu bayan tafin kafan takalma su yi kasa ko faɗi. Ana watsa yashi, tsakuwa ko gishiri (Calcium Chloride) a kan tituna ko hanyoyi don inganta kama ƙasa.

ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Tsibirin Cook tsibiri ce wanda ba ta da alaka tare da New Zealand, wanda ke cikin Polynesia, a tsakiyar Tekun Pacific ta Kudu. Wani rukunin tsibirai ne da ke da tsibirai 15 da suke warwatse a faɗin kilomitar teku miliyan 2.2 km2. Da yankin lokaci iri daya da na Hawaii, wasu lokuta a kan ɗauki tsibiran a matsayin “Hawaii ta can ƙasa”. Kodayake ƙarami ne, yana tunatar da wasu tsoffin maziyarta na Hawaii kafin samin ƙasa ba tare da duk manyan otal na ‘yan yawon shakatawa da kuma sauran cigaba. Tsibiran Cook ba su da wasu birane amma suna da tsibirai daban-daban har 15. Manyan cikinsu su ne Rarotonga da Aitutaki.
mt: Cook Islands is an island country in the South Pacific Ocean, in free association with New Zealand. It is a self-governing parliamentary democracy, and in free association with New Zealand. The 15 islands in this group have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands'15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

Kodayake ƙarami ne, yana tunatar da wasu tsoffin maziyarta na Hawaii kafin samin ƙasa ba tare da duk manyan otal na ‘yan yawon shakatawa da kuma sauran cigaba. Tsibiran Cook ba su da wasu birane amma suna da tsibirai daban-daban har 15. Manyan cikinsu su ne Rarotonga da Aitutaki.

ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Dole ne a bayar da izinin lokaci kafin. Dole ne ya zama na kana da izinin kasancewa a Sirena tun farkon dare har wayewar gari. Sirena ne tashar gandun daji da ke samar da masaukin kwana da abinci mai zafi tare da kwanan sansani. La Leona, San Pedrillo, da Los Patos na samar da sansani ne kawai ba tare da abinci ba. Mai yiwuwa ne samun izinin wurin shakatawa kai tsaye daga Tashar Gandun Daji a Puerto Jiménez, amma ba su karbar katunan kuɗi. Hukumar Kula da Wurin Shaƙatawar (MINAE) ba ta bayar da izinin shiga na sama da wata ɗaya kafin lokacin isowa da ake tsammani. CafeNet El Sol suna ba da sabis na ajiyar kuɗi don ƙimar US $ 30, ko $ 10 don wucewar kwana ɗaya; cikakkun bayanai akan shafin Corcovado.
mt: 1. It is required to have permission before. It is required to be in Sirena from the early morning until the end of the town. Sirena is the forest station that provides dinner and hot food with the current menu. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only provide the menu without food. It is possible to get permission for the tour directly from the Forest Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not receive the entrance fee. MINAE does not provide permission for entry more than one day before the expected departure time. CafeNet El Sol provides a money service for a US $ 30, or $ 10 for a one-night stay; detailed information on the Corcovado website.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Daukar jaka a baya don ski: Ana kiran wannan shirin backcountry ski, yawon wasan dusar kankara ko tafiyan wasan dusar kankara. Yana da alaƙa da amma yawanci ba sa ƙunshi salon tsalle-tsalle ko hawa dutse, na ƙarshen waɗanda aka yi a cikin ƙasa mai tsayi kuma suna buƙatar madaukakan skis da takalma. Yi la’akari da hanyar wasan dussar kankara tamkar hanyar tafiya. A cikin yanayi mai kyau zaku iya yin tafiya mai nisa fiye da takawa da ƙafa – amma ba kasafai ake samun saurin gudu kan kankara ba tare da jakar goyawa a baya mai nauyi a kan hanyar da aka share ƙanƙara.
mt: Backcountry skiing is also called off-piste or backcountry skiing. It is related to but does not usually include alpine or downhill skiing, which is done on ski slopes that are groomed and have ski lifts. In good weather, you can ski long distances without poles or a heavy backpack – but not necessarily at high speed without a ski backpack.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Kaɗuwar sake-shiga za ta yi saurin zuwa kafin kaɗuwar al’adu (akwai karancin lokaci na hutun amarci), ya dade, kuma izai ya zama da tsanani sosai. Matafiya waɗanda ke da sauƙin sauƙaƙawa zuwa sabon al'adun a wasu lokuta suna da matukar wahalar gyara al'adunsu na asali. Lokacin dawowa gida bayan zama a ƙasashen waje, kun saba da sabon al'adun kuma kun rasa wasu al'adunku daga al'adunku na gida. Kasancewa a kasar waje a karo na farko, na sa matafiya yin hakuri da nuna fahimta, saboda sanin cewa matafiya na bukatar hakan domin su saba da wajen. Ba lallai Mutane su fahimci cewa yin haƙuri da nuna fahimta wajibi ne ga matafiya da ke kokarin komawa gida.
mt: 1. The re-entry will be gradual before the re-acclimatization (there is a shortage of time for acclimatization), it will continue, and it will be very difficult. Travelers who have easy access to new cultures in other cases have a great difficulty in repairing their original cultures. Returning home after staying abroad, you will have a new culture and you will lose some of your home cultures. Being abroad for the first time, travelers will be polite and understanding, because they know that travelers need this to be with them. People do not understand that being polite and understanding is a duty for travelers who are trying to return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Mosse (wandanda kuma aka sani da elk) ba a san su da faɗa ba, amma za su kare kansu idan suka zaci ana yi musu barazana. Idan mutane basu ga hatsin suna da hatsarin gaske ba, suna iya kusantowa kusa dasu kuma su jefa kansu cikin hadari.
mt: The (also known as elk) are not known to be aggressive, but they will defend themselves if threatened. If people do not approach them, they are harmless and can be walked near them and they will flee into the woods.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Mosse (wandanda kuma aka sani da elk) ba a san su da faɗa ba, amma za su kare kansu idan suka zaci ana yi musu barazana. Idan mutane basu ga hatsin suna da hatsarin gaske ba, suna iya kusantowa kusa dasu kuma su jefa kansu cikin hadari.

src: A zafin rana na yini, matafiya na iya ganin abubuwa masu kamanin ruwa daga nesa (ko wasu abubuwa dabam). Waɗannan kan iya zama masu haɗari idan matafiyin ya bi hasken, yana hasarar kuzari da ragowar ruwa a banza. Ko da mafi zafin hamada na iya zama da sanyi a cikin dare. Yanayin sanyin jiki sosai wato Hypothermia babban haɗari ne idan ba tare da sutura mai bada ɗumi ba.
mt: In the evening, passengers may see water-like objects in the distance (or other objects). These may be hazardous if passengers follow the light, damaging the hull and flooding the ship. Even the most arid desert can be cold at night. Hypothermia is a major hazard if not wearing proper insulation.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Jamhuriyar Dominican (Da Sifaniyanci: República Dominicana) ƙasa ce da ke yankin Caribbean da ta kunshi rabin gabashin tsibirin Hispaniola, wanda su ka yi tarayya da kasar Haiti a cikinsaa Bayan gaɓar teku masu farin yashi da yanayin mai tsaunuka, a ƙasar ce ake da birnin Turai mafi tsufa a yankin Americas, wanda yanzu ya ke ɓangaren Santo Domingo. Taínos da Caribes su suka fara zama a tsibirin. Caribes mutane ne masu magana da harshen Arawakan waɗanda suka isa kusan 10,000 BCE. Cikin shekaru kaɗan bayan zuwan Turawa masu yawon bincike, yawan jama’ar Tainos ya ragu matuka sakamakon mayakan sifaniyawa yan mulkin mallakaa Dangane da Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) tsakanin 1492 da 1498 masu nasara daga Spain sun kashe kusan Taínos 100,000.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a country in the Caribbean, occupying the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, sharing the western third with Haiti. After the Spanish conquest, the island was first inhabited by the indigenous Taíno people, who were later replaced by the Caribs. The Taíno were an Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BCE. In the years immediately following the arrival of the Spanish conquistadors, the population of the island fell from about 250,000 to 500,000 to about 500 by 1530. The island was first inhabited by the indigenous Taíno people, who were later replaced by the Caribs. The Taíno were an Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BCE. In the years immediately following the arrival of the Spanish conquistadors, the population of the island fell from about 250,000 to 500,000 to about 500 by 1530.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Wasannin dusar kankara na gangaren tudu, wanda ya kunshi gudun ƙanƙara da allon zarmiya, sanannun wasanni ne da suka hada da surmiyowa ta kan yankin da dusar ƙanƙara ta rufe da takalman gudun ƙanƙara ko allon zarmiya a ɗaure da kafafunka. Wasa kan dusar kankara wasa ne na masu tafiye-tafiye da masun goyon baya da yawa, a wasu lokatai an san shi da “ski bums,” suna tsara dukkan hutu ga wasa kan dusan kankara a wani wuri na musamman. Wasan dusar kankara ya dade da farawa -- an samu zanen kogo mai nuna masu wasan tun shakarar 5000 BC! Tseren kankara na tsauni an fara shi tun wajajen karni na 17 kuma a shekarar 1861 aka fara gina kulob din masu wannan tsere wanda yan kasar Norway su ka kafa a kasar Australiya.
mt: Downhill skiing, which involves sliding down a slope on skis, is a popular sport that includes both recreational and competitive forms. Some competitions are held on a specially designed course with jumps and moguls. Downhill skiing is a sport for beginners and experts alike, and in some cases is known as "ski bums," where all the action is focused on a particular area. Downhill skiing has been depicted in art as early as 5000 BC! Alpine skiing was first practiced in the late 17th century and in 1861 the first ski club was founded in Norway.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Tsibiran Gabashin Afirka suna cikin Tekun India kusa da gaɓar gabashin Afirka. Madagascar mafi girma ce, kuma nahiyar kanta ce idan an zo gefen dabbobin daji. Yawancin ƙananan tsibirai ƙasashe ne masu zaman kansu, ko kuma suna da alaƙa da Faransa, kuma sanannu ne wuraren shakatawa na rairayin bakin teku. Larabawa kuma sun shigo da Musulunci zuwa kasashe kuma ya yi tasiri sosai Comoros da Mayotte. Tasirin Turai da mulkin mallaka ya fara a cikin karni na 15, kamar yadda mai yawon bincike ɗan ƙasar Ƙortugal Vasco da Gama ya gano Hanyar Cape daga Turai zuwa India.
mt: The East African islands lie off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and the continent's own island. Most of the smaller islands are independent states, or are associated with France, and are known for their beaches. Islam also came to the countries and had a great influence on Comoros and Mayotte. The influence of Europe and colonial rule began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Tsibiran Gabashin Afirka suna cikin Tekun India kusa da gaɓar gabashin Afirka. Madagascar mafi girma ce, kuma nahiyar kanta ce idan an zo gefen dabbobin daji. Yawancin ƙananan tsibirai ƙasashe ne masu zaman kansu, ko kuma suna da alaƙa da Faransa, kuma sanannu ne wuraren shakatawa na rairayin bakin teku. Larabawa kuma sun shigo da Musulunci zuwa kasashe kuma ya yi tasiri sosai Comoros da Mayotte. Tasirin Turai da mulkin mallaka ya fara a cikin karni na 15, kamar yadda mai yawon bincike ɗan ƙasar Ƙortugal Vasco da Gama ya gano Hanyar Cape daga Turai zuwa India.
mt: The East African islands lie off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and the continent's own island. Most of the smaller islands are independent states, or are associated with France, and are known for their beaches. Islam also came to the countries and had a great influence on Comoros and Mayotte. The influence of Europe and colonial rule began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Akwai wata al'ada ta kwanan zaune a daren Easter a wani wuri buɗaɗɗe don ganin fitowar rana. Tabbas da akwai bayanai daga koyarwar addinin Kirista kan wannan al’adar, amma dai yana iya kasancewa Shekaru ne gabanin bayyanar Kiristanci. Churchesarin majami'u na gargajiya sau da yawa suna yin Vigil na Easter a daren Asabar a lokacin karshen mako na Ista, tare da ikilisiyoyin galibi suna shiga cikin murna a tsakar dare don bikin tashin Almasihu.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night on Easter Sunday at a certain location to see the sunrise.  There are no reports of this being a Christian practice, but it may be centuries old.  Many traditional churches hold Vigil of Easter on Saturday night at the end of the day, with the congregation often entering into the celebration at the stroke of midnight for the celebration of the Resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador na bukatar cewa sai ‘yan kasar Cuba sun samu wasikar gayyata kafin shiga Ecuador ta filayen jiragen sama na ƙasa da ƙasa ko kuma wuraren shiga na kan iyaka. Dole ne Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen Ecuador, ta halasta sahihancin wannan wasiƙa, kuma ta cika wasu buƙatu. Wadannan ka’idoji an samar da su domin tsara yadda hijira tsakanin kasashen za ta rika gudana. Yan kasan Cuba da ke da green card na US su ziyarci Ecuadorian Consulate domin karban kebewa daga wannan umurni. Dole takardar shigar ka ta zama karbabbe na akalla wata 6 bayan ainihin ranar tafiyar ka. Ana bukatar tiketin tafiyar shiga da fita domin tabbatar da yawan ranakun da zaka zauna a kasar.
mt: Ecuador is requesting that Cuban nationals receive a visa before entering Ecuadorian airspace or border entry points. The Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs must approve this visa, and must meet other requirements. These guidelines were created to regulate immigration between countries. Cuban nationals with green cards in the US must visit the Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain a waiver from this order. A passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the date of entry. A visa is required for entry and exit to confirm the number of days you will stay in the country.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
