src: Tabarau na iya fin araha a kasashen waje musamman kasashe matalauta inda biyan ma’aikata ke da rahusa. Yi la'akari da samun gwajin ido a gida, musamman idan yana ƙarkashin inshora, sannan taho da takardar maganin don cike shi a wani wuri. Frames shahararrun kuma masu tsada da ake samu a wuraren na iya samun matsaloli guda biyu, wasu basu da kwari kuma na hakikar da aka shigo da su daga waje na da tsada fiye da na gida.
mt: The frame is a popular and reliable model that can be found in many countries, especially in developing countries where employee pay is low. Consider getting a test at home, especially if it is under warranty, then send the test kit to a location. Frames are also known to have two problems, some do not have a warranty and those that do have been imported from outside the country have more problems than those made at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Kuɗin Falklands a hukumance shi ne fam na Falkland (FKP) wanda aka saita darajar sa daidai da na fam ɗaya na Ingila (GBP). Ana iya musayar kudi a banki daya kaɗai da ke tsibiran wanda ke ketaren Stanley daga shagon FIC West. Ana karbar fam din Birtaniya kusan a ko’ina a tsibirin da cibiyar hada hadar kudi ta Stanley haka ita ma dalar amurka yawanci ana karbar ta. A kan iyakar tsibirin da ke kusa da alama ba za a karɓa ba, kodayake ana iya karɓar kuɗin Birtaniya da Amurka; bincika tare da masu shi don sanin menene hanyar biyan kuɗi da za a karɓa. Abu ne mawuyaci ka sami canjin kudin Falklands idan ka bar tsibirin, don haka kana bukatar canzar kudinka kafin ka bar tsibirin.
mt: The Falkland Islands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged at par with the pound sterling (GBP). Money can be exchanged at only one bank on the island, located in Stanley from the FIC West. British pounds are accepted almost everywhere on the island and the Stanley currency exchange center also accepts US dollars. On the border of the island near the border, you cannot accept Falkland pounds, but you can accept British pounds and US dollars; check with the seller to see what payment method you can accept. It is difficult to change your Falkland pounds when you leave the island, so you need to change your currency before you leave the island.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Yawancin dakunan bautar na da bukukuwan shekara-shekara da kan fara daga ƙarshen Nuwamba zuwa Tsakiyar Mayu, bambancin ranakun sun danganta da irin jerin kidayar watanni a shekarar da kowane ɗakin bauta ke aiki da ita. Yawancin bukukuwan haikalin ana yin su ne a matsayin ɓangare na ranar tunawa da haikalin ko bikin ranar haihuwar allahntaka ko wani babban taron da ke hade da haikalin. Bukukuwan ibada na Kerala suna da ban sha'awa don gani, tare da jerin gwanon giwaye da aka kawata, ƙungiyar makaɗa ta haikali da sauran shagalin.
mt: Most temples have annual festivals that begin from late November to mid-May, depending on the annual calendar of the temple. Most temple festivals are held as part of the temple's anniversary or birthday celebration of the presiding deity or as part of a major festival or event associated with the temple. Kerala temple festivals are famous for their visual appeal, with a variety of colorful floral decorations, temple processions and other rituals.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Sananniyar hanya ta tashi a ajin farko ko ajin kasuwanci na jirgin sama shine ka fito da damin kudi domin gata (ko, mafi kyau tukuna, ka sanya kamfaninka su yi maka). Sai dai hakan ba ya samuwa cikin sauƙi: a matsayin ƙa’idar ana tsammanin ka biya ribi hudu na ajin marasa karfi kuma ribi goma sha daya na ajin masu wadataa A gabaɗaya, babu ma'ana a cikin koda neman ragi don kasuwanci ko kujerun ajin farko a kan jiragen sama kai tsaye daga A zuwa B. Kamfanonin jiragen sama sun sani sarai cewa akwai wasu rukuni na rukuni na wasiƙa waɗanda suke shirye su biya dala mafi girma don alfarmar zuwa wani wuri cikin sauri da jin daɗi, kuma su biya hakan.
mt: 1st class or commercial flight priority is to get you to your destination as quickly and comfortably as possible. Airlines know that there are certain classes of passengers who are willing to pay thousands of dollars for a speedy and pleasant trip, and they will pay that.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Jiragen sama kamar su Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways da Turkish Airlines sun kara fadada ayyukansu zuwa Afirka, kuma suna ba da sadarwa zuwa manyan biranen Afirka da dama a farashi mai rahusa fiye da sauran kamfanonin jiragen sama na Turai. Kamfanin Jiragen Saman Turkiya yana tashi zuwa wurare 39 a cikin kasashen Afirka 30 daga shekarar 2014. Idan kuna da ƙarin lokacin tafiya, ku duba ku ga yadda jimlar farashinku na zuwa Afirka ya in an kwatanta farashin zagayen-duniya ya ke. Kar a manta da kara a cikin karin farashin karin visa, harajin tashi, jigilar kasa, da sauransu. don dukkanin wuraren da ke wajen Afirka.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have increased their services to Africa, and are offering connections to major African cities at low fares compared to other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in Africa from 2014. If you have more time, check how the total cost of your trip to Africa compares to the world average fare. Also note the extra cost of visa, departure tax, and other fees. for all destinations within Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Siyan abinci a cikin manyan shaguna shine galibi hanya mafi arha don ciyarwa. Ba tare da damar dafa abinci ba, zaɓuɓɓuka suna iyakance ga abincin da aka shirya. Yawancin manyan kantuna su na dada samun sassa na kayan abincin ci kai tsaye daban daban. Wasu ma kan samar da na’urar dumama abinci. A wasu ƙasashe ko nau'ikan shagunan saida akwai aƙalla ɗakin cin abinci na kantin sayar da yanar gizon, galibi marassa tushe ne wanda yake da tsada.
mt: Buying food in bulk is usually the cheapest way to stock up. Without the ability to cook, options are limited to prepared foods. Most major chains offer a variety of pre-made meals. Some also offer a meal assembly service. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least a deli counter, usually self-service, where customers can buy pre-made sandwiches, salads, and other foods.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Nau'o'in Faransanci waɗanda ake magana dasu a Belgium da Switzerland sun ɗan bambanta da Faransancin da ake magana dasu a Faransa, kodayake suna kama da juna don fahimtar juna. Musamman, tsarin kirgar lambobi a wajen wadanda ke yaren faransanci na kasar Belgium ya na da banbanci da yaren faransanci da ake magana da shi a Faransa,kuma yadda ake furta wasu kalmomin ya sha bambam. Duk da haka, duka’yan Belgium masu magana da harshen Faransanci kuma da ‘yan Swiss za su zamana sun koyi karbabben Faransanci a makaranta, saboda su iya fahimtarka ko da ka yi amfani da tsarin rubuta lambobi na karɓaɓɓen Faransanci.
mt: The French dialects spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ from the French spoken in France, though they are mutually intelligible. Especially, the numbering system in front of Belgian French speakers differs from the French spoken in France, and the way some words are pronounced. However, both Belgian French speakers and Swiss speakers will learn standard French in school, because they can understand it even if you use the numbering system of standard French.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Kamfanonin jiragen sama kaɗan ne kawai ke ba da kudin tafiya makoki, waɗanda ke ɗan rage farashin tafiya na jana'iza na ƙarshe. Kamfanonin zirga-zirgar jiragen sama da ke samar da wannan sun haɗa da Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa don jiragen da ke tashi daga Amurka ko Canada, da kuma WestJet. A ko wace hali, dole sai ku siya tiketi ta afami da waya kai tsaye daga kamfanin jirgin saman.
mt: Only a few airlines offer the option of booking a coffin, which reduces the cost of the final flight. Airlines that offer this service include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In any case, you must buy a ticket from the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

Kamfanonin zirga-zirgar jiragen sama da ke samar da wannan sun haɗa da Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa don jiragen da ke tashi daga Amurka ko Canada, da kuma WestJet. A ko wace hali, dole sai ku siya tiketi ta afami da waya kai tsaye daga kamfanin jirgin saman.
mt: Only a few airlines offer the option of booking a coffin, which reduces the cost of the final flight. Airlines that offer this service include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In any case, you must buy a ticket from the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Amfani da manhajar GPS da ke nuna inda kake a kan wayar ka ta hannu zai iya kasancewa hanya mafi sauki da daɗin gane inda kake yayin da ka fita daga ƙasar ku. Zai iya adana kuɗi akan siyan sabbin taswira don GPS, ko na'urar GPS mai zaman kanta ko yin haya daga kamfanin haya na mota. Idan baka da kudin hawa yanar gizo a wayarka, ko ka yi nisa da network, ayyukansu zai iya zama takaitacce ko baya samuwa.
mt: Using a GPS map on your phone can be the safest and easiest way to know where you are when you leave the country. It can save you money on buying new maps for GPS, or a standalone GPS unit, or by pirating the car navigation company. If you don't have internet access on your phone, or you're out of range of a network, their service may be spotty or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Ganin wuraren da kuma dabbobin daji na Galapagos zai fi kyau a cikin kwalekwale, yadda Charles Darwin ya yi a 1835. Fiye da tekuna guda 60 suna tafiya cikin ruwan Galapagos - girman su daga fasinjoji 8 zuwa 100. Yawancin mutane suna yin ajiyar wurin su sosai kafin lokaci (saboda galibin kwale-kwalen cike suke a lokacin babban kaka). A tabbatar da cewa wakili wanda aka bi ta hannunsa gwanin Galapagos ne wanda yake da masaniya kan ire-iren jiragen ruwa. Wannan zai tabbatar da cewa ainihi ra’ayinka da/ko gazawarka sun dace da jirgin ruwan da ya fi dacewa da su.
mt: 60+ islands make up the Galapagos archipelago - from 8 to 100 miles in size. Most people visit during the dry season (most of the islands are uninhabited). To ensure you're seeing the right islands, you'll want to make sure you're on a boat with a guide who knows the waters. This will ensure that your expectations and/or desires match the boat that's best for you.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Gidajen caca yawanci suna yin ƙoƙari da yawa don haɓaka lokaci da kuɗin da baƙi suka kashe. Tagogi da agogo galibi basa nan, kuma hanyar fita na da wahalar samu. Yawanci suna da abinci, abin sha da kuma nishaɗi na musamman da suke samarwa, domin faranta wa baƙi, don su zauna a wurin. Wasu wuraren suna ba da kayan sha na barasa a gidan. Sai dai kuma, maye toshe tunani, kuma duk ƙwararrun ‘yan caca sun san mahimmancin kasancewa ba cikin maye ba.
mt: Most amusement parks try to increase their attendance and revenue. Lines and queues are often long, and the exit is difficult to find. They often provide food, drinks and special entertainment to attract visitors, to stay at the park. Some parks provide free food to their employees. But also, the experienced employees know the importance of being in the right place at the right time.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Dukkan sunaye, wadanda ke da kalmar Sie a ciki, koda yaushe suna farawa ne da babban harafi, koda a tsakiyar jimla ne. Wannan mahimmiyar hanya ce wajen banbance kalmomin aikatau da kalmomi na abubuwa da ake iya gani. Hakanan yana iya kawo sauƙin karatu, kodayake rubutu yana da ɗan rikitarwa ta hanyar buƙatar gano ko ana amfani da fi'ili ko sifa a cikin sigar tabbatarwa.
mt: All names, which begin with the letter Sie, start with a capital letter. This is an important way to distinguish between proper nouns and common nouns. It also helps with readability, although writing has a risk of confusion by requiring the reader to determine whether the word is a proper noun or a common noun.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: A sassa da yawa na duniya, sallama alama ce ta abokantaka, mai nuna “sannu.” Sai dai kuma, a Malaysiya, aƙalla a tsakanin ‘yan kasar da ke yankunan karkara, yana nufin “taho nan.” irin alamar da zaka nuna kankan da babban dan yatsa, wato irin alamar da ake amfani da ita a wasu ƙasashen yamma, amma ana amfani da ita don wannan manufa ne kawai. Hakanan, wani matafiyin dan Burtaniya a Spaniya na iya kuskuren yin ban kwana da ya kunshi tafin hannunsa na kallo mai daga hannun (maimakon wanda ake dagawa hannun) wadda ke nufin barka da zuwa.
mt: In many parts of the world, the peace sign is a symbol of friendship, meaning "stay." But in Malaysia, at least in rural areas, it means "stop." The gesture that would be a big thumbs-up in the West is used only for that purpose. Also, a British tourist in Spain might mistakenly wave goodbye with a hand gesture that includes the middle finger (the one that is not usually used).
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Gilashin kankara ba su da ƙarfi, amma suna gangarowa daga dutsen. Wannan zai haifar da tsagewa, gurabe, wanda gadoji na dusar ƙanƙara ke iya rufe shi. Bango da rufi na kogunan kankara na iya rushewa kuma iya rufe hudoji. A kusuruwar kankarar sai wasu manyan daskararru suka zame, inda suka fadi kasa kuma watakila ma suka barbazu daga kusurwar.
mt: The cracks are not strong, but they are growing from the ground. This can cause fissures, cracks, and the ground can be covered by the cracks. In the cracks, some large rocks may be, where they may have fallen from the ground.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma gari ne na yawon bude ido a Jamhuriyar Demokradiyyar Congo da ke ƙarshen gabas kusa da ƙasar Rwanda. Laka daga dutsen Nyiragongo ta lalata Goma a shekara ta 2002 wanda ya binne yawancin titunan garin, musamman ma tsakiyar garin. Yayinda Goma na da lafiya mai kan gado, a bincika duk wani ziyara a wajen Goma domin gane yanayin yaki da ta ci gaba a yankin North Kivu. Garin kuma shine tushe da zai hau dutsen Nyiragongo tare da wasu daga cikin mafi saukin farashi duwatsun Gorilla a Afirka. Kana iya amfani da boda-boda (taksi na babur) domin zagaya Goma. Farashi na al’ada (na gida) shi ne Franks ɗin Congo 500 ga gajeriyar tafiya.
mt: Goma is a tourist destination in the Democratic Republic of the Congo near the border with Rwanda. Lava from the Nyiragongo volcano buried much of Goma in 2002, burying much of the town, especially the central part of the town. While Goma is now a safe place to visit, it is advisable to check the situation before any visit to the area to see the progress of the ongoing war in the North Kivu region. Goma is also the starting point to climb the Nyiragongo volcano and to see some of the most endangered gorillas in Africa. You can use boda-bodas (motorcycle taxis) to get around Goma. The usual (local) fare is 500 francs for a short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Duk wani sansani da za a yi Grand Canyon yana bukatar amincewar kasar. An iyakance izini don kare kwazazzabon, kuma ana ba da dama a ranar 1 ta wata, watanni huɗu kafin watan farawa. Don haka, izinin karkara na kowace farawa a watan Mayu zai kasance a ranar 1 ga Janairu. Sarari ga mafi mashahuri yankuna, kamar Bright Angel Campground kusa da makiyaya ta Phantom, tana cika da sakon nema a ranan farko na bude daman neman shiga. Akwai iya adadin yawan izini da aka ajiye domin buƙatu na shiga-ciki da ake samu a tsarin wadanda ya fara zuwa shi zai fara samu.
mt: Any visit to the Grand Canyon requires a permit. Permits are limited to protect the wilderness, and are issued on a first-come, first-served basis four months before the start of the month. Therefore, permits for any start in May will be issued on January 1. Reservations for the most popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch, fill quickly on the first day of opening. There is a limited number of permits available for popular routes that begin with a hike in.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Wasu otal suna da kayan tarihi tun zamanin zinariya na hanyar jirgin kasa da layin teku; kafin yakin duniya na biyu, a cikin karni na 19 ko farkon karni na 20. Waɗannan otaloli sun kasance inda masu arziki da kuma sanannu na yau za su zama, kuma sau da yawa suna da wurin cin abincin dare mai kyau da kuma rayuwar dare. Tsoffin kayan aiki, da rashin sabbin abubuwan more rayuwa, da kuma wasu tsufa ma na daga cikin halayen su. Yayin da galibi suka kasance mallakin jama’a, a wasu lokutan kuma su kan karbi bakoncin shugabannin kasashe da ma wasu manyan mutane masu alfarma. Matafiyi da ke da tarin kudade na iya shirya zagaya duniya, ya rika tsayawa a wurare ya kwana cikin wasu daga dimbin ota-otal.
mt: Some hotels have historical significance as routes of transportation of people and goods, dating back to ancient times. Before World War II, in the 19th or early 20th century, they were often the destination for the wealthy and famous. Tourists and those with deep pockets can plan a world tour, staying in many of the world's most luxurious hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Godiya ga haɗe-haɗen kebur na fiber optic a ƙarƙarshin teku zuwa ga Turai da kuma tauraron ɗan Adam mai yawan faɗi, Greenland yana a haɗe sosai kuma 93% a cikin jam'arsa suna da damar ga haɗin yanar-gizo. Otel dinka ko kuma wanda zai dauki bakoncinka (Idan yana zama a gidan ajiye baki ko kuma a gidansa) zai zama yana da maganadisun intanet na WIFI ko kwamfuta mai intanet kuma dukkan wuraren suna da shagunan intanet. Kamar yadda aka ambata a sama, kodayake kalmar “Eskimo” ya kasance karɓaɓɓiya a cikin Amurka, ana ɗaukar sa mai daɗaɗawa ga yawancin mutanen da ba 'yan Amurka ba da asalin mutanen Arctic, musamman ma Kanada. A yayin da akwai yiwuwar jin kalmar da ‘yan asalin Greenland ke amfani dashi, ya kamata ‘yan waje su guji yin amfani da ita. Mazaunan asali na Greenland kan kira kansu da Inuit a ƙasar Canada da kuma Kalaalleq (jam’i Kalaallit), mutumin Greenland, a Greenland. Laifi, da kuma ƙiyayya game da yan hijira gabaɗaya, kusan ba a sani ba a cikin Greenland. Ko da a cikin garuruwa, babu “yankuna masu kauri.” Wataƙila yanayin sanyi shi ne kaɗai haƙiƙar barazanar da wanda bai shirya ba zai fuskanta. Idan ka ziyarci Greenland a lokutan sanyi (sanyin na karuwa ne idan ka kara gaba ta arewa), yana da muhimmanci a kawo wadatattun sutura. Tsawon kwanakin a lokacin bazara na iya haifar da matsalolin samun isasshen bacci da alaƙar kiwon lafiya. Lokacin zafi, kuma ku lura da sauron yankin ƙasashen Nordic. Duk da cewa ba sa yaɗa wata cuta, amma suna da damuwa.

ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Godiya ga haɗe-haɗen kebur na fiber optic a ƙarƙarshin teku zuwa ga Turai da kuma tauraron ɗan Adam mai yawan faɗi, Greenland yana a haɗe sosai kuma 93% a cikin jam'arsa suna da damar ga haɗin yanar-gizo. Otel dinka ko kuma wanda zai dauki bakoncinka (Idan yana zama a gidan ajiye baki ko kuma a gidansa) zai zama yana da maganadisun intanet na WIFI ko kwamfuta mai intanet kuma dukkan wuraren suna da shagunan intanet. Kamar yadda aka ambata a sama, kodayake kalmar “Eskimo” ya kasance karɓaɓɓiya a cikin Amurka, ana ɗaukar sa mai daɗaɗawa ga yawancin mutanen da ba 'yan Amurka ba da asalin mutanen Arctic, musamman ma Kanada. A yayin da akwai yiwuwar jin kalmar da ‘yan asalin Greenland ke amfani dashi, ya kamata ‘yan waje su guji yin amfani da ita. Mazaunan asali na Greenland kan kira kansu da Inuit a ƙasar Canada da kuma Kalaalleq (jam’i Kalaallit), mutumin Greenland, a Greenland. Laifi, da kuma ƙiyayya game da yan hijira gabaɗaya, kusan ba a sani ba a cikin Greenland. Ko da a cikin garuruwa, babu “yankuna masu kauri.” Wataƙila yanayin sanyi shi ne kaɗai haƙiƙar barazanar da wanda bai shirya ba zai fuskanta. Idan ka ziyarci Greenland a lokutan sanyi (sanyin na karuwa ne idan ka kara gaba ta arewa), yana da muhimmanci a kawo wadatattun sutura. Tsawon kwanakin a lokacin bazara na iya haifar da matsalolin samun isasshen bacci da alaƙar kiwon lafiya. Lokacin zafi, kuma ku lura da sauron yankin ƙasashen Nordic. Duk da cewa ba sa yaɗa wata cuta, amma suna da damuwa.

src: Jardín de la Unión. An gina wannan sarari azaman tashar ƙarfe na ƙarfe na 17 na ƙarni, wanda Templo de San Diego shine kadai gidan da ya tsira. Yanzu yana aiki azaman tsakiyar filin wasa, kuma koyaushe yana da abubuwa da yawa da ke gudana, dare da rana. Akwai gidajen abinci da yawa da ke kewaye da lambu, kuma da yamma a can galibi ana ba da kade kade kyauta daga gazebo ta tsakiya. Callejon del Beso (Alley na Kiss). Falon baranda biyu da santimita 69 kacal suka rabu gida ne na tsohuwar tatsuniyar soyayya. A ‘yan kwabbai kadan wasu yara za su ba ka labarin.
mt: 17th century Union Garden. This was built as the 17th century clock tower, the only building to survive. It now functions as the center of the plaza, and is always full of activity, day and night. There are many restaurants surrounding the fountain, and to the west, free food is often given away from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). The two balconies separated by 69 centimeters were the home of a former love affair. A few young people will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Yin yawo wata aiki ne na waje wanda ya ƙunshi tafiya cikin yanayin halitta, yawancin lokaci kan hanyar yawon. Tattakin rana ya ƙunshi nisan da ba su kai mil daya ba har zuwa nisa masu tsawon da za a iya kaiwa a cikin rana guda. Don tattakin rana guda ta kan sassauƙar hanya ana buƙatar ‘yan shirye-shirye, kuma duk wani mutum mai matsakaiciyar lafiy zai iya jin daɗin su. Iyalai masu kananan yara na iya bukatar ƙarin shirye-shirye, amma shafe rana daya a waje zai yiwu ko da ma tare da jarirai da kananan yara da basu shiga makarantu ba ne.
mt: A day trip is an outdoor activity involving travel to a place outside one's normal environment, usually for the purpose of recreation, but also to attend events such as family reunions, weddings and graduations, or to get away from work for a short period of time. A day trip usually covers a distance of less than 100 miles (160 km) and lasts less than 24 hours. For a day trip, a group of people may need to make arrangements, and anyone with limited mobility may need assistance. Families with young children may need additional arrangements, but a day trip with children and without school is possible.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Abun sani dangane da kasar Norway shine darewar kwarin da tsibiri dake haifar da tudu mai tsawo. Wadannan filayen galibi ana kiransu da “vidde” ma'ana sarari, buɗaɗɗen itace, sarari mara iyaka. A Rogaland da Agder ana kiransu “hei” ma'ana wani tsiro mara bishiya da ke budadden daji mai cike da ciyayi.
mt: The Norwegian word for a valley or a peninsula is "vidde", meaning a barren, treeless, and open area. In Rogaland and Agder, they are called "hei", meaning a barren, treeless, and open area.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Kakar yawon shakatawa a tasoshin kan tuddu yawancibunƙasarta shine a lokacin bazara ta Indiya. Sai dai kuma, suna da wasu nau'ikan kyau da ɗaukar ido lokacin hunturu, yayin da yawancin tasoshin kan tudu su ke samun yawan dusar ƙanƙara kuma su ke samar da wasanni irin su gudun kan ƙanƙara da zarmiyar kan ƙanƙara.
mt: The peak tourist season in India's hill stations is during the summer. However, there are some good things to do during the winter, as most hill stations have a cooler climate and offer activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Ku tabbatar cewa da zarar kun isa Marinas komai zai zama a bayyane. Za ku haɗu da wasu masu satar jirgin ruwa kuma za su raba bayanansu tare da ku. Ainihin za ku iya sanya sanarwar bayar da taimakon ku, yin sassauci a kan tashoshin jiragen ruwa, kusantar mutane da tsabtace jirgin ruwan sa, kokarin yin hulɗa da masu jirgin ruwa a mashayar, da dai sauransu. Yi ƙoƙarin magana da mutane da dama. Bayan ɗan lokaci kowa zai san ka kuma za a baka labari akan kwale-kwalen da ke neman mutum.
mt: 1. Make sure that once you arrive at Marina, you will be visible. You will meet other boat owners and they will share their information with you. You will be able to provide your emergency contact information, make announcements on the radio channels, contact people on the water, and so on. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while, everyone will know you and there will be news about you on the grapevine.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Tsibirin Hong Kong shine ya baiwa yankin sunansa na Hong Kong kuma shine waje da yawancin yan yawon bude ido suka fi ba mahimmanci. An kwatanta faretin gine-ginen da ke yin sararin samaniyar Hong Kong da ginshiƙi mai walƙiya wanda aka bayyana ta gaban ruwan Victoria Harbor. Don gani wurare mafi kyaun a Hong Kong, bar tsibirin ka nufi kan gaban ruwan Kowloon da ke tsallake. Mafi yawan ci gaban birni na Hong Kong yana cike da adadi a ƙasa mai daɗin kanta ta gefen tsibirin arewacin. Wannan shine wurin da ‘yan mulkin mallaka na Birtaniya suka riƙe a zaman nasu kuma idan kana neman shaida ta mulkin mallakar yankin a baya, wannan shine wurin da ya dace ka fara.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the main island of Hong Kong and the most popular tourist destination. The skyline of Hong Kong is dominated by the skyscrapers of the Central District, on the north shore of the island. The most famous views of the skyline are from Victoria Harbour, which is on the south side of the island. Most of the development of Hong Kong is on the north side of the island. This is where the British colonial government was located and if you are looking for evidence of the colonial past, this is the place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Likkafa tallafi ne ga ƙafafun mahayi waɗanda su ke rataye a kowane ɓangaren sirdi. Su na ba da daidaito ga matuki sai dai akwai damuwa dangane hadarin kafar matukin na iya makalewa a jiki. Idan mai hawan doki ya faɗi daga kan doki amma ƙafarsa tana jikin matakalar, za a iya jan su idan dokin ya gudu. Domin rage wanna hatsarin, za a iya ɗaukan matakan kariya da dama. Da farko, yawancin mahaya suna sanye da takalman hawa masu diddige da kuma ƙasan takalmi mai santsi, matsattse. Na gaba, wasu siddi, mussamman siddin Ingila, na dauke da kariya dake barin fata ya fita daga siddin yayin da mai hawa ya janyo shi baya gabanin fadowa.
mt: Ƙafar matukin na iya makalewa a jiki. Idan mai hawan doki ya faɗi daga kan doki amma ƙafarsa tana jikin matakalar, za a iya jan su idan dokin ya gudu. Domin rage wanna hatsarin, za a iya ɗaukan matakan kariya da dama. Da farko, yawancin mahaya suna sanye da takalman hawa masu diddige da kuma ƙasan takalmi mai santsi, matsattse. Na gaba, wasu siddi, mussamman siddin Ingila, na dauke da kariya dake barin fata ya fita daga siddin yayin da mai hawa ya janyo shi baya gabanin fadowa.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

Na gaba, wasu siddi, mussamman siddin Ingila, na dauke da kariya dake barin fata ya fita daga siddin yayin da mai hawa ya janyo shi baya gabanin fadowa.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Gamayyar musayar karrama baƙi ita ce ƙungiyar da ke sadar da matafiya da mutanen yankin a garuruwan da za su ziyarta. Shiga cikin rukunin nan, a wasu lokutan yana bukatar cike wata takadda ta Intanet: duk da yake wasu ma su kan bukaci karin tantancewa. Jerin sunayen wadanda za su karbi bakin yana nan an wallafa shi ko dai a jaridu ko kuma a yanar gizo, a wasu lokutan ma har da karin bayani da sharhin wasu matafiyan. An kafa kamfanin Couchsurfing ne a watan Janairun 2004 bayan da masanin na'urar kwamfuta Casey Fenton ya sami jirgi mai arha zuwa Iceland amma bai sami wurin zama ba. Ya turo saƙon imel zuwa ga ɗalibai a jam'iar ta gida kuma ya samu wani gagarumin yawan taya don masauki na kyauta.
mt: Ƙungiyar musayar karrama baƙi ita ce ƙungiyar da ke sadar da matafiya da mutanen yankin a garuruwan da za su ziyarta. Shiga cikin rukunin nan, a wasu lokutan yana bukatar cike wata takadda ta Intanet: duk da yake wasu ma su kan bukaci karin tantancewa. An kafa kamfanin Couchsurfing ne a watan Janairun 2004 bayan da masanin na'urar kwamfuta Casey Fenton ya sami jirgi mai arha zuwa Iceland amma bai sami wurin zama ba. Ya turo saƙon imel zuwa ga ɗalibai a jam'iar ta gida kuma ya samu wani gagarumin yawan taya don masauki na kyauta.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: An samar da Gidajen otal din ne domin matasa - yawancin baki zaka samu basu wuce shekaru ashirin ba- amma kuma sau da yawa ana samun matafiya tsofaffi a wajen. Iyalai tare da yara abu ne mai wuya, amma wasu gidajen kwanan suna ba su damar a ɗakuna masu zaman kansu.
mt: Hotels are for young people - most rooms will be under 20 years old, but some hotels are allowing families with children to stay in self-contained units.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Boomerang jefawa sanannen fasaha ne da yawon bude ido ke son koya. Idan kana son ka koyi jefa boomerang da ke dawowa hannunka, ka tabbatar kana da boomerang din da ya dace mai komowa. Yawancin majefi da ake samu a Australia a haƙiƙa ba masu dawowa ba ne. Yana da kyau ‘yan koyo kada su gwada jefawa a yanayin iska.
mt: Boomerangs are a well-known toy that kids love to play with. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang that comes back, make sure you have the right boomerang. Most boomerangs sold in Australia are not returnable. It's a good idea for beginners to avoid throwing boomerangs in windy conditions.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Tare da tsibirai 17,000 da za a zaɓa daga ciki, abincin Indonesiya laima ce da ke rufe yawancin nau'ikan abinci na yanki da aka samo a duk faɗin ƙasar. Amma, idan aka yi amfani da shi ba tare da ƙarin ƙwarewar ba, kalmar tana nufin ma'anar abinci asali daga ɓangarorin tsakiya da gabashin babban tsibirin Java. Yanzu ana samu a faɗin rukunin tsibiran, jerin nau’ikan abincin yan Java, yawancin kayan kamshin da su ka fi sakawa shine na gyada, yaji da sukari (musamman sukarin kwakwa) da kuma wasu kayan kanshin.
mt: 17,000 islands, choose from, Indonesian cuisine is the staple food of most of the region's cuisines found throughout the country. But, if used without further processing, the word means the original meaning of food from the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Now found throughout the archipelago, the series of Java's staple foods, most of the staple foods are cassava, yam and sugar (especially cassava sugar) and some staple foods.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Ga wadanda ba sa gane kalmomin da ake amfani da su a harkar likitancin, kalmomin ciwuka masu watsuwa da na masu yaduwa na da ma'anoni daban-daban. Wata cuta mai saurin yaduwa ita ce wacce kwayar cuta Pathogen ke haifarwa, kamar ƙwayoyin cuta, ƙwayoyin bakteria, fungus ko wasu ƙwayoyin cuta. Cuta mai saurin yaɗuwa cuta ce da ta ke da sauƙin yaduwa ta hanyar kasancewa a wurin da wanda ya kamu da cutar ya ke. Akasariin gwamnatoci na bukatar bakin dake shigowa ko kuma mazauna masu fita kasashensu da a yi musu rigakafin cuttutuka daban-daban. Yawanci wadannan dokokin zasu danganci kasar da matafiyin ya ziyarta ko ya ke shirin ziyarta.
mt: For those unfamiliar with the terminology of medical jargon, terms such as "pathogen" and "infectious" have different meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other infectious agent. Many governments require incoming or outgoing residents of their country to undergo various vaccinations. These laws will usually apply to the country and its visitors or those planning to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Keɓaɓɓen VPN (cibiyar sadarwar masu zaman kansu) masu ba da hanya mai kyau hanya ce ta ƙetare takunkumin siyasa da kasuwancin IP-geofiltering. Sun fi wakilan gidan yanar-gizo bisa dalilai da yawa: Sun sake canja duk hanyoyin tafiyar intanet, ba http kawai ba. A ƙa’ida suna samar da zango mai ƙarfi da kuma aiki mai inganci. Rufaffu ne don haka suna da wuyar leƙen asiri.
mt: A good VPN (private network) is a great way to bypass political and business IP-geofiltering. They have representatives in every country for many reasons: They reroute all internet traffic, not just http. They provide powerful and reliable gateways. They are not easily spoofed.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Saboda kiran waya kan biyo ta kan intanet, ba ka bukatar yin amfani da kamfanin waya da ke inda ka ke zama ko inda ka yi tafiya. Hakanan babu wata buƙatar cewa ku samu lambar gida daga yankin da ku ke zaune; za ku iya samun haɗin intanet mai tauraron dan adam a cikin dajin Chicken, Alaska kuma ku zaɓi wata lamba da ta ce kuna cikin yanayin Arizona na rana. Sau da yawa, dole ne ku sayi lambar duniya daban wanda zai ba wayoyin PSTN damar kiran ku. Inda adadin ya fito yana kawo canji ga mutanen da suke kiranka.
mt: Because of the ubiquity of the Internet, you don't need to use a phone company in your area or where you are traveling. You can get Internet access in the Chicken, Alaska chicken coop and choose a number that says you are in the Arizona time zone. Often, you must buy a separate international number that will allow PSTN calls to reach you. Wherever you go, your number will change.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Furuci yana da ɗan sauƙi a cikin Italiyanci tunda yawancin kalmomi ana furta daidai yadda ake rubuta suu Manyan haruffan da ya kamata a lura da su a nan sune c da g, kasancewar furucinsu ya banbamta daga wannan wasalin da ke biye. Hakanan, tabbatar da furta r da rr daban: caro yana nufin ƙaunata, yayin da karas yana nufin karusa.
mt: The pronunciation of Italian is easy because most words are pronounced as they are spelled. The main exceptions are c and g, which are pronounced differently in this article. Also, confirm that r and rr are different: caro means "car", while carro means "car".
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir shi ne birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan jama’a kimanin miliyan 3.7, kuma tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan ta Istanbul, kuma babbar cibiyar sufuri. A da yana a matsayin tsohon birnin Smyrna, yanzu cibiyar hada-hadar kasuwanci ce ta zamani, da ta bnƙasa, da ta ke zagayen wani ƙaton mashigin ruwa sannan kuma yana zagaye da duwatsu. Manya-manyan tituna, gidajen gilashi da manyan kantunan siyayya an kawata su da jajayen rufi na gargajiya, kasuwa ta karni na 18, da wani tsohon masallaci da coci, koda yake dai garin ya fi kama da irin na turai da ke gabar bahar rum fiye da ace garin gargajiya ne a kasar Turkiya.
mt: Ƙasar Izmir ta kasance birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan jama’a kimanin miliyan 3.7, kuma tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan ta Istanbul, kuma babbar cibiyar sufuri. A da yana a matsayin tsohon birnin Smyrna, yanzu cibiyar hada-hadar kasuwanci ce ta zamani, da ta bnƙasa, da ta ke zagayen wani ƙaton mashigin ruwa sannan kuma yana zagaye da duwatsu. Manya-manyan tituna, gidajen gilashi da manyan kantunan siyayya an kawata su da jajayen rufi na gargajiya, kasuwa ta karni na 18, da wani tsohon masallaci da coci, koda yake dai garin ya fi kama da irin na turai da ke gabar bahar rum fiye da ace garin gargajiya ne a kasar Turkiya.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Kallon buɗewar furen cherry, wanda aka sani da hanami, ya kasance wani ɓangare na al'adun Japan tun ƙarni na 8. Tunanin ya fito ne daga China inda plum da suka yi girma sun kasance fure ne wanda aka fi so. A Japan, sarkin ne ya shirya kungiyar siyasa na farko don kan sa kawai da wasu membobin da ke da martaba kewaye da kotun sarakuna..
mt: The opening of the cherry blossom, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese tradition since the 8th century. The idea came from China where plums that grew were considered a delicacy. In Japan, the shogun organized the first political group to only include those with the right to sit around the shogun's court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Birnin Ƙudus shine babban birni kuma birni mafi girma a Isra’ila, kodayake yawancin kasashe da kuma Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya ba su amince da shi a matsayin babban birnin ƙasar Isra’ila ba. Tsohon birni a cikin Yahudiya yana da tarihi mai ban sha'awa yana ɗaukar dubban shekaru. Birnin mai tsarki ne ga addinai uku da suka gaskanta da ubangiji daya - Yahudanci, Kiristanci da Musulunci, sannan yana zama a matsayin cibiyar tsarkake ruhi, addini, da al’ada. Saboda mahimmancin birnin a addinance, musamman tsofaffin wurare na tsohon birnin, Birnin Kudus ya zama cibiyar yawon bude ido a kasar Israila. Baitul maqdis tana da wuraren tarihi da yawa, na gargajiya da na al'adu, tare da kuɗaɗe da cibiyoyin cin kasuwa, gidajen shakatawa, da gidajen abinci.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital. The ancient city in the Land of Israel has been continuously inhabited for over 3,000 years. The city is one of the oldest in the world. During its long history, Jerusalem has been governed by many states and peoples, including the Jebusites, the Israelites, the Babylonians, the Persians, the Hellenistic Greeks, the Romans, the Byzantines, the Arabs, the Crusaders, the Mamluks, the Ottomans, the British, and the Israelis. The city has been conquered and destroyed at least 22 times, and has been captured and recaptured more than 40 times. Jerusalem is a holy city to the three major Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity, and Islam. Sites of importance in Judaism include the Temple Mount with the Foundation Stone, the Western Wall, Hezekiah's Tunnel and the City of David. In Christianity, sites of importance include the Church of the Holy Sepulchre, the Church of the Nativity, and the Pool of Bethesda. In Islam, sites of importance include the Dome of the Rock (Al-Aqsa), Al-Aqsa Mosque, and the Tomb of David. Jerusalem has been a center of tourism for Israel and Palestine since the 19th century. The city has been a major pilgrimage destination for Christians since the Roman Empire, and is the third holiest city in Islam. The city is also home to the Israeli Supreme Court, the Knesset, and the official residences of the Prime Minister and the President of Israel.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Birnin Ƙudus shine babban birni kuma birni mafi girma a Isra’ila, kodayake yawancin kasashe da kuma Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya ba su amince da shi a matsayin babban birnin ƙasar Isra’ila ba. Tsohon birni a cikin Yahudiya yana da tarihi mai ban sha'awa yana ɗaukar dubban shekaru. Birnin mai tsarki ne ga addinai uku da suka gaskanta da ubangiji daya - Yahudanci, Kiristanci da Musulunci, sannan yana zama a matsayin cibiyar tsarkake ruhi, addini, da al’ada. Saboda mahimmancin birnin a addinance, musamman tsofaffin wurare na tsohon birnin, Birnin Kudus ya zama cibiyar yawon bude ido a kasar Israila. Baitul maqdis tana da wuraren tarihi da yawa, na gargajiya da na al'adu, tare da kuɗaɗe da cibiyoyin cin kasuwa, gidajen shakatawa, da gidajen abinci.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital. The ancient city in the Land of Israel has been continuously inhabited for over 3,000 years. The city is one of the oldest in the world. During its long history, Jerusalem has been governed by many states and peoples, including the Jebusites, the Israelites, the Babylonians, the Persians, the Hellenistic Greeks, the Romans, the Byzantines, the Arabs, the Crusaders, the Mamluks, the Ottomans, the British, and the Israelis. The city has been conquered and destroyed at least 22 times, and has been captured and recaptured more than 40 times. Jerusalem is a holy city to the three major Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity, and Islam. Sites of importance in Judaism include the Temple Mount with the Foundation Stone, the Western Wall, Hezekiah's Tunnel and the City of David. In Christianity, sites of importance include the Church of the Holy Sepulchre, the Church of the Nativity, and the Pool of Bethesda. In Islam, sites of importance include the Dome of the Rock (Al-Aqsa), Al-Aqsa Mosque, and the Tomb of David. Jerusalem has been a center of tourism for Israel and Palestine since the 19th century. The city has been a major pilgrimage destination for Christians since the Roman Empire, and is the third holiest city in Islam. The city is also home to the Israeli Supreme Court, the Knesset, and the official residences of the Prime Minister and the President of Israel.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Wurin Shakatawar Ƙasa na Kruger (KNP) yana yankin arewa maso gabas na Afirka ta Kudu inda ya miƙa ta jikin iyakar oasar Mozambique a gabas, Zimbabwe a arewa, kuma a iyakar da ke Ƙoramar Kada ce. Lambun ya dauki fili mai fadin 19,500 km² kuma ya rabu har kashi 14, kowanne na tallafa wa dabbobin daji dabam. Yana ɗaya daga cikin manyan wuraren sha’awa na Afirka ta Kudu kuma ana ɗaukarsa a matsayin ja-gaba a wuraren Buɗe Ido na Afirka ta Kudu (SANParks). Kamar yadda yake a dukkanin wuraran shakatawa na Afirka ta Kudu, akwai kiyayewa na yau da kullun da kuɗin shiga wurin shakatawar. Haka kuma zai iya zama da amfani ga mutum ya sayi Kyanwar Daji, wanda ke samar da wurin shiga ga ko dai zaɓaɓɓun gandun dabbobi a Afirka ta Kudu ko kuma dukkan Gandun Dabbobi na Afirka ta Kudu.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa where it borders the Oshana and Okavango regions of Namibia in the west, Botswana in the southwest, and Zimbabwe in the north, and the Greater Limpopo Transfrontier Conservation Area. It covers an area of 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 separate sections, each of which is dedicated to wildlife conservation. It is one of South Africa's largest national parks and is considered a flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As in all South African national parks, there is a permanent conservation fee and an entrance fee. It is also possible to buy a KNP Conservation Pass, which gives access to all South African national parks. This is also the case for the African Wildlife Foundation, which provides access to all African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Wanda tsawonsa ya yi wa ƙuryar arewacin Machu Picchu rumfa tsauni ne mai santsi, wanda yawanci ya zama farfajiyar baya a hotunan kufayin da dama. Akwai alamar jan aiki daga ƙasa, kuma hawa ne mai tsawo da wahala, amma yawancin mutane masu lafiya za su iya kaiwa cikin kusan mintuna 45. An jejjera duwatsun takawa a kan hanyar, a can sama kuma akwai igiyoyin karfe da ke dauke da karafunan da ake dafawa da hannu. Bayan fadin wannan, sa ran kasa yin numfashi, kuma ka kula a cikin bangarori masu santsi, musamman yayin da ka ke jike, saboda zai iya zama mai haɗari cikin sauri. Akwai wani karamin kogo kusa da saman da dole ne a wuce ta wurin, ya yi ɗan ƙasa kuma matsetse sosai.
mt: The climb to Machu Picchu's summit is steep, but most people in good health can make it in about 45 minutes. The trail is well marked, and there are signs with clocks showing how long it takes to reach each point. After the first part, the trail becomes steeper, and you should watch your step, especially when you're descending, as it can be dangerous. There is a small cave near the top that you must pass through, which is very narrow and slippery.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Babban abincin, kamar na yankuna masu kama da wannan a cikin Bahar Rum, ya dogara ne akan burodi, kayan lambu da nama (musamman alade), kuma yana amfani da man zaitun ko'ina. Abincin dare mai sauki musamman ma lokacin bazara, shi ne na Pa amb Oli: Burodi ne da man zaitun da tumatir da kuma duk wani kayan hadin da ya samu kamar cukwui da abincin kifi da dai sauransu.
mt: The main course, like in the areas around this in the Mediterranean Sea, is based on wheat, legumes and meat (especially lamb), and uses olive oil. The evening meal is especially popular in summer, it is Pa amb Oli: Wheat is with olive oil and tomatoes and also any ingredients that have been found such as garlic and fish and so on.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Ana dafa Abincin Hangi a cikin wani rami mai zafi a cikin ƙasa. Ana dumama ramin ne ko dai da duwatsu masu zafi daga wuta, ko a wasu wuraren zafin ƙasa kan sanya zagayen tsandaurin ƙasa ya yi zafi. A kan yi amfani da hangi don dafa abincin dare irin na gargajiya. Wurare da yawa a Rotorua na samar da hangi na murhun rami, yayin da wasu hangi ana samu a Christchurch, Wellington da wasu wurare.
mt: Hāngi is cooked in a pit oven in the ground. The pit is heated either by fire or by hot stones placed in the pit. Hāngi is traditionally used to cook food for a large group of people. Many places in Rotorua produce hāngi from mutton, while in Christchurch, Wellington and other places hāngi is made from pork.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Yayin ziyartar gidajen sufaye, an buƙaci mata su sa riguna masu rufe gwiwowinsu kuma su rufe ƙafadunsu, kuma. Mafi yawancin gidajen ibada suna samar da mayafai ga matan da ba su zo da shiri ba, amma idan ki ka zo da naki, musamman wanda yake da launuka masu haske, za ki sami murmushi daga mai bauta namiji ko mace a ƙofar shiga. A bisa wannan madogara, ana buƙatar maza su sanya wanduna da ke rufe gwiwoyi. Wannan ma za a iya aro shi daga tarin kayan a mashigar amma ba a wanke tufa bayan kowane mutum guda ya yi amfani da tufar don haka ba za ka/ki ji dadin saka wannan bujen ba. Kala guda zai iyamma dukkanin maza.
mt: During a visit to holy sites, women are required to wear robes that cover their bodies and close their faces, and. Most holy sites provide veils for women who do not bring their own, but if you bring your own veil, it will not be cleaned after each person uses it, so you will not be able to tell if the veil is clean. In addition, men are required to wear robes that cover their bodies. ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Idan ka ziyarci nahiyar Arctic ko Antarctica a lokacin hunturu zaka tsinkayi daren sanyi, wanda a lokacinsa rana bata fitowa. Wannan yana ba da kyakkyawar dama don ganin Aurora borealis, tunda sama zata kasance mai duhu sosai ko ƙasa da agogo. Tunda yankunan ba su da cinkoson jama’a, kuma babu matsalar gurɓacewar haske, za kuma ka ji daɗin taurarin.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in the winter, you will see the midnight sun, which does not set. This gives you a great opportunity to see the aurora borealis, as the sky will be very dark or below the horizon. Since the areas are not populated, and there is no problem with light pollution, you will also enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: A wurare masu nisa, idan babu sabis na wayar salula, wayar tauraron dan adam na iya zama zaɓin ku kaɗai. Wayar tauraron dan adam a gaba daya ba za ta maye gurbin wayar hannu ba, domin sai kun kasance a waje tare da yin saiti da tauraron dan adam don yin kiran da wayar. Ana amfani sosai da aikin a harkokin sufurin ruwa, wanda ya hada da jiragen shakatawa da masu bincike da ke bukatar sadarwa a lungu ko bukatar muryoyi. Yakamata kamfanin wayar tarho na yankin ku ya kasance zai iya bada ƙarin bayani game da yin haɗi da wannan sabis ɗin.
mt: In remote areas, where there is no cellular service, satellite phones may be your only option. Satellite phones will not replace cell phones, as you will still need to be outdoors to use them for calling and texting. They are commonly used in maritime operations, including search and rescue and research vessels, and those who require communications at sea or in remote areas. Your local satellite phone provider may be able to provide additional information on connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chişinău. yaren cikin gida shi ne Romaniyanci, amma ana amfani da harshen Rasha sosai. Maldova jamhuriya ce mai kabilu da dama da ta yi fama da rikicin kabilanci. A shekarar 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kirkirar da kanta mai ikirarin Jamhuriyyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wacce ke da gwamnatinta da kudin ta amma ba wata kungiyar mambobin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta amince da shi ba. An maido da harkar cinikayya tsakanin bangarori biyu na Maldova duk da rushewar tattaunawar siyasa. Babban addini a Moldova shine Kiristocin aqidah.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The official language is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered ethnic strife. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the independent Republic of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognized by the United Nations. Economic relations between the two parts of Moldova have continued despite political estrangement. The main religion in Moldova is Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chişinău. yaren cikin gida shi ne Romaniyanci, amma ana amfani da harshen Rasha sosai. Maldova jamhuriya ce mai kabilu da dama da ta yi fama da rikicin kabilanci. A shekarar 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kirkirar da kanta mai ikirarin Jamhuriyyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wacce ke da gwamnatinta da kudin ta amma ba wata kungiyar mambobin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta amince da shi ba. An maido da harkar cinikayya tsakanin bangarori biyu na Maldova duk da rushewar tattaunawar siyasa. Babban addini a Moldova shine Kiristocin aqidah.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The official language is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered ethnic strife. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the independent Republic of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognized by the United Nations. Economic relations between the two parts of Moldova have continued despite political estrangement. The main religion in Moldova is Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Kasancewar birnin Montevideo na kudancin Tsakiyar Duniya, lokacin zafi a can shine na sanyi a arewacin duniya, kuma lokacin sanyi a can shine na zafi a arewacin duniya. Montevideo na cikin yankuna masu yanayin sauƙin zafi; a lokacin rani, zafi kan kai sama da +30°C. Lokacin hunturu na iya zama mai sanyida wasa-wasa: yanayin zafi ba safai ake yin sanyi ba, amma iska da zafi suna haduwa don sanya shi jin sanyi fiye da abin da ma'aunin zafi da sanyio ya fada. Babu “damina” da “rani” na musamman: adadin ruwan sama na kasance iri daya duka shekara.
mt: Montevideo is in the Southern Hemisphere, so its summer is winter in the Northern Hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in a region of mild winters; in summer, temperatures can exceed +30°C. Winter can be cold: warm air is not cold enough to snow, but cold air can be cold enough to snow. There is no "rainy season" or "dry season": the amount of rainfall is the same every year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Abubuwan da ba'a so ko makararrun rubutu an san shi azaman graffiti. Duk da cewa ba sabon salon zamani ba ne, yawancin mutane watakila na alakanta shi da yadda matasa ke lalata wuraren jama’a ta hanyar amfani da fenti su yi zane-zane. Duk da haka, a zamanin yau akwai ingantattun masu fasahar zane, abubuwan zane-zane da kuma “bangon shari'a” zanen. Graffiti a cikin wannan mahallin yawanci suna kama da ayyukan adabi maimakon alamun haramun.
mt: Graffiti is considered vandalism. While not a new art form, most people probably associate it with how young people deface public places with spray paint. However, in the present day there are advanced graffiti artists, art pieces and "legal graffiti" walls. Graffiti in this context usually refers to works of literature rather than illegal markings.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Don wasu bukukuwa, yawancin masu halarta zuwa bukukuwa na kiɗa sun yanke shawara su yi zango a wurin, kuma yawancin masu halarta suna ɗaukar shi muhimmin ɓangare na ƙwarewar. Idan kana so ka yi kusa da inda mataki ke faruwa sai ka shiga da wuri domin samun sansani kusa da kidi da waka. Ka tuna cewa, duk da kasancewar an datse kade-kade a farfajiyar, akwai kuma wasu sassan bukukuwan da za su ci gaba da kade-kaden har can talatainin dare. Waɗansu bukukuwan na da wurin sansani na musamman domin iyalai da ke da ƙananan yara.
mt: For other concerts, most attendees to music concerts have decided to stand in the pit, and most attendees are in the pit. If you want to be close to the stage, enter the pit to get a good view of the music and dance. Remember that, despite the fact that the pit is moshed, there are also other sections of the concert that will continue to mosh until the end of the night. Those sections have special viewing areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Ta yadda yawancin pueblos ɗin suke da nisa, ba za ku iya samun inda ake hada-hadar dare sosai ba tare da kun yi tafiya zuwa Albuquerque ko Santa Fe ba. Duk da haka akasarin gidajen caca da aka lissafa suna bayar da abun sha kuma yawanci suna nishadantarwa na arziki (musamman manyan dake zagaye da Albuquerque da Santa Fe kai tsaye). A yi hattara: kananan gidajen giya a garin nan wurare ne da ka iya zama hadari ga baki daga wata jihar. Kan abu daya, arewacin New Mexico na da manya matsaloli da tuki cikin maye, da kuma taruwan direbobi bugaggu ta yi yawwa kusa da mashayan kananan garuwa.
mt: Most pueblos are remote, so you won't find a lot of places to stay after dark without driving to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.  However, most of the inns listed are bed and breakfasts and are generally of the higher end (especially those in the vicinity of Albuquerque and Santa Fe).  Note: small inns in this state can be dangerous for travelers from other states.  Northern New Mexico has a lot of problems with methamphetamine and other drugs, and there is a lot of gang activity around small towns.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
