src: Giya ta gida da aka sani ita ce ‘Ta Ɗaya’, ba giya ce mai haɗe-haɗe ba, amma tana da daɗi da wartsakarwa. Ana kiran daya giyar ta gida “Manta”. Akwai giya na Faransa da yawa da za a ci, amma giyar New Zealand da Ostiraliya na iya tafiya mafi kyau. Ruwan famfon na gida yana da cikakkiyar tsabta don sha, amma ruwan kwalba na da saukin samu idan kana fargaba. Ga 'yan Australiya, manufar kofi na 'flat white' bakon abu ne. Wani bakar gajeren kofi na 'espresso', yana cike da maiko (ba kumfa ba), ana shan shayi ba tare da madara ba. Alawar mai zafi ta kai matsayi irin wadda Belgium ta kayyade. Abin sha na kayan itace na da tsada amma akwai dadi.
mt: 1. A cup of tea is known as “One”, not a cup of tea, but it is sweet and milky. A cup of tea in the UK is called “Manta”. There are many coffees from France that can be drunk, but the New Zealand and Australian cup of tea can go best. The water of the cup of tea at home is fully saturated for drinking, but the water of the filter is slow to get if you are a filter. For Australians, the purpose of the “flat white” coffee is a thing. A short coffee of “espresso”, full of milk (not foam), is drunk with tea without sugar. The hot water has reached the level that Belgium has set. The tea of ​​herbs is full but there is sweetness.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Guaraní sun kasance yan asalin kasa mafi mahimmanci da ke zaune a wurinda yanzu yake a gabashin Paraguay, su na rayuwa a matsayin makiyaya kuma maharba sannan su na taba noma. Yankin Chaco matattara ce ta sauran rukunan ƙabilu ‘yan asalin yanki kamar Guaycuru da kuma Payagua waɗanda su ke rayuwa ta hanyar farauta, tsince-tsince da kuma kamun kifi. A cikin karni na 16 Paraguay, wanda a da ake kira “The Giant Province of the Indies”, an haife shi ne sakamakon gamuwa da masu nasara daga Sifen tare da kungiyoyin 'yan asalin ƙasar. Mutanen Spain sun fara mulkin mallaka wanda ya ɗauki ƙarni uku. Tun kafuwar Asunción a shekara ta 1537, Paraguay ta sami damar kiyaye ɗumbin asalin ta da asalin ta.
mt: Ƙabilar Guaraní ne ƙabilar asalin ƙasar mafi mahimmanci da ke zaune a yankin Chaco na yanzu, wanda ke rayuwa a matsayin makiyaya kuma maharba sannan su na taba noma. Yankin Chaco na matattara ce ta sauran rukunan ƙabilu ‘yan asalin yanki kamar Guaycuru da kuma Payagua waɗanda su ke rayuwa ta hanyar farauta, tsince-tsince da kuma kamun kifi. A cikin karni na 16 Paraguay, wanda a da ake kira “The Giant Province of the Indies”, an haife shi ne sakamakon gamuwa da masu nasara daga Sifen tare da kungiyoyin 'yan asalin ƙasar. Mutanen Spain sun fara mulkin mallaka wanda ya ɗauki ƙarni uku. Tun kafuwar Asunción a shekara ta 1537, Paraguay ta sami damar kiyaye ɗumbin asalin ta da asalin ta.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Mutanen Paris sun yi suna kan son kai, rashin kunya da girman kai. Yayin da yake wannan yawanci ra’ayi ne wanda ba daidai ba, hanya mafi kyau don yin sabo a cikin Paris har yanzu shine kasancewa kan halayyarka mafi kyau, yin aiki kamar wanda yake “bien élevé” (wanda ya sami tarbiyya mai kyau). Zai sanya yin sabo ya kasance mai sauki. Fuskar mutanen Paris ta bazata za ta yi saurin ɓacewa idan ka nuna wasu halayen girmamawa.
mt: Parisians are known for their height, elegance and poise. While this is often an unfair stereotype, the best way to blend in in Paris is still to be as well-dressed as possible, acting as if you are “bien élevé” (well-bred). It will make you feel more at ease. The Parisian look is not to be rushed, and will take time to develop if you show other signs of arrogance.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail yana tsarin fasinjoji biyu a cikin jiragen kasa wadanda ke ciki da wajen Cape Town: MetroPlus (mai tsada na mawadata) da kuma Metro (mai araha na talakawa). MetroPlus ya fi kwanciyar hankali kuma ba shi da cunkoson jama'a amma ya fi tsada sosai, kodayake har yanzu ya fi tikitin jirgin ƙasa na yau da kullun a Turai. Kowane jirgin ƙasa yana da MetroPlus da masu horar da Metro; masu koyawa MetroPlus koyaushe suna kan ƙarshen jirgin ƙasa mafi kusa da Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail is planning two trains in the Cape Town area: MetroPlus (premium service) and Metro (low-cost service). MetroPlus is more reliable and has no public interference but is much more expensive, although it is still cheaper than the average European train ticket. Each train has MetroPlus and Metro coaches; MetroPlus coaches are always at the end of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Matafiya na iya fuskantar kwari wadanda basu saba dasu ba a garin su na asali. Beraye da dangoginsu kan bata abinci sannan su janyo kaikayi ko kuma ma su haddasa kan jiki tare da yada guba ko kuma ma baza cututtuka. Cututuka masu iya yaduwa da kansu, ko kuma dabbobi da ke da hatsari da za su iya raunatawa ko kashe mutane da karfi, ba su cancanta a matsayin kwari ba.
mt: Passengers may encounter animals unfamiliar to them in their native city. Bites and scratches from animals can spread disease, or dangerous animals can kill people.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Kowane kantin sayar da kusurwa yana cike da rudani game da katunan wayar da aka riga aka biya wadanda za'a iya amfani dasu daga wayoyin biya ko kuma wayoyin talakawa. Yayin da galibin kudin kira yake da kyau zuwa ko ina nema, wasu kuma sun kware wajen bayar da rangwamen kiran ga wasu zababbun kasashen duniya. Samun dama ga waɗannan ayyukan galibi ta hanyar lambar tarho kyauta ce wanda za a iya kira daga yawancin wayoyi ba tare da caji ba.
mt: Every gas station is full of people asking about coupons that have already been paid for that can be used from payphones or public phones. While most of the charges are good to or from the U.S., some also offer special rates to other countries. Getting a discount on these calls is usually free from most payphones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Tafkunan Plitvice na wajen shakatawa yana da wani surkukin daji, galibi da kamannin bishiyoyin fir da na kudan zuma da kuma hadin wanda ya shafi manyan tsaunuka da duwatsu tare da ciyaye na Rum. Tana da sanannun dangogin itatuwa iri daban-daban, sabo da jerin yankunan yanayi da ta ke da su, da bayyana nau’ukan ƙasa daban-daban da kuma tuddai masu mataki daban-daban. Rukunin muhalli na ga dabbobin daji mabambanta da kuma launukan tsuntsaye. Dabbobin daji da ba su da yawa irin su Malu mai launin ruwan kasa da ke turai, kerkeci, mikiya, mujiya, kyanwar daji da kuma capercaillie a na iya samun su a can, tare da nau’ukan gama garin dabbobi masu yawa.
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is known for its lakes arranged in cascades. These cascades were created by the activity of the water of the rivers that are flowing over the limestone and chalk. The lakes are separated by natural dams of travertine, which is laid down by the water as it flows. The lakes are all interconnected and of a very different size and shape. The largest of the lakes, Kozjak, is 700 metres long and 100 metres wide, while the smallest one is only a few square metres. The lakes are all at different levels, due to the differing amounts of travertine laid down by the water, and there are a number of waterfalls. The highest waterfall is 70 metres high. The lakes are all fed by little rivers and springs. The water flows over the travertine barriers, creating little waterfalls and pools. The water is very clear and clean, and the lakes are all full of fish. The lakes are all surrounded by forests, and there are many different types of trees. The forests are full of different types of animals, and there are many different types of birds. The park is also home to many different types of insects, and there are many different types of plants.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Yawanci kamfanonin yaɗa labarai kan yi ƙarya akan dalilin wannan, suna iƙirarin cewa domin “hana satar fasaha” ne. A gaskiya, tsarin yankuna basu da wani sakamako kan kwashewa ba bisa doka ba; kwashewa da aka yi da kyau a disk zai iya aiki daidai kan kowanne na’ura inda na asalin zai yi aiki. Ainihin manufar ita ce a baiwa waɗancan kamfanoni ikon sarrafa kasuwannin su; duk magana ce ta juya kudade.
mt: Most news outlets are reporting this as a "security breach", claiming that it was done to "prevent piracy". In fact, the design of the parts is not affected by the breach; a properly designed part will work on any printer where the original part would work. The actual intent is to give these companies control over their sales; all talk is just a diversion.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Duk da yake rajistar shige da fice yawanci baya nan ko tsari idan ka isa kasarka, ikon kwastam na iya zama matsala. Tabbatar kun san abin da zaku iya shigowa da ba za ku iya shigowa ba kuma zayyana wani abu sama da iyakar doka.
mt: Even though your passport is usually valid for a few years or until you renew it, your ability to enter a country may be limited. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring into the country and what is over the legal limit.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Kwarin Cochamó - shine wajen hawan dutse mafi fice da ake zuwa wanda aka sani da Yosemite na Kudancin Amurka, wanda ke da manyan katangu na dutse daban-daban da matakaloli na dutse masu tsawo. Taron na hada da raayi na jamaa da sama. Mutane daga sassa daban-daban na duniya sun ci gaba da samar da sababin hanyoyi tsakanin yawancin albarkun mara karewar ganuwan.
mt: Cochamó Valley - the gateway to the most beautiful hike in the world, known as the Yosemite of South America, which has towering rock formations and a variety of rock climbing routes. The event includes a group climb and summit. People from different parts of the world have continued to create routes between most of the unprotected attractions.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Idan kana son zagaye duniya a jirgi gaba daya a sashen Kudancin duniya, zaɓin tashi jirage da wuraren zuwansu a takaice yake saboda rashin hanyoyin da ke bi ta cikin teku. Babu wani haɗin gwiwar kamfanin jiragen sama da ke ratsa tekuna uku da ke sashen kudancin duniya (kamfanin sky team basa bin layi ko guda a ciki) Koyaya, Star Alliance ta rufe komai banda gabashin Kudancin Pacific daga Santiago de Chile zuwa Tahiti, wanda ke jirgin LATAM Oneworld. Wannan jirgi ba shi ne kadai zabi ba idan kana so ka tsallake South Pacific da yankin bakin teku na yamman South America. (duba kasa).
mt: If you want to fly around the world on one plane in the Southern Hemisphere, your choice of departure and arrival airports is limited by the lack of waterways. There is no airline alliance that serves all three waterways in the Southern Hemisphere (SkyTeam does not serve the South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is served by LATAM Oneworld). This is not the only option if you want to fly South Pacific and the coastal region of South America. (see country).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: A fadin duniya akwai kimanin ƙungiyoyi kusan 200 masu zaman kansu wadanda ke gudanar da harkokin yawon shaƙatawa. Magajin Global Runnning Tours, Go Running Towers ta hada cibiyoyi sadarwa da yawa na masu gudu a nahiyoyi hudu. Da asali daga Zagayen Tseren Barcelona na Barcelona da kuma Ttseren Copenhagen na Copenhagen, nan da nan sai Zagayen Tseren Pague da ke Prague da wasu suka shigo.
mt: 200+ independent tour operators worldwide offer running tours. Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours connects many running clubs in four continents. Originally from Barcelona Marathon in Barcelona and Copenhagen Marathon in Copenhagen, soon Prague Marathon in Prague and others joined.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Watakila Safaris ita ce mafi girman zane-zanen yawon buda ido a Afirka kuma abin birgewa ga baƙi da yawa. Kalmar safari an fi danganta da masu bulaguro a kafa domin kallon kyawawan namun daji na Afirka, musamman yankuna marasa duhu da ciyawa sosai. Wasu dabbobi, kamar giwaye da raƙuman dawa, su kan je kusa da motoci kuma na’ura mai kyau za ta ba da damar kallo sosai. Zakuna, damisar cheetah da ta leopard wasu lokuta suna kaucewa mutane kuma za ku fi ganin su sosai maduban hangen nesa. Safari na tafiya (wanda ake kira “tafiyar daji”, “safari maiyawo”, ko tafiya “ƙafa”) ya ƙunshi yin yawo, ko dai na awanni ko kwanaki da yawa.
mt: Ƙarƙashin ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren ɗan gajeren
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Yawan bude ido cikin jama’a ya fi saukin kudi, don haka idan kai kadai ne ko kana tare da abokin tafiya daya, yi kokari ka hadu da sauran mutane domin hada kungiya na mutum hudu zuwa shidda domin samun farashi mai sauki. Koda yake kada wannan ya dame ka, saboda yawanci yan yawon bude ido ana cusa su cikin motoci domin a cikasu. Da alama wata hanya ce ta yaudarar mutane su kara biyan kudade.
mt: 1. The more you open your mouth, the less you pay, so if you're alone or with a companion, try to meet other people to form a group of four to get a discount. Even if this doesn't work, because usually tourists are charged in cars to be in them. Therefore, there is only one way to increase payments.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Kasancewar tattalin arzikin San Francisco an fi alakanta shi da harkokin yawon bude ido, tattalin arzikin a hakika ya shafi fannoni da dama. Ɓangarorin da suka fi samar da aiki su ne ayyukan ƙwararru, gwamnati, fannin kudi, ciniki, da yawon buɗe ido. Yawan nuna ta cikin wake wake, fina-finai, adabi da karbabbun al'adun zamani, ya taimaka wajen sanya garin zama fitacce a fadin duniya. San Francisco ta samar da wani katon gini na ‘yan yawon shakatawa da ke da otal da dama, gidajen abinci, da kuma fitattun kayayyakin zamani. San Francisco shi ma ya zama wani waje a kasar domin samun wasu nau’ukan abincin yankin Asiya: kamar Korea da Thailand da Indiya da kuma Japan.
mt: The economy of San Francisco is primarily based on tourism, and the economy certainly affects many areas. The main sources of income are education, government, finance, commerce, and tourism. The city is known for its nightlife, fine dining, and the arts. San Francisco is home to many famous landmarks, including the Golden Gate Bridge, the cable cars, and the Palace of Fine Arts. The city is also home to many famous restaurants, including the famous Nob Hill restaurant, the famous Chinatown restaurant, and the famous Japanese restaurant. San Francisco is also home to many famous museums, including the famous Museum of Modern Art, the famous Museum of Asian Art, and the famous Museum of African Art. San Francisco is also home to many famous parks, including the famous Golden Gate Park, the famous Golden Gate Park, and the famous Golden Gate Park.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Biya da wuri tana ba da mafita tare da tafiye-tafiye na fili. Studentsalibai na iya kallon kayan tarihin, ziyartar akwatin kifaye, ko kuma sha'awar kyawawan fasaha yayin zama tare da ajinsu. Ma'aikatan tafiye-tafiye galibi suna da ma'amala tare da takamaiman otal, kodayake kuna iya samun damar tsara wasu nau'o'in masauki, kamar filayen zangon, ta hanyar wakilin balaguro. Dillalan zirga-zirga galibi suna bayar da hasafin karya kumallo da tsara tafiye-tafiye - na zuwa da dawowa - daga filin jiragen sama ko kuma su kan hada har da na tafiyar jiragen da kuma na otel. Duk wani gyara ko buƙata za a tura ta wurin jami’in tafiye-tafiye da farko ba kai tsaye zuwa otal ba.

ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Manhajoji masu fasara rubutu a kan lokaci – manhajoji waɗanda suke iya fasara dukkan ɓangarorin rubutu kai tsaye daga wani yare zuwa wani. Wasu daga cikin manahajar da ke wannan rukuni na iya fassarar rubutu a cikin yaren kasashen waje akan alamu ko wasu abubuwa a cikin ainihin duniyar lokacin da mai amfani ya nuna wayan kwakwalwa ta hanyar wadancan abubuwa. Injunan fassara sun inganta sosai, kuma yanzu sau da yawa suna ba da cikakkiyar ko fassara da ba ta kai ba (da kuma ƙarin ƙarancin shirme), amma ya dace a bada kulawa, saboda har yanzu suna iya yin hakan ba daidai ba. Daya daga cikin mahanaja mafi shahara shine Fasarar Google, wanda ke bada damar fasara ba kan yanar gizo ba bayan zazzagewar bayanan yaren wanda aka fi so.
mt: Real-time text-to-speech – systems that can read aloud all the characters in a language from start to finish. Some of these systems can read text in foreign languages aloud on a screen or other objects in real time as the user types in characters. Speech synthesis has improved greatly, and now often provides full or near-full (and sometimes lower-quality) pronunciation, but care should be taken, as it still often makes mistakes. One of the most famous systems is Google Translate, which provides the ability to translate text on a web page after a user types in the language they prefer.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Faduwar dusar kankara ba abu ne mara kyau ba; gangara na iya rikewar dusar kankara sosai, kuma yawancin kima za su sauko kamar faduwar dusar kankara. Matsalar ita ce dusar ƙanƙara na da danko, don haka yana buƙatar wasu abubuwan da za su iya saukowa su sauko, kuma wasu dusar ƙanƙara da ke saukowa na iya zama abin da ke haifar da sauran. Wasu lokuta asalin abin da ke haifar da shi shine hasken rana da ke sanya dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu ƙarin dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu al'amuran yanayi, sau da yawa ɗan adam.
mt: 1. A crash landing is not a bad thing; a crash landing can be a crash landing, and most of the damage will be from a crash landing. The problem is that a crash landing is a crash landing, so it requires other things to be able to crash land, and some crash landings can be caused by other crash landings. Sometimes the cause of the crash landing is the sun, sometimes other crash landings, sometimes weather, often people.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Curry abinci ne da ta samu asali daga ganyen itace da kayan kamshi, tare da nama ko kayan lambu. Kori na iya kasancewa “busasshe” ko “mai ruwa” abinda ya danganta da yawan ruwan da ke jikinsa. A cikin yankuna masu nisa na Arewacin Indiya da Pakistan, ana amfani da madala a cikin curry; a Kudancin Indiya da wasu yankuna na gabar teku na yankin, ana amfani da madarar kwakwa sosai.
mt: Curry is a dish originating from the Indian subcontinent that uses spices and herbs to flavor a base sauce, usually containing chopped onions, garlic, and ginger, and meat or vegetables.  In the northern regions of India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used in curry; in the southern regions of India and other coastal areas, coconut milk is often used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Hayar Layin Duniya na Kudu (ko Babbar Hanya) tsawon kilomita 1600 ne daga Tashar McMurdo akan Tekun Ross zuwa Layin duniyar. Matsatsen dusan kankara da tsagewa cike ciki da alaman tuta. Za a iya tafiyan da tractors na musamman, hauling sleds da mai da kayayyaki. Wadannan ba su da azama sosai saboda haka gwajin za ta dauki doguwar tafiya a kewayen dutsen Transantarctic don zuwa saman jigawan.
mt: 1600 km long South Pole (or main) highway from McMurdo Station on Ross Sea to Pole. Rough, rocky, and icy. Can be driven with special tractors, hauling sleds, and carrying supplies. Not very safe, so the test will take a roundabout route around the Transantarctic Mountains to the top of the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Shiga Kudancin Afirka da mota hanya ce mai ban mamaki don ganin duk kyawawan yankin da kuma zuwa wurare daga hanyoyin yawon buɗe ido na yau da kullun. Za a iya yin hakan karamar mota tare da matukar tsari na kulawa sosai amma 4/4 shi aka fi aminta da shi kuma wurare da dama sai da mota mai 4/4 za a iya shigarsu. A sa a rai cewa duk da cewa akwai zaman lafiya a kudanci afirka ba kowacce makwabciyar kasa a yankin ke zaune lafiya ba. Bukatar Bizar da kuma kudinta ya banbamta daga kasa zuwa kasa kuma yana da nasaba da kasar da ka zo. Haka kuma kowace ƙasa tana da dokoki na musamman waɗanda ke buƙatar irin abubuwa na gaggawa da ya kamata su kasance a cikin mota.
mt: 4x4 is the only way to see the best of Southern Africa and get to the out of the way places. You can do this in a 4x4 with good care but 4/4 is the most recommended and there are many places where only a 4/4 can get you. It is advisable to check that the country you are visiting is safe and that you are not going to a war zone. Every country has its own rules and regulations that you must abide by and you must have the correct documentation to enter the country.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Daukawa wa wasu - Kar ku bar jakunanku inda baku ganin su ba, musamman idan kuna ƙetarewar iyakokin ƙasashen waje. Za ka iya samun kanka ana amfani da kai a matsayin mai dakon ƙwayoyi ba tare da saninka ba, wanda zai jefa ka cikin gagarumar matsala. Wannan ya hada da jira a layi, saboda ana iya amfani da karnukan da ke shakar magani a kowane lokaci ba tare da sanarwa ba. Wasu ƙasashe suna aiwatar da hukunci mai tsanani ko da a kan masu laifukan farko ne; waɗannan na iya haɗawa da ɗauri a gidan kurkuku da ya wuce shekaru 10 ko mutuwa. Jaka da ba a sata ba, makasudin sata ne kuma kan iya jan hankulan mahukunta saboda tsoron barazanar bam.
mt: 1. Don't assume that people you don't know are not using you as a carrier of pathogens without your knowledge, which could lead to serious problems. This includes sneezing on you, as they may be using the tissues they are blowing their nose with at any time without warning. Some countries impose severe penalties on first offenders; these may include a fine and/or up to 10 years in prison or death. Unprotected sex is also a crime and could lead to the spread of STDs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Cika gidanka da wadataccen kofi da safe da kuma shayin shakatawa mai kyau na dare. Lokacin da kake kan hutu, kuna da lokacin da za ku kula da kanku kuma ku ɗauki yan mintuna kaɗan don ƙirƙirar wani abu na musamman. Idan kana son karin karsashi, ka yi amfani da damar samun wani abu da zai dau hankalinkaa watakila ka gano wani abun sha da za ka iya haɗawa domin karin kumallo yayin da ka dawo aikinka na yau da gobe. Idan kana zaune a cikin birni mai al'adun shaye-shaye iri-iri, je gidajen giya ko mashaya a unguwannin da ba ka yawan zuwa.
mt: Fill your stomach with a healthy breakfast and a good morning snack. When you wake up, you have time to create something special. If you're in a city with a variety of shops, go to a restaurant or shop in a neighborhood you don't usually visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Kauyen Haldarsvík yana ba da damar kallon tsibirin Eysturoy da ke kusa kuma yana da wata cocin mai kusurwa takwas wadda ba saba ganin irin ta ba. A cikin farfajiyar majami'ar, akwai zane-zanen marmara mai ban sha'awa na kurciya akan wasu kaburburan. Shafe rabin sa’a na tattaki a cikin shu’umin ƙauyen ya biya.
mt: Haldarsvík offers a view of the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an eighteenth-century church that is well worth seeing. In the churchyard, there are interesting gravestones of various shapes. Half of the village's income comes from tourism.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Yayin da ba lalle ne ka buƙaci biza don taƙaitattun ziyarar zuwa wasu ƙasashe a matsayin ɗan yawon shakatawa ko kasuwanci ba, tafiya can a matsayin dalibi na ƙasa da ƙasa yana buƙatar zama na dogon lokaci fiye da zuwa can kawai a matsayin ɗan yawon buɗe ido. Gabaɗaya, kasancewa a kowace ƙasar waje na tsawan lokaci na buƙatar ku sami takardar izini a gaba. Bizar ɗalibi a gaba ɗaya suna da abubuwan da a ke buƙatu da hanyoyin neman bizar da suka bambanta da bizar da aka saba ta yawon shakatawa ko asuwanci. A mafin yawancin kasashe, kana bukatar takardar shiga daga cibiyar da kake neman yin karatu tare da shaidar yawan kudi wanda zai taimaka wajen gudanar da karatun na akalla shekarar farko. Duba da cibiyoyi, tare da sashen jami'in shige da fice na kasar da kake neman yin karatu domin samun cikaken ka’idoji.
mt: While you may not need a visa to visit some countries as a tourist or for business, traveling there as a student requires staying for a longer period of time. In general, being a student in any country requires you to have a student visa. Student visas are different from tourist or business visas. In most countries, you need a letter of acceptance from an institution you are applying to study at, along with proof of funds to cover at least the first year of study. Check with institutions, along with the immigration office of the country you are applying to study in for specific requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: A lokacin rani, musamman, akwai buƙatar lura da sauro idan kun yanke shawarar yin tattakin kan dutse a dajin mai ruwan sama. Ko da kuna tuki ta cikin dajin yanki mai yanayin ruwan sama sosai, daƙiƙa kaɗan da ƙofofi a buɗe yayin da ku ke shiga cikin motar ya isa lokacin da sauro zai shiga motar tare da ku.
mt: In the spring, especially, it is important to be aware of the possibility of flooding when deciding to drive through a flooded area. Even if you are driving through a flooded area with a low water level, a few inches of water that has accumulated in the road can reach the height of the hood of your car when you enter the car with the flood.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

mt: In the spring, especially, it is important to be aware of the possibility of flooding when deciding to drive through a flooded area. Even if you are driving through a flooded area with a low water level, a few inches of water that has accumulated in the road can reach the height of the hood of your car when you enter the car with the flood.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbans su ne dazukan gefen tekuna mafi girma a duniya, inda suka mika tswon kilomita 80 (mil 50) cikin busassun yankunan kasashen Bangladesh da India daga gabar teku. An ayyana Sundarbans a matsayin Wurin Tarihin Duniya na UNESCO. Bangaren daji da cikin yankin Indiya ana kiransa Gandun Dajin Ƙasa na Sundarbans. Dazuzzukan ba kawai daji ne mai surkukiyar bishiyoyi da laka ba kawai - sun kunshi daya daga cikin daji mai duhu da su ka rage wanda ya mamayi yankin Gangetic. Sundarbans sun mamaye yanki mai faɗin 3,850 km², wanda kusan kashi ɗaya bisa ukunsa ruwa/ marsh ce. Tun daga 1966 Sundarbans ya kasance mafakar dabbobin daji, kuma an ƙiyasta cewa yanzu haka akwai damisar Royal Bengal guda 400 da kuma wasu barewa 30,000 da aka gani a yankin.
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, where it covers 80 km (50 mi) of pristine areas of the Bangladesh and India coastlines. The Sundarbans was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called the Sundarbans National Park. The mangroves are not only forest of trees and shrubs - they also contain one of the world's largest tidal halophytic communities. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-fifth is water/marsh. Since 1966 the Sundarbans has been a tiger reserve, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer visible in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Duniya tana da yare fiye da 5,000, yaruka dabam-dabam, gami da sama da ashirin da miliyan 50 ko da masu magana. Rubutattun kalmomi sau da yawa suna da sauƙin fahimta fiye da kalmomin magana, kuma. Wannan gaskiya ne musamman ga adiresoshin, waɗanda galibi suna da wahalar furtawa cikin fahimta. A wasu kasashen kusan kowa na jin turanci, amma a wasu da yawa ba haka abin ya ke ba musamman tsakanin matasa. Ka yi tunanin, idan za ka so, wani Mancunian, Boston, Jamaica da Sydneysider zaune a kusa da tebur suna cin abincin dare a wani gidan abinci a Toronto. Suna nishadantar da juna da labaru na garuruwansu, suna fadinsa a harsuna dabam-dabam na gida.
mt: 5,000 languages, spoken by over 50 million people. Written languages are often easier to understand than spoken ones, and this is especially true for adolescents. In many countries, almost everyone speaks English, but in others, many do not, especially among the young. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting together at a restaurant in Toronto. They are exchanging news of their hometowns, speaking in their native tongues.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Manyan motocin sun bar tashar zirga-zirga tsakanin yankuna (sun ratsa ta kan kogin) a tsawon rana, duk da dai yawancinsu, musamman wadanda za su tafi gabashi da na Jakar / Bumthang su na tashi tsakanin karfe 06:30 zuwa 07:30. Motocin bus masu zirga-zirga tsakanin unguwanni kan kasance a cike, shawara ita ce ka sayi tikiti tun kafin kwana biyu. Ana iya zuwa yawancin gundumomi a cikin kananan bas wadanda ke da kwari ga dadin tafiya. Raba motocin tasi hanyoyi ne masu sauri da sauƙi don zuwa wurare kusa, kamar Paro (Nu 150) da Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Main buses run between towns (crossing the river) throughout the day, with most, especially those going east to Jakar/Bumthang, leaving between 06:30 and 07:30. Buses between towns are usually full, advice is to buy tickets two days in advance. Most villages can be reached by small buses with space for luggage. Sharing taxis is a quick and easy way to get to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Idan aka haɗu da rashin damar isa can, Sunan “Timbuktu” ya zama abin misaltawa ga wuraren nesa, masu wuyar zuwa. A yau, Timbuktu gari ne na talauci, kodayake mutuncin da take da shi ya sa ta zama hanyar jan hankalin masu yawon bude ido, kuma tana da tashar jirgin sama. A shekarar 1990, an saka shi cikin jerin wuraren tarihi na duriya da ke cikin hatsari, saboda barazanar rairayin hamada. Ya kasance ɗaya daga mahimman wurare da aka tsaya cikin shirin PBS na Henry Louis Gates “Abubuwan mamaki na musamman a Nahiyar Afirka”. Birnin ya sha bambam da sauren birane na kasar kasancewa ya fi kama da birnin larabawa fiye da na yan Afirka.
mt: If connected with the inability to reach it, the name "Timbuktu" became a misnomer for distant, difficult-to-reach places. Today, Timbuktu is a poor town, but its importance as a tourist destination, and its airport, has made it a major stopover for travelers. In 1990, it was placed on the list of endangered world heritage sites, due to the threat of desertification. It was one of the major stops in the PBS series by Henry Louis Gates "Uncommon Places in Africa". The town has a distinctly Arab appearance, more so than African.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Za a gudanar da wasannin nakasassu daga 24 ga Agusta zuwa 5 ga Satumba 2021. Za a gudanar da wasu abubuwan a wasu wurare a duk fadin Japan. Tokyo za ta kasance gari daya tilo na Asiya da ya taba karbar bakuncin wasannin Olympics karo biyu, bayan da ta dauki nauyin wasannin a shekarar 1964. Idan kayi rijistar tashin jirgi da masauki a 2020 kafin sanar da jinkirtawa, zaku iya samun matsala. Manufofin sokewa sun bambanta, amma har zuwa ƙarshen Maris yawancin manufofin sakewa na coronavirus ba su wuce zuwa Yuli 2020, lokacin da aka shirya wasannin Olympics. Ana tsammanin yawancin tikiti na sha’ani za a sayar da su tsakanin ¥2,500 zuwa ¥130,000, yayin da tikiti na yau da kullun su ke kusan ¥ 7,000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other locations across Japan. Tokyo will be the first city in Asia to host the Olympics twice, after hosting the games in 1964. If you booked a flight to Tokyo before the cancellation was announced, you may have a problem. Rescheduling plans vary, but until the end of March, most coronavirus rescheduling plans were scheduled to be completed by July 2020, when the Olympics were scheduled to be held. It is estimated that most of the tickets will be sold for ¥2,500 to ¥130,000, while the regular tickets are about ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Mahaukaciyar guguwa kamar wani sunduki ne me jujjuyawa wanda ke kunshe da iska mai nauyi wadda ke zukar sauran iska da ke gefenta daga kasa ya yi sama. Suna samar da babban iska (yawanci 100-200 mil/awa) kuma na iya daga abu mai nauyi a iska, dauke da su yayinda iska mai nauyi na tafiya. Suna farawa ne daga wani abu kamar hayaki da ke sauka daga girgije sannan ya zama gajimare“Guguwa” yayin da suka taba kasa.
mt: A plume is a column of rising air that is heavier than the surrounding air. It is formed when a warm air mass rises above a cooler air mass. It is usually associated with a cumulonimbus cloud, and is often the first visible sign of an approaching storm. A plume is a column of rising air that is heavier than the surrounding air. It is formed when a warm air mass rises above a cooler air mass. It is usually associated with a cumulonimbus cloud, and is often the first visible sign of an approaching storm.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Idan ƙasar da za ka ziyarta ta zama cikin wadanda sai an nemi shawarar masana, inshorar lafiyarka da ta ikon soke tafiya na iya shafuwa. Akwai bukatar neman shawarwari daga wasu gwamnatocin ba gwamnatin ka kawai ba, amma dai shawarwarinsu an tsara su ne domin yan kasar su. A misali ɗaya, ‘yan ƙasar Amurka da ke Gabas ta Tsakiya su na iya fuskantar halaye daban daga Turawa ko Larabawa. Shawara kawai takaitaccen bayani ne game da yanayin siyasar wata kasa. Ra’ayoyin da aka gabatar galibi na gaggawa ne, na gaba daya kuma marar zurfin tunani idan aka kwatanta su da cikakken bayanin da ake samu a wani wuri.
mt: If the country you are visiting is one of those that requires a travel advisory, your safety and ability to cancel your trip may be at risk. You should seek advice from other governments, not just your own, but their advice is usually tailored to their citizens. For example, Americans in the Middle East may face different conditions than Europeans or Arabs. Advice is only a brief statement about the political situation of a country. Opinions are usually general and not in-depth compared to the full information available at a location.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Idan ƙasar da za ka ziyarta ta zama cikin wadanda sai an nemi shawarar masana, inshorar lafiyarka da ta ikon soke tafiya na iya shafuwa. Akwai bukatar neman shawarwari daga wasu gwamnatocin ba gwamnatin ka kawai ba, amma dai shawarwarinsu an tsara su ne domin yan kasar su. A misali ɗaya, ‘yan ƙasar Amurka da ke Gabas ta Tsakiya su na iya fuskantar halaye daban daga Turawa ko Larabawa. Shawara kawai takaitaccen bayani ne game da yanayin siyasar wata kasa. Ra’ayoyin da aka gabatar galibi na gaggawa ne, na gaba daya kuma marar zurfin tunani idan aka kwatanta su da cikakken bayanin da ake samu a wani wuri.

src: Kamfanonin tafiye-tafiye sun kasance tun karni na 19. Wakilin tafiye-tafiye galibi zaɓi ne mai kyau don tafiya wanda ya wuce abin da ya gabata na balaguro na ɗabi'a, al'ada, yare ko ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗi. Kodayake yawancin hukumomi suna shirye su ɗauki mafi yawan rijista na yau da kullun, wakilai da yawa sun ƙware kan wasu nau'ikan tafiye-tafiye, jeri na kasafin kuɗi ko inda ake so. Zai fi kyau a yi amfani da wakili wanda yawanci lokaci Siya tiketi irin zuwa irin wuri daya. Lura da irin tafiye-tafiyen da wakili ke gabatarwa, ko a shafin yanar gizo ko a cikin taga shago.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good choice for a trip that involves a destination, tradition, language or country with a low income. However, most governments require that you have a valid passport, visa or other documentation for your destination. A travel agent can help you with this. It is best to use an agent who usually deals with the type of trip you are taking. Look for an agent who offers trips to the destination you are interested in, either on their website or in their brochure.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Akwai abubuwa da yawa da ya kamata ayi la'akari da su kafin kuma lokacin tafiya wani wuri. Idan kana bulaguro kada ka yi tsammani abubuwa za su kasance yadda ka san su a gida. Halayya, dokoki, abinci, zirga-zirgar abin hawa, masauki, ƙa'idodi, harshe da sauransu za su iya bambanta daga inda ka ke zaune. Wannan abu ne da ya kamata a sa a rai kodayaushe, don kaucewa samun rashin jin daɗi ko ma watakila bacin rai akan yadda bisa al’ada mutanen yankin ke yin abubuwansu.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during a trip to a foreign place. Things like customs, laws, food, transportation, lodging, etiquette, and language will be different from where you live. This is something to keep in mind at all times, to avoid getting into trouble or even worse, having a bad experience.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Idan ka na tafiya a cikin kasashe masu tasowa a karon farko--ko a sashe na duniya da baka sani ba - ka tanaji ganin abubuwa da su ka sha banban da al’adunka. Yawancin matafiya nutsatststsu na fuskantar kalubale sakamakon sabbin ci gaba a harkar tafiye-tafiye a duniya, yadda kananan canje-canje na al’ada ke karuwa cikin gaggawa. Musamman a kwanakinka na farko, yi la’akari da saukarwa kan salon yamma da ingantaccen masauki, abinci, da hidimomi na taimakawa wurin sabawa da yanayi. Karka yi barci a katifa ko taburma a yankin ƙasa in da ka a san fauna na gida ba. Idan zaku yada zango, kawo sansannin sansanin ko guduma don kiyaye ku daga macizai, kunama da irin wannan.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country--or even a part of the world you're unfamiliar with--you'll encounter things that are different from your own customs. Most travelers encounter challenges due to new developments in the travel industry, as small changes in etiquette are increasing rapidly. Especially on your first day, consider the differences in Western and local customs, food, and hospitality. Sleep on a mat or hammock in the open air if you're unfamiliar with local fauna. If you're going to hike, bring a tent or sleeping bag to protect yourself from mosquitoes, snakes, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: ka tabbatar ka ɗauka bugu na manufofinka da bayanan hulɗar mai inshorar tare da kai. Suna bukatar a nuna adireshin imel na mai inshorar da kuma lambobin wayar kasahsen duniya domin bayar da shawarwari da kuma yin ikirari. Ka sami wani bugun a cikin kayan ka da kuma kan layi (imel da kanka tare da abin da aka makala, ko adana shi a cikin “gajimare”). Idan kuna tafiya tare da naurar kwamfutar tafi-da-gidanka ko kwamfutar hannu, adana kwafi a cikin ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ko faifai (mai sauƙi ba tare da yanar gizo ba). Hakanan bayar da manufofi / kwafin layin waya ga abokan tafiya da dangi ko abokai na gida masu son taimakawa.
mt: 1. Verify that you have received the correct product and packaging with the enclosed instructions. You are required to provide the emergency contact information and the world wide emergency telephone numbers for advice and confirmation. You have received a product in your package and on the label (enclosed instructions) or store in the safe (no internet). Also provide the product / label to traveling companions, family or friends who wish to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Akwai nau'ikan yadda ake nadar fina-finai da yawa waɗanda aka yi amfani da su tsawon shekaru. Wanda aka fi amfani da shi shine mai kaurin 35 mm (36 by 24 mm). Ana iya mayarwa cikin sauki idan ya kare kuma yana iya bada ƙuduri na kusan kwatankwacin DSLR na yanzu. Wasu matsakaika-girman kamarorin fim suna amfani da girma 6cm ta 6cm, mafi daidai a 56mm ta 56mm babu. Wannan na bada haske kusan sau huɗu fiye da dodo fim 35 mm (3136 mm2 versus 864).
mt: 35 mm (36 by 24 mm) is the most common film size used. It can be safely stored and provides the same resolution as a modern DSLR. Other common sizes include 6cm by 6cm, most commonly 56mm by 56mm, which gives about four times the light gathering of 35 mm (3136 mm2 versus 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Hanya mafi sauki don farawa a harkar da rubuta labarin tafiye-tafiiye shi ne ta fitar da kwarewar ku akan wani shafin yanar-gizo na blog. Bayan kun sami kwanciyar hankali da tsarawa da yin gyara akan yanar gizo, sannan daga baya, kuna iya ƙirƙirar gidan yanar gizonku.
mt: The safest way to start a travel blog is to publish your experiences on a blogging website. After you get comfortable with the interface and editing tools, you can then create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: A gida, saboda wannan yawan mu’amala da ƙwayoyin cuta na gida, akwai yiyuwar cewa tuni kun riga kun saba da su. Amma a wasu ɓangarorin duniya, inda sabin halittar bakteriyar dabbobin a gare ku, zai yiwu ku shiga matsaloli. Hakanan, a cikin yanayin dumi kwayoyin cuta na girma da sauri kuma suna da tsawon rai a wajen jiki. Don haka annobar Delhi Belly, Tsinuwar Fir'auna, Ɗaukar Fansar Montezuma, da abokan su da yawa. Kamar yadda matsalolin manumfashi suke a wurare masu yanayin sanyi, ana yawan samun matsalolin hanji a wurare masu yanayin zafi inda kuma lokuta da dama suna da ban haushi na daban amma ba hapipar haɗari ba.
mt: At home, because of this exposure to household pathogens, you may already be immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the pathogens are new to you, you may be susceptible. Also, in areas where the pathogens are growing rapidly and have a long incubation period, you may be exposed to many more illnesses. As with the colds in cold climates, the stomach bugs in hot climates are also common but not contagious.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Turai nahiya ce karama amma cike da kasashe masu yancin kansu. A tsari ana iya cewa yin tafiye-tafiye tsakanin kasashen na nufin sai ka nemi takardun izinin shiga da ratsa wuraren binciken takardun tafiya. Yankin Schengen, duk da haka, yana aiki kamar ƙasa ɗaya ta wannan. Muddin ka tsaya a wannan yankin, gabaɗaya zaka iya ƙetare iyakoki ba tare da wucewa cikin wuraren kula da fasfon ba. Hakanan, samun izinin shiga kasashen Schengen, ya sa baka bukatar samun izinin daidaikun kasashe da ke cikin jerin kasashen, hakan na rage asarar lokaci, kudi da cike ciken takardu.
mt: Europe is a continent of sovereign states. In practice, travelling between countries means asking for permission to enter and leave the country. The Schengen area, however, works as one country. As long as you stay in this area, you can cross borders without going through customs. Also, getting permission to enter the Schengen countries reduces the time, money and paperwork needed to enter individual countries.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Kabarin Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 na iya zama mafi shahararrun kaburbura a cikin kwari, wurin da Howard Carter ya gano 1922 na kusan binne masarauta na matashin sarki. Idan aka kwatanta da wasu kaburburan masarauta, kodayake, kabarin Tutankhamun yana da ƙimar isa a ziyarce shi, yana da ƙanƙan da ƙarancin ado. Duk mai sha’awar ganin shaidar barnar da gawa ta yi yayin yunƙurin cire shi daga cikin akwatin gawa zai yi baƙin ciki tunda kai da kafaɗu kawai ake gani. Dukiyar da ke cikin kabarin ba ta cikin ta, amma an cire ta zuwa Gidan Tarihi na Masar da ke Alkahira. Yana da kyau baƙi masu ƙarancin lokaci su yi amfani da lokacin a wani wuri daban.
mt: Tomb KV62. KV62 may be the most famous tomb in the Valley, where Howard Carter discovered the burial site of the young king in 1922. However, compared to other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is relatively accessible, with a low level of decoration. Anyone interested in seeing the damage caused by the removal of the mummy from its coffin will be disappointed, as only the mummy and its wrappings are visible. The contents of the tomb are not on display, but have been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time should visit another site.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Tsibirin Bowen sanannen tafiya rana daya ne ko ziyarar koyo na karshen mako da ke samar da wasan kwalekwale, tattakin kan dutse, shaguna, gidajen abinci, da wasu. Al’ummar ta hakika na nan a Howe Sound idan ka wuce garin Vancouver, kuma ana iya shiga ta hanyar kwalekwalen haya da ke tashi daga tsibirin Granville dake garin Vancouver. Domin waɗanda ke jin daɗin yin harkoki a waje, tattaki daga kan Teku zuwa farfajiyar Sama yana da muhimmanci. Whistler (tuki na awa 1.5 daga Vancouver) yana da tsada amma sananne ne saboda Wasannin Olympics na lokacin sanyi na 2010. A lokaci hunturu, ji dadi da gudun ski mafi kyau a North America, sannan da bazara a gwada hawan dutse a keke na kwarai da gaske.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway, offering hiking, camping, restaurants, and other activities. It is easily accessible from the city of Vancouver, and can be reached by ferry from Granville Island in Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, the drive from Vancouver to the ferry terminal is scenic. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is famous for its winter Olympic games in 2010. In the summer, it is known for its excellent downhill skiing, and in the fall for its hiking and mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls dai wani gari ne da yake a wani yankin kasar Zimbabwe kan iyaka daga garin Livingstone na kasar Zambia, kuma kusa da Botswana. Garin na nan da an wuce mabugar ruwa daga dutse, kuma shine abu mafi jan hankali, sanannen wajen yawon bude idon zai baiwa yan yawon kasada da masu sha’awar kalle-kalle damar dogon zama a wajen. A lokacin damuna (Nuwamba zuwa Maris), yawan ruwan zai karu inda Mafaɗar ruwa za ta zama mai ban mamaki. Babu makawa sai kun jike idan kuka ketare gadar ko yin tafiya a kusa da hanyar mai kwane-kwane a kusa da mabugar ruwan. A daya hannun, ya tabbata cewa saboda ruwa mai yawa yayi tsiri sama, shi yasa ya kare maka mafadar ruwa.
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the southern area of the country of Zimbabwe on the border with the town of Livingstone in Zambia, and near Botswana. The town is located near a waterfall, and is the most famous tourist attraction, giving visitors the opportunity to spend a long time in the area. During the rainy season (November to March), the water level will rise where the waterfall will be spectacular. There is no bridge except if you walk on the bridge or take a walk near the waterfall. On the other hand, it is known that because of the high water level, it is closed to the waterfall.
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Ana amfani da dokokin daukar hoto na yau da kullum a wajen daukar bidiyo, watakila ma fiye da na hoton. Idan kawai ba a yarda a ɗauki hoton wani abu ba, to kada ma ka ma yi tunanin yin rikodin bidiyo ɗinsa. Idan ana amfani da nau’rar hoto na jirgi, yana da kyua a lura kafin lokaci abubuwan da aka yarda da daukar hoton su da kuma me akwai izini ko ana bukatan karin lasisi. Shawagi da jirgi mai sarrafa kansa kusa da filin jiragen sama a kan taron jama’a kusan gurguwar fahimta ce, ko da ma bai ci karo da doka ba a yankin ku.
mt: You are required to take a photo every time you take a video, perhaps more than a photo. If you just don't want to take a photo of something, you shouldn't think of recording your video. If you use a photo mode of a plane, it is advisable to check before time what is allowed to take a photo of and what requires additional license or permission. A plane flying near a public event is almost a matter of common sense, even if it is not in compliance with the law in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Rajista wata ƙarin buƙata ce ta tsarin visa. A wasu ƙasashe, dole ne a yi rajistar kasancewarka da adireshin inda kake zaune tare da hukumomin yankin. Wannan na iya buƙatar cike fom tare da yan sanda na gida ko ziyarar ofisoshin shige da fice. A ƙasashe da dama da ke da irin wannan doka, gidajen otal na yanki ke gudanar da rijistar (don haka tabbata ka tambaya). A wasu lamuran kuma, wadanda suke zama a wajen wuraren zaman masu yawon bude ido ne kawai za su yi rajista. Ko da yake, hakan ya sa dokar ta zama wata iri, da bata fito baro-baro ba.
mt: 1. A further requirement is the visa application form. In some countries, you must register your residence with local authorities. This may require you to present yourself to local police or visit the immigration office. In many countries with such a law, local hotels are responsible for registration (so you will be asked questions). In some cases, only those who stay outside tourist areas will be asked to register. However, this makes the law somewhat arbitrary, and not always enforced.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Sadaukarwar sa-kai yayin da a ke tafiya babbar hanya ce ta kawo canji amma ba kawai batun bayarwa ba ne. Rayuwa da sadaukarwar sa-kai a ƙasar waje babbar hanya ce ta sanin wata al’ada ta daban, haɗuwa da sabbin mutane, sanin kanka, samun fahimtar hangen nesa har ma da samun sabbin dabaru. Yana iya zama hanya mai kyau na shimfida kasafin kudi domin ba da izini mai zurfi a wani wuri tunda yawancin aika na sa kai na ba da daki da katako da kankanin albashi.
mt: Ɗaya daga cikin abubuwan da ke sa-kai a cikin gida ya kawo canja a cikin gida, amma ba kawai batun bayarwa ba ne. Rayuwa da sa-kai a ƙasar waje babbar hanya ce ta sanin wata al'ada ta daban, haɗuwa da sabbin mutane, sanin kanka, samun fahimtar hangen nesa har ma da samun sabbin dabaru. Yana iya zama hanya mai kyau na shimfida kasafin kudi domin ba da izini mai zurfi a wani wuri tunda yawancin aika na sa kai na ba da daki da katako da kankanin albashi.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Tafiya zuwa Duniyar Walt Disney tamkar wani aikin hajji ne ga akasarin iyalai a Amurka. Irin wanna ziyarar ta kunshi sauka a Filin jirgin saman Orlando, da shiga otal din Disney, yin kusan mako guda ba tare da barin inda Disney ta ke ba, sannan komawa gida. Akwai abubuwa da dama da ke iya faruwa, abinda mutane da yawa ke nufi idan su na maganar “Zuwa wurin wasa na Disney”. Da yawan tikitin da ake sayarwa a shafukan yanar gizo a irinsu eBay da Craigslist, suna kasancewa wadanda ake maimaita amfani da su ne. Duk da cewa al’amarin ya zama ruwan dare, Disney ta haramta yin haka: ba’a iya gusar da tikitocin.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is a common vacation for American families. Such a visit includes flying into Orlando International Airport, staying at a Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving the Disney property, and then returning home. There are many things that can happen, things that many people mean when they say “Going to Disney World”. With the abundance of tickets being sold on websites such as eBay and Craigslist, they are being reused. Despite the fact that the practice has become commonplace, Disney has banned it: tickets cannot be transferred.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Duk wanda ke shirin ziyara zuwa wata ƙasa da za a iya kallonta a zaman fagen yaƙi dole ya samu horon ƙwararru. Binciken yanar gizo don ‘yanayin muhalli mai tsanani’ yana iya fitar adireshin wani kamfanin gargajiya. Hanya koyaushe za ta rufe dukkan batutuwan da aka tattauna a nan cikin mafi cikakken bayani, yawanci tare da ƙwarewar aiki. Wani kwas wanda za a yi cikin kwana 2-5 wanda zai shafi aikin da ya kunshi horarwa kan agajin gaggawa da kuma a wasu lokutan har da horarwa na makamai. Littattafai da mujallu masu ma'amala da rayuwar jeji sanannu ne, amma wallafe-wallafen da ke magana game da yankunan yaƙi ba su da yawa.
mt: Anyone planning to visit a country at war must undergo training. A search for 'environmental conditions' may reveal the address of a private company. The route will always close all topics discussed here in the most detailed information, often with workarounds. A course that will be held over 2-5 days covering the work that includes training on the use of weapons and at other times including training of arms. Literature and journals dealing with the management of life are well known, but the writings that speak of war zones are not many.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Akwai hanyoyi daban-daban na tsarkake ruwa, wasu sun fi tasiri kan takamaiman barazanar. A wasu wurare, minti daya ya isa ruwa ya tafasa, amma a wasu wuraren kuma yana bukatar mintuna da yawa. Matata sun bambanta a inganci, idan kana da damuwa, to sai ka yi tunanin sayan naka ruwa a kwalba mai murfi daga amintaccen kamfani.
mt: There are many ways to drown, some have more impact on specific threats. In some places, it takes minutes to drown, but in others it takes many. The severity varies, if you are worried, then you think you are drowning in a pool of foam from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Igiyar ruwa mai yagawa su ne ruwa ne mai dawowa daga raƙuman ruwa da ke fasa rairayin bakin teku. Saboda yanayin karkashin ruwa da ke sa gudana da mai da hankali a wurare masu zurfi, sannan igiyar ruwa mafi zurfi na iya haduwa a wurin. Yawancin mace-mace suna faruwa ne sakamakon gajiya da ke ƙoƙari ya koma baya kan na yanzu, wanda ƙila ba zai yiwu ba. Da zarar ka fita daga ruwan, sake komawa ruwan ba zai zo da wata sarkakiya ba. Yi ƙoƙarin auna wani wuri inda ba za a sake samun ka ba ko kuma, ya danganta da ƙwarewarka da kuma cewa ko an gan ka, watakila za ka so jiran ceto.

ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
